column84: Little country inn the city on Mimosa Farm is in the middle of the city on 9 acres with goats, a mini donkey, dogs and THE BEST mountain views. Nestled at the base of Afton mountain, you are just minutes from the 151 brewery trail. Host offers the option of adding transportation for a safe, worry free day. The Inn will accommodate up to 7-8 people! Pets are accepted with $25 fee. We will WAIVE the cleaning fee for stays that are 2 days or greater! The space The Inn has a cozy farmhouse feel with neutral grays and browns. Plenty of walking and outdoor area. The bathroom is vintage tiles with a separate steam shower and bathtub. The Inn is shared with the host but completely private. My goal is to provide as much interaction as you would like. Guest access The guests have access to the private 2 bedroom apartment, with a private bathroom, great room and kitchenette. The kitchenette includes a sink, microwave, refrigerator, and single induction cooktop. During the summer months and for as long as the weather stays nice access to the home’s inground pool is available as well. Guests will also have access to a private gas grill, outdoor eating space and outdoor swing! Other things to note Please note that I do not charge a cleaning fee for 2+ night stays. Keep that in mind when comparing to other properties which may have a $10 less per night cost but a $50-100 cleaning fee. I do charge a pet fee of $25 per night. This helps cover the cost of additional maintenance that pet wear and tear causes. I provide a pet bed, separate towel and some water and food bowls.
column91: Mimosa Farm  *no cleaning fee for 2+ day stays*

column66: Cozy apartment with beautiful views on a horse farmette on the most scenic road in the county. Located within 15 miles from Charlottesville and only 6 miles from Shenandoah National Park and the Blue Ridge Parkway, this vacation rental is the perfect spot if you are looking for places to hike, scenic drives or visit the many wineries, breweries or cideries located in close proximity. The apartment is situated over the garage and has its own separate entrance offering guests plenty of privacy. The space If you love animals and the country side this place is for you. There are two dogs on the premises who might bark on occasions but are friendly and willing to say hi if given the opportunity. There are also three horses on the property which are ridden on a routine basis and two barn cats. The location of this rental is also convenient for wedding guests as it is within a few miles from King Family Vineyards, Pippin Hill Farm, and right across from the Blue Ridge Farm.

column47: Enjoy this cozy abode, ideal for couples or groups looking for an affordable and convenient spot to enjoy the sites! Located within the Basic City Hub, Afton Abode is within walkable distance to Basic City Brewery and downtown Waynesboro, just a few miles from Skyline Drive, Parkway, and Appalachian Trail. Conveniently located near the 151 Nelson County Wine/Brewery Trail and Wintergreen Resort! **We do require 30 days or longer stay** The space The unit is a private two-bedroom space with beautiful hardwood flooring throughout. The living room features an eat-in dining space plus living space, a flat-screen TV, and in-unit laundry. Relax and spend a blissful night or two (or seven) in this convenient space featuring a full-size kitchen, eat-in dining area, full bath, and two bedrooms. Kitchen features an oven/stove, refrigerator, and microwave. The kitchen is fully stocked for 6 with pots, pans, utensils, cups, wine glasses, etc. Plenty of countertop space for cooking and cabinets for food storage. Off the kitchen are the eat-in dining area and living area with a flat-screen TV, sofa, WIFI/NETFLIX provided. There are two spacious bedrooms in the house. Each bedroom features a queen bed featuring pillow top mattresses, luxurious bedding, and a closet for storage. Soaring ceilings throughout and plentiful space. column90: Spacious modern house with a large furnished rooftop deck overlooking Monticello & Carter Mountain. Not one, but two spacious master suites (one on each floor) with attached decks, plus additional two bedrooms and a full bathroom on the 2nd floor. Second floor has the second master bedroom suite with a king size Nectar bed with an adjustable remote control base (elevate feet and/or head of the bed, zero gravity and massage settings), remote control fan and lights, mounted 50” Smart TV, private attached balcony, a large bathroom with a glass door shower (same size and layout as the first floor master bedroom) and bidet. On the second floor you will also find additional two large bedrooms (queen size bed in each room) with ceiling fans and a 3rd full bathroom in the hallway with glass double vanities and bathtub. Washer and dryer with steam setting for wrinkled clothes is located on this floor as well. Head upstairs to the spacious furnished rooftop deck to enjoy the views and relax with a glass of wine. Dining table, spacious couch, propane grill, propane fire tables make it for a fun hangout area. The house is over 2800 sq feet and has over 1000 sq feet in attached deck space. This smart house has separate NEST thermostats on each floor, video doorbell, Alexa, and a smart lock that you can open with your individual code, so no key is needed! MERV 13 HVAC air filters are used. For additional sleeping space, a tall queen size air mattress and bedding can be provided upon advance request. column68: You're sure to enjoy this recently built (completed March 2020), private guesthouse in the charming Little High neighborhood near downtown Charlottesville. Additional kitchen amenities include a coffee grinder, toaster, electric kettle and single-serve coffee maker (pour-over). Also, a full set of dishes, glasses, wine glasses, pots and pans, and well-stocked utensils drawer. The bedroom contains a new Casper queen-size bed and bamboo sheets, night stand on either side of bed, built-in book shelf, shelves with drawers for clothing, and a hanging clothes rack. The bathroom has a full shower, toilet and sink, full set of towels, ventilation fan, and a closet with more linens, toiletries and cleaning supplies. * Please note, there is no TV. But our excellent WiFi will allow you to stream all your favorite shows on a laptop or other device.

column79: LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION! Spectacular Virginia Estate on 17 acres located just 5 miles from UVA. Situated on Rivanna River with pool & hot tub, outdoor kitchen and fire pit. Inside features gourmet kitchen, antique floors, media room, exercise room, five bedrooms and 5 1/2 baths. Guests can enjoy the twelve televisions, eight fireplaces and six Sonos stereo zones. Must be 25 years or older to rent. Ideal for graduations, reunions, Bachelor and Bachelorette parties or birthdays. The space This historic house is 70 years old and was completely renovated in 2015. It's located on 17 acres and is a rare and amazing space so close to town. Guests spend most time outdoors in the pool area enjoying the fire pit, outdoor grill, hot tub, adirondack chairs, outdoor couches, stereo and television. Guest access You have the entire house and yard. Parking is unlimited and the area is incredibly private with no neighbors. It is our primary home, so personal items are around the house. Other things to note All water activities are taken at your own risk, and children should be supervised at all times. No diving in the pool, and always use the personal flotation devices with kayaks and paddle boards.

This Pantops private suite is located on historic land, next to Old Ordinary, one of the oldest homes in Charlottesville - just 10 minutes from downtown and short drive to wineries. The apartment has two queen bedrooms, 1 bathroom with a jetted tub, full kitchen, dining area for 6 people and a cozy living area with a work desk. Views overlook beautifully landscaped gardens and seven acres of land. Within 10 minutes of downtown, UVA and 15 minutes from Jefferson Vineyards and Monticello.

This Pantops private suite is located on historic land, next to Old Ordinary, one of the oldest homes in Charlottesville - just 10 minutes from downtown and short drive to wineries. The apartment has two queen bedrooms, 1 bathroom with a jetted tub, full kitchen, dining area for 6 people and a cozy living area with a work desk. Views overlook beautifully landscaped gardens and seven acres of land. This property which started as a Tavern in the 1700s now serves as an extended stay space (>30 nights). Enjoy the TV and high speed internet. There is a nearby basketball net for shooting hoops or you can just enjoy the views from the porch or patio.
Amenities include Central A/C & heat, large TV, Wifi Internet, Full Kitchen, Washer/Dryer, Hardwood floors, jetted tub and shower, laundry room, coat closet, large desk with drawers and bookcase filled with local authors.  Within 10 minutes of downtown, UVA and 15 minutes from Jefferson Vineyards and Monticello.

 *Parking is maximum of 2 cars in the driveway.

column67: This beautiful property features both the Cottage and Loft. You can book them individually or together! Our home is located in a quiet neighborhood right off Route 151 within a 5-10 minute drive to all of the Brew Ridge Trail's breweries, wineries, cideries and distilleries. You'll find yourself in a mountainside community with Virginia hospitality at the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Explore the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountain trails by day and kick back at nightfall by the campfire. The space Located near the famous Route 151, the area is surrounded by popular breweries and vineyards, offering plenty of options for exploring local flavors. The apartment is fully equipped with a stocked kitchenette for your convenience, a comfortable queen bed, and a private bathroom to ensure a restful and relaxing stay. Whether you're here for a quiet getaway or to enjoy the local attractions, this loft provides the perfect combination of comfort and scenic beauty.

column79: Renovated 3BR/2BA rancher at the intersection of 151 and 6 in the heart of Nelson County's numerous vineyard, brewery, and distillery offerings. Also close to family friendly orchards and hikes. Clean and fresh decor, ample seating, and three cozy bedrooms. Kitchen equipped with oven, stove, full fridge, and coffee maker. Living room equipped with TV (Netflix, Amazon included) and board games. Comfortably sleeps 6 adults/kids. Our full air mattress can squeeze in another 1-2 adults. The space Gather together in the shared spaces while you eat, play games, listen to music, or watch TV. Or spread out and recharge in one of the three well-sized bedrooms. Kitchen includes necessities for preparing a meal at home, i.e., basic pots and pans, cutting board, oven mitts, glassware, utensils, dishes, condiments, etc. Pack 'n play, sound machine, and booster seat all available for use. Full air mattress also available. Committed to upholding strict cleaning procedures between guests. Additional cleaning products available for use if needed. Fresh bed linens and towels provided. Detergent and dryer sheets available for washing machine and dryer. Guest access Entire home. We use contactless self check-in using a smart lock. Your unique code will be provided to you before you arrive and can be used throughout your stay. Other things to note Early check-in (before 4:00 PM) or late check-out (after 11:00 AM) may be available for $50. Please inquire and we'll let you know if it works with our schedule! If you need a bit more space, please check out our little brother property, The Whiskey Lodge, that sleeps up to 10 guests and is only 2 miles away! **WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY: Our home is located in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, so we expect a variable amount of snow in the winter months. We encourage guests to make sure their vehicles have the ability to drive through a light to moderate amount of winter weather when staying during winter months. Finally, we welcome longer term stays too! If you are a traveling medical professional or have a need to be in the area for several weeks to months, please reach out!
column86: Wine Down Ranch — Blue Ridge,  Nelson 151 Getaway

column53: Located in the heart of Nelson County’s 151 Trail at the foot of the Blue Ridge Mountains, Aftonshire Cottage is a beautifully renovated space to meet all your traveling needs. Whether you plan to tour the vineyards, hop the breweries, hike the mountain trails or ski Wintergreen this charming cottage will be a welcoming base camp you’ll enjoy returning to again and again.

column76: This custom home at the base of Wintergreen is located 40-minutes from Charlottesville. The waterside setting offers views from living, primary bedrooms, decks and porches, as well as upstairs bedroom and balcony. Large glass walls and sliding doors ensure connection with the landscape. A two-person master-bathroom shower with views of the pond is a key feature of the home's sleek and minimalist design. The home is off of the Rte. 151 beer/wine/distillery trail and nestled beside a golf course. The space Listed in January 2024 by Washingtonian as one of the Best AirBnBs for a Ski Weekend Near DC
column77: this unique home's glass-walled living room provides an unobstructed view of a large pond. The mountains are particularly visible late fall through early spring. The art mirrors the home's open and comfortable feel. The home has 1 Gig wireless service — perfect for work-from-home vacations, long getaways and work retreats. The kitchen has a seventeen-foot granite surface, custom built-in cabinets and drawers, and high-end appliances. The butler's pantry off of the kitchen provides additional prep space and Keurig for brewing coffee. The primary bath shower holds a two-person shower with view of the pond and heated floors. An upstairs bedroom provides access to the outdoors with its own balcony. You can enjoy the media room with Roku TV. The home has a Sonos sound system. The deck off of the living room is the perfect place to enjoy a freshly-grilled or cooked meal with friends. A walk down from the deck to the backyard brings you to a garden and reflection space where you can enjoy the solitude and quiet of the water and mountains. We do not have a fire pit, as Stoney Creek prohibits them to help mitigate fires. Please note that do have a security camera of the front exterior of the home. The camera is motion activated and record audio and video. Guest access Guests have access to the home and property that includes a pond and garden, excluding an owner's closet. Guests can park up to two vehicles in the architectural garage adjacent to the home. Guests have access to a neighborhood pool. Other things to note There is access to a community pool. Per AirBnB policy, please note that you are required to book for yourself and cannot book on the behalf of others.

column60: Lise and I are excited to offer the beauty and convenience of our historic home to guests coming to Charlottesville. This has been our family home for more than 25 years and we welcome you into it. We are on the edge of UVa Grounds, three (3) blocks from the UVa Rotunda and “The Corner” restaurants and shopping. And we are walking distance to John Paul Jones Arena & Scott Stadium. The nearby free shuttle provides easy access to Downtown Mall restaurants, shopping, movie theater, etc. The space Small (8'x13') private bedroom with private outside entrance and one twin bed. Mini-refrigerator. Nespresso coffee maker and hot water kettle. Full bathroom within the room. The entrance is off of a screened porch that includes a a table with two chairs, and a ceiling fan. The yard and garden immediately outside the entrance has a patio table with two chairs, and a chaise lounge chair. Ultra-high speed internet connection (fiber optic 1,000 Mbps) Guest access Guests have access to the screened porch, their private bedroom with a private bathroom, and the garden and yard area just outside of the room. Note that there is no guest access to a kitchen or laundry room. Other things to note We have two friendly dogs and a fenced yard. We want to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. We respect diversity and inclusion of all people. If there is something that would make your stay especially wonderful, let us know. We will strive to make it happen if it is feasible for us. Note: We have two other rooms available in the main part of our home ... 1. A private Queen Room with a private bathroom, separate workspace, and shared use of our living room. airbnb.com/h/cvillequeenroom 2. Two private Queen Rooms with a shared private bathroom, separate workspace, and shared use of our living room. https://airbnb.com/h/cville2rooms

column54:
The Metta Grotto is a cozy yet airy basement studio designed w/ the principles of Metta- good will, loving-kindness, & the sincere wish of peace for all who enter. Our home is meant to be a sanctuary.  Appointed w/ our luxury Metta Home textiles & amenities we value in our own routines, we want you to love your stay so much you want to bring the Metta home w/ you! Enjoy adventuring in this little mountain city close to natural wonder in all directions, acclaimed dining, UVA & vineyards!

* Please note, the Mettā Grotto is a one bedroom open lay out studio located in the basement of the Mettā Gem (a 2 bedroom bungalow). 
* We always remind our upstairs guests that someone could potentially be staying below & noise does travel & you will hear your upstairs neighbors. 
* We have installed sound proof panels to help minimize any issues. Also recommend keeping the pocket door & bathroom door closed to help buffer the noise. 

* The Metta Grotto has its own private entrance on the side of the house with its own unique code that we generate for each guest. The front door of the house is reserved for the Metta Gem, our other listing, as it leads directly in to their living room. 
* Upon inputing your unique code in the side entrance lock, you will descend down a stairwell. At the bottom of the stair case, you will find the entrance to the studio on the right with another coded lock. 
* To the left. you will see a washer and dryer, this area is the only indoor common area that could be shared with the upstairs guests at the Metta Gem, otherwise all areas of the Metta Grotto are private.   

* Once you enter the Grotto, you see the living area directly in front of you with a comfortable couch and a large mounted Smart TV (Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, Pandora, Etc. are loaded) on the wall that also can be seen from the Kitchenette area! Directly to your right upon entering the Grotto, you will find a kitchenette equipped with the essentials- a mini fridge/freezer, toaster oven, coffee maker, our special locally roasted Mettā Coffee - Stir, roasted in Richmond, VA by Afterglow Coffee Co-Op. Additionally, there is a selection of creamers & sweeteners, a coffee grinder, olive oil & salt & pepper as well as a small sink. The kitchenette features a beautiful live edge counter that is a great place to enjoy your breakfast or use as a work from home space! Continuing along past the kitchenette, you will find the bathroom with a large walk in shower (w/ shampoo, conditioner & shower gel) and plenty of storage shelves for your toiletries as well as a few emergency amenities. On the other side of the wall from these rooms you will find the sleeping area featuring a comfortable queen sized bed made using our luxurious Metta Home bamboo silk sheets (Check out Metta-Home. com to buy a set for your home). The sleeping area can be partially partitioned from the living area using the rolling closet rack, perfect for hanging your clothes too. The sleeping area faces the living area to complete our cozy little hideway.

*** A $95 additional cleaning fee will changed on longer stays of 14 days or more. **

The Mettā Grotto has a private entrance to the right of the home along the side.  The door is pink, just like the front door.  It is separate from our other listing, the Mettā Gem (2 bedroom upstairs bungalow). The only potential shared space is the washer dryer area and the fire pit area outdoors in the back of the home. We provide a contactless check in process. Guests are able to enter the house & the basement apartment entrance with unique generated codes.

I am available and want to ensure that you have a Mettā Experience.  Just message me and I will respond!  Our guest book has an extensive list of commonly asked questions, things to do, and where to eat.

* NO SMOKING anywhere inside the home. You may smoke outside; be sure you extinguish what you are smoking before leaving unattended. Be sure that all doors, windows and any opening where smoke may enter the house are closed and secured.
* HOUSE PARTIES & EVENTS ARE PROHIBITED 
* You agree to act in such a manner as to allow those nearby peaceful enjoyment of their properties. 
* We reserve the right to cancel your reservation at any time if you violate this policy.
* Advance notice is required for early check in requests and well do our best to accommodate those requests. 
* We charge $25 per hour starting at 12 noon and will be requested through Airbnb upon check in. 
* Late Check - Out: Check out is on or before 10am. If you would like to extend your check out time, please contact us in advance and we may be able to accommodate your request. 
* Unauthorized late check-outs will automatically be charged 30% of the daily rental rate per hour stay past 10am. 
* Your unique access door code will only work until the checkout time of 10 am unless other arrangements have been agreed upon. 
* We understand that accidents happen, but please let us know if something spilled, stained, or gets broken during your stay. 
* Failure to communicate any damages, we will pursue collecting for the damages through Airbnb and charge an additional 20% over and above the replacement costs. 

** PETS MUST BE PRE-APPROVED Please send us a message should you want to bring your pet. There is a nonrefundable fee of $35 per pet that we will request upon check in. Long term nonrefundable pet fees are $150 per pet, per reservation.
You know your pet better than we do, please bring the appropriate accommodations for your particular pet. For example, if your pet is a shedder, please bring your own blanket to protect our furniture. 
** Please pick up after your pet when walking them in the neighborhood.
** If your pet makes a mess in the house please clean it.  Uncleaned pet messes and strong odors will be subject to additional fees.

column70: Once the garage for a Model Ford car, now a bright, thoughtfully renovated studio charmer! Great for visiting nurses/doctors, UVA parents, and professors. Centrally located, quiet residential area close to everything. Walking distance to UVA (1.3 m), Barracks Road (1.3 m), Downtown Mall (1.7 m), Whole Foods (1.4 m). Super fast Ting wi-fi. Keyless Entry. Free on-street parking. Long-term stays available. 15% discount 7+ days, 40% on stays of a month+. ==================================== The space A unique stay in what was once the garage for a Model T Ford motor car! Walk down the old drive way (now a path) and enter the newly renovated apartment to begin your stay. This is a semi-basement, 392 sq/ft studio apartment, perfect for 1-2 people. Located in separate space in a family home. Private entrance. Sunny windows on three sides of the living area. Bedroom/living area with a queen bed, couch, work/eating area, television (Smart TV for streaming w/your accounts, fast Ting fiberoptics), full bathroom and well-equipped kitchenette (everything except a stove) and washer/dryer for longer stays. 3-night minimum. 15% discount on stays longer than a week, 40% on stays of a month or more. $70 a MONTH cleaning fee for stays of one month or longer, to be paid in advance, via check or via arrangement w owner on another platform, because there is no way to add these to Airbnb tab. Cleaning will be done two weeks into the month long stay. *Please read Rental Contract/House Rules before booking.* ============================================================ The KITCHENETTE has a full-sized refrigerator and dishwasher, coffee machine, hot water kettle, French press. No full stove, but other appliances, along with a microwave make meal prep easy. Available on request: crockpot, electric frying pan, air fryer, rice cooker. Let's discuss your cooking needs! Beautiful handcrafted walnut counter - pull up a stool and drink your morning coffee! Bubbly waters in the fridge. Snacks, tea, coffee on the counter. Creamer/milk etc. by arrangement. Olive oil, vinegar, salt, pepper. Starter amounts of dishwasher soap, dish soap, cleaning liquid, trash bags under the sink. Long-term stays will need to replenish. Washing machine for stays of 10 days or more only. ============================================================ Fully equipped BATHROOM with excellent lighting, extractor fan, wall heater for winter, bath towels for two, shower with rain head. Night light on the wall. Body wash, shampoo/conditioner to start, toothpaste and toothbrushes if you've forgotten yours. Earbuds, cotton balls, tissues/kleenex and extra toilet paper. Long term stays will need to restock. Iron and ironing board in closet in hallway. ============================================================ Dedicated mini-split system for cooling and heating. Washer/dryer is available for guests staying 10 nights or more. Starter soap provided. ============================================================ There is a small 2 1/4 step in the transition from the bedroom to the hallway leading to the bathroom and kitchen. Marked with a hazard strip. Kitchen floor slopes gently in two places. The house was built in 1926

column81: Welcome to The Pop Inn! This renovated Victorian has been designed for fun with guests in mind. Located in a desirable residential neighborhood, you can safely walk to the historic downtown area or use the house as your jumping off point for vineyard/brewery tours. Whether you're visiting the area for a bachelorette party, wedding, couples' getaway, or family retreat, The Pop Inn is the perfect place to stay to experience the beautiful Charlottesville (aka C'ville) area! The space The layout: Total of 5 bedrooms and 2.5 baths. All main beds are new, 10 memory foam mattresses. Beds will be made up with fresh linens and plenty of towels are provided for the group. Kitchen comes fully stocked for cooking/eating all standard meals. First floor: Entryway/foyer- this is the area with the purple sofa and chairs. A great additional hang space for your crew. The living room is a great mix of glam and comfy. There is a moveable 50" Smart TV that can easily be placed in the corner when not in use or moved to a more ideal place if you would like to put on a movie/show
column82: even into the dining room or foyer. Just login to your favorite apps throughout your stay! The living room is adjacent to the entryway and has a door that can shut for privacy and a mini split unit to help control the temp in this room. The dining room seats 12 and boasts a large communal table
column83: buffet that is full of games (Cards Against Humanity
column90: and MUCH more!) We also have a custom champagne cart that is perfect for having a mimosa brunch. There is a half bath in the hallway that is complete with a stacked washer/dryer. The kitchen has everything necessary to cook a standard meal
column91: including all dishware/cookware for a group
column96: and a coffee bar. Enjoy the pink SMEG brand toaster and coffee maker. The coffee bar comes complete with 12 individualized coffee mugs
column97: fresh coffee and a reusable coffee filter to make 10 cup pots
column98: sugars and powdered creamers. There is an additional mini fridge in this room for added beverage/food storage for large groups. There are 3 bar stools staged at the peninsula and an additional 3 stools tucked away under another table so that you have the option to gather around the peninsula in a larger conversational group. Please note that the fridge does not have an ice maker but we will keep the ice bin full and have additional full trays in the freezer. There is a back exit that leads out to a small outdoor area that has a dining table for 6 and a 4 burner stainless steel grill. This level has one bedroom with a King size bed and ensuite full bath with a stand-up shower. This room also has a small balcony with some seating. Second floor: Guest bedroom 1: 2 Twin beds Guest bedroom 2: (Solid pink velvet curtains and cream colored bed) 1 King bed 1 memory foam cot Guest bedroom 3: (Largest bedroom) 1 King bed 1 Twin bed Guest bedroom 4*: 1Twin daybed with memory foam mattress 1 memory foam cot There is a screened in porch with seating off of bedroom #4. There is a staircase off of the porch that leads down 2 levels to the outdoor/parking area as its own private entrance. There is a full bathroom with a tub shower in the hallway on second level. Parking: Parking is provided for 4 cars in a private lot and there is additional non-metered street parking adjacent to the house that is unlimited and never full. Please inquire for more parking info! Please note that there is a completely separate basement apartment for the "innkeeper" (not connected in any way through the interior of the house). This will not affect your stay in any way!"
column105: The Pop Inn | Perfect for your group getaway

column59:
The Metta Gem is a 3-bedroom bungalow designed w/ the guiding principles of Metta: good will, loving-kindness, & a sincere wish of peace for all.  Our home is a sanctuary from everyday life, appointed w/ our own luxury Metta Home textiles & amenities we value in our own routines, we want you to love your stay so much you want to bring the Metta home w/ you. Enjoy adventuring in this little mountain city close to natural wonder in all directions, C’Villes acclaimed dining, UVA & vineyards.

The Gem is full of all the amenities you will need to enjoy your stay in Mettā.  As soon as you enter you will see our pink wall-- hang your things here and find the parking pass as well.  
Walk on in & make yourself right at home. youve walked into our living area and to the right you will see the kitchen. In the living area we have included several office supplies to make WFH easy and convenient. We have a 2 Smart TVs.  The first is mounted over the fireplace & visible from the living room, kitchen island, & dining area.  The second is downstairs and visible throughout most of that area.  Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, Pandora, Etc. are loaded. The kitchen is well equipped not only including a coffee pot, stove, dishwasher, fridge etc. but we also appoint our kitchen with tons of great extras including our special Mettā Blend Coffee - Stir"

The beds are made with our luxurious bamboo silk Mettā Home brand sheets and these neat little moveable LED bedside lamps.  Youre sleeping on Metta Home mattresses and pillows too!  The bathroom has shampoo
column65: conditioner & shower gel as well as Mettā Home towels
column66: wash cloths and bathmats.  All of our Metta Goods products are available to meet you back at your house through our website Metta-Home. com.  You will find the bathroom has a hair dryer and first aid kit among other thoughtful touches. Downstairs you will find another bedroom and bathroom as well as another well stocked kitchenette.  This room is very private from the rest of the house and can function as a separate suite if you would like.  At the foot of the steps you will also find laundry in a shared alcove. Please note the mini splits unit on the walls are operated via a remote control. Remotes should all be left where you found them. These serve as an economical and energy efficient heating and air-conditioning solution.  Please enjoy our home as your own and treat it with respect.  We have done everything to create a sanctuary for you and your family and friends.  Please remember to leave a friendly review if you enjoyed your stay and check out Metta-Home. com to see our other Metta Stays!

column52: Beautiful home just minutes from downtown Cville! This 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom home is the perfect place for your family and friends to get together for UVA events or visit downtown. Located in the Rugby Hills area, Greenaway is a great central location for whatever brings you to Charlottesville. Within 9 minutes to the UVA Rotunda, 7 minute drive to Barracks Shopping Center and Stonefield where several grocery stores and shopping areas are located, 6 minutes to Downtown Mall. The space Upon entering the home is the living room with great natural light coming from the large windows and a white brick modern fireplace. The living room opens to dinning area and a beautifully renovated kitchen with new stainless steel appliances and new countertops. The main floor also contains three of the bedrooms; including the primary suite with a king sized bed and en suite bathroom with a tub/shower. A queen bedroom and twin bunk room share a full bathroom with a stand in shower in the hallway. On the lower level is a large family room with a flat screen TV, sectional sofa (that also has a full size pull-out bed) and another king bedroom with access to newly renovated full bath. This spacious lower level also has a playroom with plenty of toys for the kiddos and a rock climbing wall. Washer&Dryer available. 1 dog considered with associated pet fee ($75) Marie Bette (one of Charlottesville favorite bakeries) is minutes away and the brand new Dairy Market is right up the road -- an open space multi-vendor concept with food vendors and Starr Hill Brewery. Within 9 minutes to the UVA Rotunda, 7 minute drive to Barracks Shopping Center and Stonefield where several grocery stores and shopping areas are located, 6 minutes to Downtown Mall. Guest access *For this property, there is plenty of on-street parking. Maximum of 5 cars.
column59: Greenaway House - Close to Dtwn Cville!

column76: Less than a mile to the historic downtown mall. North Downtown expansive English Cottage boasting over 3,200 renovated square feet on almost half an acre. Hardwood & stone floors throughout. *If the dates you need are unavailable, message us. We may be able to accommodate your request. Please check out our sister property, Long Street Cottage: airbnb.com/h/longstreetcottage It is located 0.5 miles from Park Street Cottage. The space Open plan kitchen, living room, dining room & sunroom. Each bedroom has a 50” mounted Smart TV to give a true boutique hotel feel. Both living rooms also have 55” Smart TVs mounted on the walls. Wonderful kitchen offers a gas range, double ovens, 2 dishwashers, 2 sinks, and granite counters. 5 bedrooms, 4 full bathrooms, featuring steam showers, radiant floor heating & lovely tile work. Main level: 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (1 bed/1 bath is a master suite), laundry room, living room, kitchen, and dining room. Terrace level: 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, kitchen with stacked laundry unit, desk space, and living room/dining room. Upstairs level: Master suite - 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, nook with gas fireplace and 2 twin beds. There are 2 Queen pullout sofas (one in each living room). The kitchen is fully stocked to cook and serve meals, and all fresh linens, towels, and daily essentials (toilet paper, paper towels, soaps, sponges, trash bags, dishwasher detergent, etc.) are provided. Each bathroom comes stocked with a hair dryer, body wash, shampoo, and conditioner. Charming outdoor spaces replete with patios, decks, fencing, garden shed, and stone walls. Generous off-street parking with a circular drive behind. Walk or bike to parks and trails nearby.
column83: Park Street Cottage | 5 bdrm/4 bath | Sleeps 14

column70: Look out onto Monticello from a brand new build (2019, 2022) Carriage House in the Belmont neighborhood. Enjoy 800 sq ft of independent living space, including a full kitchen, full washer and dryer, and spacious living room and bedrooms. The Carriage House is in walking distance of C'ville's historic Downtown Mall, downtown Belmont, IX Art Park, and is 1 mile from UVA (if the wind is right, you can hear the football game!). The space Spacious and private personal 2 bedroom apartment with large additional sleeping loft, 1.5 baths, a full kitchen, and washer and dryer. The living room has an electric fireplace for cozy tv watching. The main bathroom has a double vanity with a marble counter. In the middle of Charlottesville’s most popular neighborhood, with easy access to all the local sites and with front views of Monticello and back views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Guest access Entire Carriage House is accessible to guests. Early check in and late check out is available; just send me a message letting me know your interest! Other things to note There is a little free pet toy box in the Carriage house. If you spent your hard earned money on a great pet toy, only to see your fur baby ignore it, bring it to C’ville and leave it in the little free pet toy box! With any luck, your pet will find something they love in there. Sticky toys (toys that don’t go home with anyone for a year) will be donated to the Charlottesville ASPCA. There is also a little free library in the Carriage House, so if you’ve finished reading something good, switch it out for something new during your stay.

column63: A short walk to the Downtown Mall, Main Street shops and restaurants, and the UVA hospital, this brand-new guest house will welcome you to the heart of Charlottesville. Cozy and modern, our light filled sanctuary features high end finishes and warm details. A comfortable desk and high-speed internet makes the space perfectly suited for traveling professionals. Make this your urban home base, as you explore the Virginia outdoors, with dozens of wineries and gorgeous hikes within a short drive. The space Our guesthouse offers thoughtfully designed efficient spaces that feel large and generous. The fully equipped kitchen, with marble countertops, clean contemporary cabinets, and new appliances, opens to a private patio and open air dining space. The double height living room is bright and airy yet private, with large contemporary windows and an open stairway leading to the loft bedroom and separate bathroom. The space also includes a washer and dryer, ample closet space, and an under the stairs reading nook. The bedroom overlooks the living room and features a Tempurpedic queen mattress as well as a comfortable desk overlooking distant views over Fifeville’s treetops. The small house knits seamlessly into the historic urban fabric of one of Charlottesville’s best neighborhoods. Guest access Private driveway, entire detatched loft apartment, and private garden patio.

column61: Bright sunny loft, two blocks from The Pavilion and Charlottesville's downtown mall. Walk to shops, restaurants, coffee shops, yoga... this is a great spot! You will have access to a desk and wifi, and access to the laundry room if arranged in advance. There is off street parking on the side of the house - rare for the city! The space The apartment is the top half of a residential home. It is completely private, and there is an apartment below that is also rented on Airbnb. You will likely be able to hear people below and vice versa. This is an old house with a ton of character, including some cracks in the floor boards and caulking. :)

column64: Walk through history & enjoy a beautifully restored antique house in friendly Belmont. A 5 minutes stroll to the lively Downtown Mall for outdoor entertainment, restaurants, theaters, music and shopping. 3 minutes walk to historic Belmont with restaurants, cafes, art, Farmer's market, IX Park. A leisurely bike to UVA or take the free trolley. Large bright second story apartment: large living room, spacious, sunny eat in kitchen, 2 comfy bedrooms. Lovingly furnished with local antiques. The space Separate entrance, comfy wide front porch. Dog friendly just let us know first. Free high speed Wifi. Full kitchen stocked with cooking basics, Keurig and full sized fridge. Historic charm with the comfort of central A/C and heating. Monticello is 7 minutes down the road as are wineries and breweries. Local artists have displayed their paintings throughout the apartment and all are for sale. Let us share with you our love for Charlottesville and the Blue Ridge! There are family residents living downstairs so we require the upstairs guests to be quiet after 10 pm and respectful. Guest access Entire second floor apartment. Entrance foyer with coat and umbrella rack and stairwell. Other things to note One dog is ok but let us know first and please bring dog's bed, crate and food dishes. Dogs should be crated if left alone unsupervised. Please clean up after while on walks. No cats or snakes please. Family downstairs so please quiet after 10pm. No smoking, parties or weapons of any kind. Because of insurance reasons, only the people on the reservation are allowed on the property. Thank you for understanding.

column55: Charming, private, efficiency apartment located in the center of winery/brewery country! This efficiency offers fiber internet (super fast)! Less than a minute to Blue Mountain Brewery, Flying Fox Vineyard, and Valley Road Vineyard. Less than 5 minutes to Veritas Vineyard, Cardinal Point Vineyard, Silver Back Distillery, Afton Mountain Vineyards. 5-10 minutes to Bold Rock Cidery, Devils Backbone Brewery, Brewing Tree Brewery, Mountain Meadery, Hill Top Berry Farm, and so many more. The space This is a studio, efficiency apartment which means it is all one room (kitchen and bedroom and living room) and a separate bathroom. This is a private space. The apartment is your space only with its own entrance. The kitchen has a microwave, sink, coffee pot, and small fridge, but no stove. This apartment is connected to a main house so noise does travel between the walls at times, although the apartment is its own private unit. This apartment is best for 1 or 2 quiet people. A great place if you just a spot to relax and sleep. This is not suited at all for any loud noise or partying of any kind. Other things to note Guests should note that this is a SMALL space primarily set up for a solo traveler or a quiet couple. This apartment is connected to a main house so noise does travel. While staying in the apartment you may hear noise from guests who are staying in the main house. This apartment is on a property with other small guest cottages.

column73: Newly renovated, clean and comfortable with many amenities. Honey B has a lofty feel with the footprint of a small house. High ceilings and several skylights allow for light and privacy in the quiet neighborhood of Sherwood Farms. Located on the southwest corner of Charlottesville, just beyond UVA campus, 7 minutes to Scott Stadium, UVA and restaurants, 10 minutes minus plus to everything Charlottesville : historic downtown mall, Thomas Jefferson’s Monticello, Many wineries and breweries. The space Former workshop converted into one-bedroom small house original details intact. 400sqft. Guest access Honey B, the patio, the yard and the vegetable garden on the property Other things to note There are 2 guest houses on the property, Honey House and Honey B. They are separate but nearby, designed with maximum privacy in mind: different parking locations and separate building entrances. Ideal for 2 couples vacationing together. HoneyHouse https://abnb.me/kisN2e1Tygb Or, zoom in map to see both listings. Honey B was built in 1959 as a workshop/storage shed. What you see now is basically two small storage spaces combined into one. Where the sofa now sits was a workbench with various tools hanging on a pegboard behind it. At the end of the bench, where the kitchen sink is now, there was a small wood-burning stove, the only source of heat. Originally the bench spanned the width of the building, separating it into two halves of what would become the Honey B. The back half, where the bedroom and bathroom are now, had a dirt floor and was open to the yard on one side. Exposed to the elements, after many years of disuse (or just plain neglect) the joists started to rot causing the roof to sag. During the renovation we raised the ceiling height by spanning the roof from the back wall to the top of the old shed. We feel like we arrived just in time to save it. We knocked down part of the cinderblock wall, connecting the two sides and closed up the open side of the building. Part of the wall remains behind the sofa

column80: Welcome to Mountain View Mini Farm! We are located in the Rockfish Valley(Afton, VA)with amazing views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Head down the hill, past the barn and turn right to our driveway. Parking is provided in front of the far right garage & pasture fence. Take the sidewalk towards the mountains to enter your cozy getaway with some of the best views in the valley! (The cottage entrance is located on the right side of the garage.) Rooms are clean, comfy & big. Bedroom 2 is an open concept with a divider if needed for privacy. This allows for amazing mountain views upstairs! Other things to note We have fiber optic wifi if you need to work or Zoom during your stay! Please be aware that our home is in the country so we do have insects. Indoors you may encounter asian lady beetles (they look like lady bugs) and stink bugs. Both are harmless. Please keep doors closed to avoid inviting them to stay."

column77: The Small House is anything but small when it comes to comfort and relaxation. It is located in the heart of Nellysford near a local grocery store and restaurants. The space Named for the family who lived there from 1935 to 2016, this home was lovingly remodeled and updated in 2020. Quiet comfort of a modernized farm house, with 100 Megabit internet! The home includes 2 living areas one with a gas fireplace and the other with a woodburning fireplace. There are 2 queen bedrooms downstairs each with a nearby full bath. The downstairs also includes a laundry room for your use, a fully stocked kitchen, and a dining room that seats 6-8. Upstairs are two bedrooms and a half bath. One bedroom has four twin beds and the other bedroom has a futon that folds out and can sleep 1-2. The futon bedroom also has a tv and Nintendo game system. The backyard has a deck, firepit area, 8 chairs in the deck box, corn hole, and many acres leading back to a private section of the Rockfish River. We provide coffee and snacks as well. The Main Floor: The living room, kitchen, dining room, and half bathroom are all on the main floor. The 2nd Floor: The master bedroom has a king-sized bed, an attached master bathroom, a small deck connected to the bedroom, and a walk-in closet. There are two guest bedrooms, one with two twin beds and one with a queen sized bed. The laundry room and a full guest bathroom are also on this floor. The 3rd Floor: This large double bedroom has two queen beds, with each room having a curtain separator for adequate privacy (separator blocks visibility, not noise). One of the bedrooms includes a private office with desk and available network printer at your disposal. There is a basement/lower level that is unavailable that is both currently under renovation and occupied. There are completely separate entries and should not impact your stay in any meaningful way. Guest access The main level and two upper floors can be used. The basement is not available to use and that access point is locked from the inside. The backyard is there for your use, though!

The Zen Barn at White Lotus Eco Spa Retreat, our main event space and sanctuary for communal gatherings. Housing five suites, this unique venue boasts a conference room, a communal kitchen, and a movie theatre available for private reservations. Find tranquility in the meditation room or relax in the skylounge within the beautifully crafted interior made of wood, featuring posts that resemble trees, creating a truly distinctive atmosphere. Stay connected with our included WiFi as you immerse yourself in the serene surroundings. The Zen Barn's grand hall, with its unique and captivating design, serves as the central space for larger events and gatherings. Whether it's a conference, a shared meal, or a movie night, the Zen Barn is a versatile and welcoming space for a variety of occasions.

If you do plan on using the cook top while staying please give a heads up and we can supply the unit with more items needed for cooking. Streaming services provided are: Netflix, Max, and Amazon Prime. Feel free to login under your own credentials to purchase movies from Prime or other services.

column38: Conveniently located just a 10 minute drive to the University of Virginia campus and Medical Center as well as the Downtown Pedestrian Mall with numerous restaurants and retail boutiques. This peaceful home is settled in a cul de sac surrounded by gardens and woods with walking trails both in the neighborhood and nearby. It’s a mile from Wegman’s shopping plaza. Other popular attractions are Monticello, Montpelier, and many wineries and breweries. Blue Ridge Mountains are a 20min drive😊 The space This is a house divided into an upstairs apartment, with the first floor reserved for Air B&B. The upstairs tenant is there Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday nights and works for UVA so is not there most of the day. The front door is shared but everything else is separate. Guest access First floor and outdoor space

column74: Spacious three bedroom two bath top floor condo with a balcony. Ready to move in, equipped with all living essentials for extended stay. Tennis courts, large outdoor pool, gym on site. Additional discount for 3+ months stays. The space Measuring about 1200 sq ft, top floor (3rd floor) condo features one master bedroom suite with an attached bathroom with a tub, another two bedrooms, and a full bath with a shower in the hallway between the bedrooms. Plenty of closet space. Spacious living room with a balcony, full size kitchen and a laundry closet with washer/dryer. Comes equipped with all living essentials. Condominium complex has a gym and a pool great for swimming laps, just a couple minutes walk from the condo. Short driving distance to Downtown Mall (7 min); UVA (8 min); many hikes, breweries and wineries (9+ min), cideries (14+ min); Carter Mountain (14 min), and Monticello (12 min). Wegmans and Food Lion Grocery stores, Starbucks, movie theater, several restaurants and stores just 2 miles away. Guest access You will have the entire 3 bedroom, 2 bath condo to yourself. Other things to note Parking is free and is on premises in the parking lot. 2 parking passes will be provided and additional parking is available in visitor's parking spaces. Access to pool and gym is included. The condo is located on the top 3rd floor of the building and there are 3 short flights of stairs to get to the condo. Main building door has a code to enter. Condo door has a code lock as well, so no keys are needed.

column94: Visit the Dudley Mountain Estate for true log-cabin living, with a rustic modern vibe. Tucked away on the mountainside, yet still only minutes from fine dining, wineries, breweries, hiking, and so much more! You will be just 10 minutes from UVA, 6 miles from Charlottesville's Down Town Mall, and only 8 miles from Pippin Hill Vineyards, Potters Craft Cider, or Carter Mountain! So many must see spots surround this hidden, secluded gem for the entire extended family to enjoy together.

column36: Pack ’n play/Travel crib - available upon request
column70: Welcome to this stunning two-level carriage house in the heart of downtown Charlottesville! Less than half a mile from downtown mall, less than a mile from UVA and the hospital, and only a 5-minute walk to countless bakeries, shops, and restaurants on Main Street, you won't need to get in your car unless you want to! With unique touches, excellent craftsmanship, and a modern vintage vibe, you'll be so happy to come home to this impeccably furnished private abode after a long day of work or fun. The space This carriage house is truly a dream. The warm wood tones, the unique accents, the massive windows, the high ceilings — it is utterly delightful! Add that to the amazing location — close to everything, but on a quiet dead end street, and you have a true gem. The carriage house also has a great set-up for remote work as well! The carriage house is also outfitted with a beautiful fully standing desk, dual monitors and docking station for use with Mac or Windows users. Also for travelers looking for exercise, the space is equipped with a Schwinn stationary bike for getting a Peloton ride in! (note it's the digital membership experience) The house is located behind the main house, where a family lives, but the carriage house has a completely separate entrance. Guest access The whole carriage house is all yours! Other things to note Parking at the house is street parking only, being so close to downtown. There are no permits required and ample free street parking all around the house.

column70: Walking distance to UVA and the downtown mall. The space This is a main level (no steps) 2 bedroom 2 bath condo, 2 suites separated by a living room. There is a couch and TV in the living room as well as a Bluetooth speaker. The kitchen is well stocked for those who want to cook. There is a food processor, coffee pot, blender, imersion blender, toaster, electric range and a dishwasher. There is a washer and dryer in a closet off of the kitchen. An iron and ironing board. In addition there is a small patio with a table and chairs. Guest access I have a lock box on the door so you can check in at your leisure after 3 pm. This is not shared you will have the condo to yourselves. There is a gym and pool located in the club house as well as a community room and a business center. There willl be a key fob for the gym on the table as well as an extra key to the condo. Other things to note The HOA limits the rental to graduate students or professionals. Trash is taken to the dumpster located at 9th street exit.

column54: This condo is an incredibly modern gem, offering you a unique atmosphere while overlooking the heart of downtown and views of Mountains. We are sure that from the minute you walk through the door to the very end of your stay, you will be in utter awe of the space, finishes, and thoughtful touches in this condo. The space The large, well-equipped kitchen overlooks the spacious living and dining areas. Unbelievable views can be seen from the large wall of windows that expand from the the living area and into bedroom. The luxe bathroom in the master bedroom will make you never want to leave! This condo sleeps up to 4 guests in the master bedroom and the den. Sleeping Arrangements: Master bedroom - king bed Den - full size pull out *The den does NOT have a door to close You are directly above the Historic Downtown Mall that is bursting with shopping, restaurants, theaters, nightlife, and so much more. You are less than 10 minutes to the beautiful campus of the University of Virginia; this condo puts you in an ideal location for UVA Graduation, Parents Weekend, Alumni Events, football and basketball games. Charlottesville is considered a destination wedding location due to the countless wineries, breweries, rolling hills and farms just on the outskirts of town. The hosts are not located on site, but are in town and will be able to assist you if you ever need us. Please do not hesitate to ask any questions, we are here and happy to help! Guest access There is a private parking garage and your booking includes one parking space in the garage. If you need additional parking, we recommend parking in the Water Street Public Parking Garage which is in easy walking distance to the condo. Other things to note This is access controlled building. You will receive a key card upon check-in. This is a residential condo building with other owners. All guests must be respectful and quiet in the commons areas. Please be mindful of EVERYONE in the building. There is construction going on in and around the building during the week days. This should not hinder on your stay over the weekend, or after 4pm on the weekdays.

column58: Style, location, and comfort. This downtown apartment has it all. At Charlottesville Dreamin', all you need to do is step out your front door and you'll have restaurants, pubs, and all of the downtown shops and amenities at your fingertips. We also provide 1 paid parking space to make your stay even more convenient. The space Charlottesville Dreamin' is ideal for couples, groups, business travelers, families, or groups looking to stay close to all the downtown action. The space is ideal for 4-6 people, but can sleep up to 8 comfortably with 1 King bed, 2 Queens, and 1 Queen Sofa bed. Please note that the apartment is within a building downtown which has other units inside. As it is right downtown, there may be some street noise, which includes the street walk beep. With the bedroom doors closed, the noise is significantly reduced and the sound cant be barely heard, if it all. However, we love our neighborhood and respect our neighbors so we do include a quiet hours policy in our rules of 10:00 pm - 8:00 am. Also for consideration, the unit has a spiral staircase and guests will need to be able to go up these with any luggage to access the apartment. •1 bedroom has 2 queen size Green Tea Memory Foam Mattresses and the other has a King size. Queen Sofa bed as well. •2 Spacious living areas •Full kitchen with cooking essentials and a variety of amenities including coffee and tea provided •Bathrooms come stocked with shampoo/conditioner/body wash and makeup remover •On the Downtown Pedestrian Mall and walkable to Ting Pavillion within 2 minutes •10 minute walk to the Corner and UVA Grounds • 5 minute drive to UVA Hospital • 10 minute drive to Thomas Jefferson Monticello Guest access 1 parking space is provided in the surface lot across the street to the right of the garage. It should be noted that the space is unavailable on Saturdays between 5 am and 2pm for the Charlottesville Farmers Market. The parking pass must be hung in the rearview mirror. It must be left on the entry table upon checkout. If unreturned or lost, a lost fee of $50 will be applied. Other things to note This is an LGBTQIA friendly space and we welcome people from all nationalities, races, cultures, religions, and nuerodiverse backgrounds. Please note that this apartment is in a downtown building**** There are other Airbnb's in the building as well. There is a possibility of some noise levels, but there is a strict quiet hours policy of 10 pm - 7 am. We ask the unit above this one to respect these policies.

column85: 1 Mile from Downtown Mall, 2 miles from UVA, close to shopping, nightlife, and backyard access to walking trails! Perfect for weddings, bachelorette parties, families, and for groups exploring Cville. Our space is ideal for groups that would like to be close to downtown mall and UVA with easy access to highways to vineyards and shopping. Note: there is a basement apt with a separate entrance that is not included in this listing; if you would like full listing, you can find in my profile. The space Basics: 4 Bedrooms (2 Kings, 5 XL Twins), 3 full bathrooms, a large living area, dining room, open kitchen, a large deck, and large backyard. We provide local coffee and snacks. This 4 bedroom house is ideally located a mile from the Downtown mall and two miles from UVA. Our home stands out because we have a lot of space and a large backyard within the city limits. ***While we are excited for you to be in our home for your special occasion, we live on a very quiet and family friendly street and our neighbors do not allow loud noises past 9:30pm, so please consider this when booking. *** This home features a sunny, open kitchen, gas fireplace, back deck overlooking the Rivanna walking trails, and a newly finished basement with its own backyard entrance. We have four young children, so we have a kid-friendly home. We provide coffee, drinks, and snacks! The Main Floor: One of the things that made us fall in love with this house was the open concept of the main floor and all of the natural light that enters through the windows. It is easy to cook a meal in the kitchen while watching the game in the living room! One of the guest rooms is off of the kitchen and has a King-sized bed and a full bathroom attached to it. There is an open living room with huge, comfy couches, a dining area with a table that can fit 12, and a kitchen that are all open. The upstairs: The master bedroom has a king-sized bed, a XL twin-sized bed, and an attached master bathroom. The view outside the master bedroom is of the mountain that Monticello sits on! There are two guest bedrooms on the top floor--both with two twin XL-sized beds. There is another full bathroom and a washer and dryer on this floor. The backyard: The backyard is great because it is unusually large for a house being inside the Cville city limits. It's perfect for lawn games or some touch-football. We have a grill on our back deck (which is off of the main level) and the yard is perfect for a group BBQ or one of the lawn games we provide (corn hole, bocce ball, and croquet). Guest access Please help yourself to all necessary linens, toiletries, etc., which will be laid out for you upon arrival. In addition, you will have access to all diningware, spices, and cooking needs. Other things to note NO PARTIES: As a home in a residential neighborhood, we ask that only you and the listed guests spend time in our home during your stay (unless given special permission). Please be respectful of our neighbors by moving any activities indoors by 9:30pm and not playing loud music indoors after then. We have great neighbors, but they are very sensitive to noises since the houses are close together. BACHELORETTE PARTY RULES: While our above house policy states that there are no parties" allowed

column62: Description Hollymead House is a historic Inn in Charlottesville celebrating 50 years. Last purchased in 2018, underwent a 3 year restoration and re-opened in April, 2021. A luxurious stay of casual elegance, many amenities for a pampered stay. Close to wineries, breweries, UVa, Historic venues, downtown Charlottesville, hiking. New Owners and innkeepers are UVa graduate Pam and William who live on-property. The space Room #4, The Runk Room, is located on the second floor of the Guesthouse and is named after the fourth and last owner of Hollymead farm. “Dee” Runk was also the Dean of Men at UVa. Our only KING bed, we’ve chosen luxurious Villa di Lusso linens, duvets, pillows and bath towels. Long basket weave bathrobes. The GuestHouse includes 4 individual bedrooms/bathrooms, with a brick patio and comfortable furniture. Inside the Main home, guests may use the Garden Room to have coffee and light continental breakfast, and the Library for relaxing, reading, a game of checkers, chess or backgammon. Other downstairs public rooms which have been restored are also available to our guests. Our friendly cat lives in the Main home with us. Guest access Guests will have their own set of keys to the Guesthouse and their individual room. You are welcome to enjoy any of the outside areas, including patio, porch and seating areas. In the Main home, our downstairs public rooms which have been restored, are also available to our guests. During your stay We can be as present or as invisible as you require. We live on the property so we are easily available. We are very knowledgeable about the area and happy to recommend things to do in Charlottesville and the surrounding counties. Other things to note This is a smoke-free and pet-free property. Each bedroom suits one or two adults.

column79: Architecturally designed, downtown mall The space The space An architecturally designed and renovated 4BR, 2.5 BA red brick hhouse with a modern inside feel. Nestled on a quiet street in an established residential neighborhood, it is just a few minutes walk to Charlottesville's downtown pedestrian mall. The ground floor has an open floor design. In it is our chef's kitchen -- with a long white concrete countertop, fully stocked with kitchenware and all-clad cookware -- which is open to the living room and to the dining room.

Surrounded by lush woods scattered with wild plum trees and a small pond this large family home is full of rustic charm and has plenty of space for guests to spread out inside and out. This fairytale home was custom built with repurposed materials over many years resulting in a cozy rural retreat with plenty of character. The space As you arrive at Hidden Plum Hollow you will be greeted by the beautiful stonework of dry stacked walls and endless patios. Once you reach the front door you will enter the entry hall which houses a large pantry and leads to the open plan kitchen/dining room. In the kitchen/dining room you will find a massive dining table next to the stone fireplace. There is a seating area and bar island for those who want to gather in the kitchen. The kitchen is fully stocked for your cooking needs with a microwave, toaster, blender, drip coffee maker and more. Moving through the house you will find the cozy living room with cabin walls and a wood stove. There is a smart tv with numerous streaming capabilities. Attached to the living room is the sunroom which is great for a morning yoga session or just sitting with a coffee and enjoying the surrounding scenery. Downstairs there are two shared full bathrooms, one with a shower and one with a tub/shower combo and the laundry room with a washer and dryer for your convenience. You will also find Bedroom 4 (queen bed) and Bedroom 5 (full bed) downstairs. Moving up the twisting staircase you will come to a light filled foyer with two desks. There is fiber internet throughout the house. One side of the foyer leads to a hallway with a small seating area and a shared full bathroom. This bathroom is shared by Bedroom 2 (king bed) and Bedroom 3 (full bed). The other side of the foyer leads to the large master Bedroom 1 which has its own full private bathroom as well as a pull out sofa bed. There are individual heating and air conditioning units in every shared living space as well as every bedroom with the exception of bedroom 3. Returning down the stairs and out the side door onto the side porch, you will find a huge patio. The patio has multiple seating options, a fire pit, a charcoal grill and outdoor dining area. Beyond the side patio is a large lawn. There is a path from the patio which leads to the small pond at the bottom of the hill. The pond is shared with one family, with young children and a friendly golden doodle, who lives next door. There are also countless paths throughout the woods for running, walks, birdwatching, and forest bathing.

column50: We are located in Waynesboro next to Ridgeview Park and the South River. The park has tennis courts as well as a children’s playground and an outdoor swimming pool. We are a 10 minute drive to the Blue Ridge Parkway and Shenandoah NP, for wonderful scenery and hiking. The space The apartment is upstairs with access through the front door with a keypad. There are 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a living room, dining area with a kitchenette. A microwave, coffeemaker, kettle, refrigerator and sink are all provided with china and cutlery for 4 people The smaller bathroom has a bathtub and the larger one a walk in shower, both with grab bars. A washing machine and dryer are available, located off the larger bathroom. A patio with BBQ is available with outdoor furniture, for your private use. Guest access The apartment as described and side patio. are for your private use. You are welcome to share other areas of the garden. Other things to note The AC is provided through window units. These are very efficient but may seem a little noisy. Both bedrooms have ceiling fans.

column48: This is the coolest little efficiency in downtown Charlottesville. It's really ideal for a couple but there is a single size bunk bed if you're bringing along the third wheel. Although it'll take some climbing so make sure the third wheel isn't too squeaky. This place is great for walking to the mall and not having to drive afterwards. Central to everything around. The space There is a small grassy area out front and one parking space for one vehicle. Guest access This is an efficiency so there is access to the unit and the area directly out front. Short walking distance to the mall. Other things to note This house is downtown and on a busy street. I have provided off street parking but it is important to be careful when pulling in and out. And to park in the designated spot illustrated in the photos. The parking on the right is for the upstairs tenant. PLEASE BE CAREFUL when entering and exiting. Be looking for bikers and pedestrians as well as cars. Otherwise, there is street parking a block East down McIntyre Rd. Also, there is street noise because the house is downtown. Out of dozens of guests only one or two have complained but if you are sensitive to urban street noise, this place may not be for you. Although in my opinion it is negligible. Have fun. Enjoy!

column76: Welcome to the Glass Hollow Cottage! Come make yourself at home and enjoy the rustic charm of our custom hand-built cottage. A perfect getaway for a couple or friends who want a 1-of a-kind destination. Adventure and R & R await you!!! Enjoy the well stocked kitchen & the bright, clean, cheery ambience.... everything you need to feel at home & then some. Prime location: Just minutes to Rt. 151/Brew Ridge Trail, dozens of popular wineries/breweries, Wintergreen Resort & Shenandoah Nat. Park. The space Come relax in style and find peace and serenity in our little slice of paradise. Location is key in our cute chic cottage, tucked in a beautiful hollow in the heart of Nelson County. The cottage is a dreamy space for a couple, Friends or solo traveler. (We do not allow children here, as we find the steep spiral staircase a bit much for wee-little peeps.) The whole place was thoughtfully crafted, from the wood of an old Appalachian barn that once stood on the property. You will find many special touches throughout, like big wooden beams, a spiral staircase, hand built tables milled from wood on our land, super-comfy bed with high quality linens and local landscape photos throughout, taken by Kate, your host. The cottage is cozy, yet open and spacious, with a lot of natural lighting and infused with love & care. Situated on a 25 acre sanctuary in the mountains, at the base of the famous Humpback Rocks. A perfect setting & escape for those who want to bask in the outdoors and enjoy all this area has to offer. After your days adventures, kick your feet up & feel right at home! Let your cares melt away! Sip your coffee or wine from the porch swing or watch the grazing cows out the kitchen window. Gaze at the stars & roast a smore from your own private campfire. The 720 square foot cottage is ideal for 2 adults, with a cozy bedroom sleeping loft. (3rd person can sleep on the couch or there is a nice twin blow up mattress available.) Features of the Cottage: -Access to the entire private cottage -Patio with gas grill for cook outs & dining table -Private cozy porch w/ porch swing & rocking chairs -Heated radiant flooring throughout first floor~“cozy feet, what a treat” -A Shower or soak in the tub -Private campfire area-Bring your own firewood -Cottage herb garden (thyme, basil, sage, rosemary, mint & cherry tomatoes~ while in season) -Fully stocked and equipped kitchen -Great tasting pure, filtered mountain well water -Extremely safe neighborhood -Free parking for 2-3 cars -Office space with views -Whole foods delivery right to the door Enjoy the outdoors & local destinations: -In the hub of Nelson County & Brew Ridge Trail" -Literally just minutes to many award winning breweries

column50: This 1-bed, 1-bath vacation rental is calling - your next couple's retreat awaits! With panoramic vistas and private hilltop digs, this historic Faber cabin is well worth a visit. Enjoy a good night's rest in the private loft, then wake up to overlook acres of terraced vines. Explore the grounds at your leisure, or indulge a private tasting with a local sommelier at one of the many area wineries. You'll also find loads of countryside charm nearby, and a day trip away, Shenandoah National Park! The space Built in 1870 | Stunning Lake & Vineyard Views | 320-Acre Winery Dreamy, romantic, and utterly unique, this peaceful countryside stay will make for the perfect anniversary celebration, girls weekend, or wine connoisseur’s escape! Bedroom (Loft): Queen Bed VINEYARD LIVING: Covered porch w/ porch swings, 2-person dining set, hilltop patio HISTORIC LOG CABIN: Smart TV, wood-burning fireplace, dining table, rocking chairs, books, wood beam ceilings & flooring, farmhouse decor & antique furnishings KITCHEN: Fully equipped, cooking basics, dishware & flatware, drip coffee maker, toaster oven GENERAL: Free WiFi (strong signal), towels/linens, hair dryer, trash bags/paper towels, central heating & air conditioning FAQ: Exterior security camera (driveway-facing), not suitable for children (property is located on a vineyard), stairs required PARKING: Driveway (2 vehicles), free street parking (first-come, first-served) Guest access Guests will have access to the entire property via self check-in Other things to note - No smoking - No pets allowed - No events, parties, or gatherings - Must be at least 30 years old to book - Additional fees and taxes may apply - Photo ID may be required upon check-in - NOTE: Your safety matters. This property features 1 exterior camera, pointed at the driveway. The camera does not look into any interior spaces - NOTE: The property is not suitable for children due to the fact that it is located on a vineyard and is designed as a romantic getaway for adults - NOTE: This property requires stairs for home and bedroom access and may be difficult for guests with limited mobility - NOTE: Please do not contact the Delfosse Vineyards and Winery for property information

column88: Soak up all that Mother Nature has to offer surrounded by the trees of Shenandoah National Park, in our farmhouse nestled in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. This spacious, child and dog friendly home is a perfect place to escape and reconnect. Hike, explore the nearby vineyards, or just relax on the porch. Set on 4 acres of private land with creek access, there is no shortage of fun to be had! The space We love hosting and are always excited to be able to share this peaceful place. When you enter: you will find a spacious foyer, a half bathroom, and a washer & dryer. Turn the corner and you're in our full kitchen, equipped with everything a budding chef would need. The dining room has a table for 6 and a record player with our small collection of vinyl. Cross the hallway into the living room which has a wood burning stove, TV with Roku for streaming, DVD collection, board games, and a dog bed. Upstairs is the master bedroom with king bed, large closet & en-suite full bathroom. There are also two queen bedrooms; one with a handmade bed, hanging chair and large closet space. The other has the largest closet, wonderful handmade touches, desk space & a gorgeous view. The last room on this floor is the family bathroom with bath & shower. The bedrooms and bathrooms should have everything you need for a relaxing getaway, including all sheets and linens. We love to sit on the porch with a morning coffee or evening wine from a local winery and just enjoy all of natures noises, sounds & lights. We also have a garage loaded with outdoor games, lawn furniture, and a charcoal grill. There are two fire pits, a hammock, an outdoor dining area in the backyard, and lots of space to explore! Firewood is provided. We now have high speed fiber internet that was just installed recently, with 100mbps download and upload speeds! —— Shenandoah National Park is a stones throw away and can be reached in about 20 minutes to the Swift Run Gap Entrance. We have plenty of hiking maps & info booklets around the house. We are surrounded by vineyards and wineries, 5 of which are 10-20 minutes away, but even more if you want to venture farther. Some other places you might want to visit: Massanutten Resort (skiing, waterpark, golf): ~35 minutes Charlottesville, the University of Virginia, Monticello: 35-40 minutes Harrisonburg and James Madison University: 40-45 minutes. Luray Caverns: 1 hour Guest access You will have full access to the entire house, with total privacy. Nobody else lives or stays on the property. The farmhouse is set on 4 acres of land with a hammock, swing, two fire pits and plenty of room for outdoor games. There is also access to the creek, which is located just across the private road and up a short trail. Other things to note The house is located on a private gravel road with a gate. It can be bumpy and steep in spots, but any vehicle should be able to navigate it. There is ample parking space at the house. Up to 2 pets at a time can stay, and must be up to date on tick & flea preventative care. There is a $40 fee per stay (not per day), to help account for the extra time it takes to clean after a pet has stayed. We have yet to encounter anyone who has not been able to get cell phone reception at the house, so you should have at least some reception regardless of your carrier. You're welcome to have visitors during your stay, but please no overnight guests or parties.

The front porch has Adirondack chairs perfect for lazy evenings and morning coffee. The back yard has a small deck under oak trees and a patio next to a fern garden.

column71: Private mountain retreat 3 miles from Lovingston, VA situated halfway between Charlottesville and Lynchburg. Wintergreen resort is just 20 minutes away! There are an abundance of wineries, breweries, distilleries, and orchards within minutes going any direction. A beautiful ,well appointed home on the mountainside where you will enjoy stunning views, great hiking trails, and quiet nights! The space One of the most unique houses in the area, you will be greeted by a custom staircase serving multiple living space levels (an upper and lower living room) built with post and beam. For sleeping you will find two queen master bedrooms with en suites and sitting areas as well as a twin bedroom that shares a large bathroom with the living space. The kitchen dining area is an open concept with a side seating area and plenty of space for dining. Outside, a large deck allows for a great shaded gathering space any time of the day. Guest access Being in the mountains, you should be prepared for steep terrain. 4WD is not necessary, but access to the primary parking area is up a fairly steep slope on a gravel driveway. Getting around Nelson county requires transportation. Other things to note This house is on 96 private acres deep in the woods on the side of Simpson's Mountain. We are located in the midst of many types of creatures...some that stay outside and some that like to come in. While we work very hard to keep the environment controlled with constant routine pest management, it is not unusual to see a ladybug, cricket, or even a spider in the house. You may also run across the occasional snake outdoors. If you have an aversion to any of these things, this place may not be the best suited for you.
