column78: This luxurious Keswick guest house was exquisitely renovated in 2021 to provide comfortable elegance and luxury in a quiet country setting. The guest house is located 6 miles from downtown Charlottesville, in close proximity to multiple vineyards and breweries, and within walking distance to Keswick Hall and the acclaimed Jean Georges restaurant. The gorgeous new heated pool is ready for you to enjoy on this quiet and luxurious property with easy access to all things Charlottesville! The space Attached to the back of the property's main house, this luxurious guest house is completely secluded, with a private entrance and parking. You enter through the updated and fully equipped kitchenette which includes a microwave, half fridge, dishwasher and stove to meet your cooking needs. The living room includes a convertible couch that is perfect for children or an additional guest, as well as a dining table for two. This large space can be closed off from the kitchen, making it private and quiet from the rest of the cottage. Walk up one flight of stairs to enjoy a beautifully appointed desk space on the French windowed landing of the second floor. The second floor bedroom (with blackout curtains to ensure the best night's sleep!) features a queen size bed, as we all a trundle bed that comfortably sleeps two additional guests if needed during your stay. The full renovated bathroom is also located on the second floor and offers beautiful views of the countryside. This historic property was originally developed in 1788 as a tavern/Inn. The property was a center for regional travel, mail, and voting during America’s early days. Distinguished figures including Marquis de Lafayette stopped at the tavern on their way to visit Thomas Jefferson at Monticello. The property was converted to a home in the mid-1800s. This luxurious guest house has been updated several times to serve as a cozy and attractive guest lodging. Its bucolic setting and privacy make it the perfect location for a relaxing getaway. Guest access Please note the pool is a shared space available to the other guests staying on the property. The pool is available for use between the hours of 930 am and 6pm. The pool is gated and will be locked at all other times. The pool is open and available for use for the months of May through September. Other things to note *Please note that the height of the shower is 6'2

column78: Nestled in a quiet cul de sac next to a city park and pool, our home is a short walk from the unique Downtown Mall, great bars and eateries, and a lovely river trail for recreation. A short drive from UVa., Monticello, and all that Charlottesville has to offer. The Blue Ridge Mountains, Ash-Lawn, Montpelier, Wintergreen, the many vineyards and breweries are all about a half hour drive from our house. Our location offers easy access to all that our beautiful and historic region offers. The space Our house has an open floor plan. The living room, kitchen and dining room surround the stairs that go up to the second floor. There are no walls between these rooms, making it very easy to cook and hang out together. There is a stereo (with an aux in cable for phones) with speakers in both the living room and kitchen. The two bedrooms feel very private, as they are up on the second floor, separated by a hallway and bathroom. The living room couch can be turned into a third double bed. There are two full bathrooms, one upstairs and one downstairs; both have a shower/tub. Off the kitchen is a good sized screened in deck that overlooks our large backyard, far below. Guest access The key is in a lock-box outside, so you can come and go as you please. Look on the post to your right at eye level as you step onto the porch. The combination is the last four digits of your cell number. Other things to note This is a beautiful home that we live in most of the year. We airbnb it when we go on vacation. So it is fully furnished and easy to be in. The kitchen has all the appointments (stove, oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, blender, toaster oven and a double sink) and utensils, oils, and spices you might want. We do not own a TV, so bring a computer if you would like to watch something together. Your computer can be connected to the stereo for a great sound system.

column82: Welcome to Cook's Cabin, an updated family/group friendly home on a 2.5-acre hillside in Virginia wine country. We offer a 12pm check-in and 12pm checkout so you can relax & make the most of your mountain adventure. We provide many essentials including tea, coffee & filters, paper towels, toilet paper, firewood, 50amp EV and more. You'll love the private & tranquil setting with no neighbors in sight. Relax on the covered front porch or enjoy the firepit out back! We look forward to hosting you! The space Welcome to our peaceful hillside cabin! Our place is fully updated inside and sits high above the road to offer full privacy from any neighbors. You'll find 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms: 1) King room w/ attached full bath 2) Queen bed (shared full bath in hallway) 3) Queen bed (shared full bath in hallway) 4) Twin over Full Bunk w/ attached full bath on lower level The main floor includes a fully stocked kitchen w/ granite countertops & stainless-steel appliances, table seating for 8 plus bar seating and a morning coffee sitting area. The main level living room offers a giant sectional couch, electric fireplace, 55 Roku Smart TV and a supply of books & puzzles. The lower level includes the twin over full bedroom and offers a large tv/game room

column78: Glenbrae is located just off the iconic Nelson 151 and 1 mile from Afton Mountain Vineyards. This property was stylishly decorated by a local interior designer and is the perfect getaway for a group of friends, family, or couples traveling together. Along with its 5 spacious bedrooms, large living area, and Peloton, this property also has beautiful mountain views. Halfway between Wintergreen and Charlottesville you can be at either in under 30 min. The space Glenbrae is located just off the iconic Nelson 151 and 1 mile from Afton Mountain Vineyards. This property was stylishly decorated by a local interior designer and is the perfect getaway for a group of friends, family, or couples traveling together. Along with its 5 spacious bedrooms, large living area, and Peloton, this property also has beautiful mountain views. Halfway between Wintergreen and Charlottesville you can be at either in under 30 min. MAIN FLOOR: OFFICE - Peloton (cages provided - just bring your sneakers and you won't have to clip in!), desk, office chair, bookshelves, two chairs for additional seating. BEDROOM 1 - Queen bed, bench, sconce lights with charging ports, side tables, smart TV, and closet with hangers. BEDROOM 5 (MASTER) - King bed, desk/vanity with chair and mirror, smart TV, side tables with lamps, loveseat, and walk-in closet with hangers. column72: Enjoy a comfortable stay in a great location! Spacious and comfy basement apartment in quiet neighborhood with close access to shopping, great restaurants, and other local gems! The space The basement apartment has a spacious living room with a television and coffee bar. There's a well stocked kitchen and dining area for easy cooking and nights staying in relaxing. The cozy bedroom sleeps dark and dreamy with a full bathroom just a few steps away. Two people will be a perfect fit for this space but it's roomy enough for 4 friends. We have a deep couch for sleeping that our friends rave about and can supply you with a queen air mattress for your extra guests if you request it. We also have a twin floor mattress that we are happy to provide! Just let us know and we will have it all ready for you. *You won't have access to heating/air control but we try our best to keep it comfortable. There's a ceiling fan in the bedroom and a portable fan provided for your comfort during summer. Please note that during the winter months the basement is naturally more cool. We do our very best to keep our guests comfortable and are still learning what temps equal comfortable in each season. Each of our guests are also very different! A heater is also provided for the bedroom so you can be warm and toasty :) Our comfy living room has a TV with a roku box and lots of streaming channels available to you, such as- Netflix, Disney +, Amazon Prime, etc. In the living room is a delightful coffee bar ready for you to make coffee or tea. The kitchen has a refrigerator, stove top, sink, microwave, and convection oven. We've tried to think of basic supplies to have on hand incase you desire a night of cooking in. The dining room table seats 4 but the bar in the kitchen has a perfect space for 2. Our backyard has a tree swing and two chairs under the patio for relaxing in the shade. We'd love to have you come enjoy our great space!! Guest access You'll have easy parking for one car in our driveway as well as free parking along our street. There's a private entrance for you with keyless entry for your convenience. Other things to note It’s important to note that we live in the home above our basement apartment. We have three beautiful babes, 6, 9, and 11. The youngest is learning how to use his “quiet feet.” We do our best to keep quiet while guests are with us but you will hear some foot steps from time to time. We also have a gentle giant of a dog who you might hear bark if someone rings the door bell. Let us know if you love dogs. He's super friendly and loves to meet new friends! Our fenced backyard is available to you and the swing is a nice resting spot our guests may use but we ask that you please not use the trampoline.

column76: Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located home -- just a 10-minute drive to both UVA and Martha Jefferson hospitals! The home is also just a 5-minute walk to the Downtown Mall, the historic heart of Charlottesville, a pedestrian avenue lined with shops, restaurants, theaters, and museums. In the other direction, it's just a 3-minute walk to downtown Belmont, home to some of the best restaurants in town. The space Built in 1930, this cozy cottage has plenty of updated historic charm. There are 2 queen bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms downstairs. Upstairs is an open loft with 2 more twin beds, plenty of storage, and a sunny space to work from home. Important: The two queen bedrooms are connected. So you will have to walk through the front bedroom to get out of the back bedroom. This home is great for families and couples, but not for unrelated adults. The home is pet-friendly with a fenced front yard. Enjoy free street parking, laundry in the house, a well-equipped kitchen, cozy dining room, and a comfortable living room with a TV. We recently installed 5 wall mini-splits, so each room can be perfectly temperature-controlled with modern, quiet technology. Guest access The whole house is yours! A quiet couple live in the separate basement apartment underneath the house. Other things to note Pets are most welcome. We charge a one-time $95 pet fee. Please ask us about an early check in if needed; we can often accommodate this. We do charge a $50 early check in fee.

column58: Newly constructed 1 bedroom and bathroom with private entrance situated within a 5 minute drive of UVA in a quiet wooded neighborhood. Less than 10 minutes to downtown Charlottesville and convenient to highway for easy access. Suite includes full bath, plush queen size memory foam mattress, large sectional sofa, entertainment center with electric fireplace and Apple TV. Other amenities include: coffee bar, mini fridge, microwave, iron and hair dryer. The space The guest suite was constructed in mid 2022 on the lower level of the home, situated in a wooded community, surrounded by lush forests frequented by deer and other wildlife. Situated just a few minutes from UVA and downtown Charlottesville and very convenient to to major roads including I-64, Rt 29 and 250 bypass make it perfect for weekends in the Charlottesville area to visit Shenandoah National Park, Weddings, vineyards, breweries and football or other sporting events. Comfortable living room area with large sectional sofa and 65” 4K tv perfect for relaxing or enjoying a movie night. Smart TV and Apple TV provided to stream your favorite steaming subscriptions to (bring your login and passwords). Electric fireplace provides ambience and visual warmth to the space. For those looking to warm up the space, it will provide some heat with the click of a button. All lights on dimmers to set to your preferences. Convenient USB charging ports are available in the bases of lamps. A brand new plush memory foam mattress with luxury linens will provide a restful stay. The new bathroom features a standup shower with large shower head and ample lighting. Soft towels, natural soaps and slippers will help complete the spa like feel for your trip. Coffee, light snacks and soft drinks are included for your enjoyment! If you have any specific requests, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate. Guest access Entire lower level minus the use of larger storage areas are available for your use. A patio with 2 chairs and small table are available outside for enjoying morning coffee, relaxing and watching trains go by. Driveway parking is available in the area closest to the house in the marked spaces. Other things to note Note: TV is a smart TV and there is an Apple TV device to use your streaming subscriptions of choice! Please bring your username and passwords. No local channels or cable at this time!
column65: Modern Farmhouse Private Suite in Charlottesville

column59: A great country home in beautiful Albemarle County! Gives the feeling of complete privacy, peace and seclusion while still only being 15 mins drive to HollyMeade Shopping Center (Target, Harris Teeter, Bonefish Grill etc) and CHO Airport and only 25 mins to Downtown Charlottesville and UVA Grounds (campus). You are also a 15 minute drive from the Swift Rung Gap Entrance Station to Shenandoah National Park and Skyline Drive. There are 4 wineries within a 10 minute drive (one is only 4 mins!). The space There is a nice front porch with beautiful Mountain Views, a huge grass backyard with nice swing set, 3 fire pit areas with comfy outdoor seating areas. There is also a small river on the property so you can hear water running and are welcome to swim or fish in when it's deep. (The depth fluctuates depending on rainfall and season) There are 3 acres of yard with a small back deck and 3 different firepit areas with comfortable seating! Also the front covered porch is nice to sit on and view the mountains. One of the firepits is gas, the others are for burning wood. There is Corn Hole set for you to play and a Charcoal Grill and Smoker! Other things to note As you may lose cell service when you get close to the place, please make sure you take a screenshot of the check-in info and WiFi password beforehand. Firewood, charcoal, lighter fluid, propane or other fire starters are not provided. If you would like to use the firepits or charcoal grill, please bring all the supplies you would need for this. One firepit is gas powered and uses a refillable propane tank. If this tank is empty and you wish to use this firepit, you are welcome to bring the empty tank to a local propane tank retailer to switch out for a full tank and reinstall. If firepits or charcoal grill are used by guest, you are responsible for cleaning them after use so it's ready for next guest. The cleaning crew does not clean firepits or grill. As it is a rural location, DSL internet service is the only option available. While fast enough for most all normal WiFi purposes, DSL is lower speed than normal cable internet offered in the city. I want guests to be able to check-in as early as possible. Due to the large amount of linens to be laundered between guests and the short amount of time do it, the washer/dryer will often have linens in them so that another load can run after cleaner leaves. You are welcome to use the washer/dryer, but will sometimes have to take out a load in order to do so. If you specifically know you will use the washer/dryer during your stay and don't want to have to do this, please let me know prior to check-in and I'll tell my cleaner to leave them empty for you. Only the number of guests that you book for are allowed on the property at any time. If you would like to increase your guest count, the nightly rate may go up and you would need to pay this difference. Pets are allowed with a $100 fee per each pet for stays of 4 nights or fewer (pet fee will be greater for stays over 4 nights so please ask before booking if you'd like to check the longer stay pet fee amount). You MUST let me know about any pets in your welcome AirBnB message. *Pet fee is to be paid after booking. Pet fee is NOT included in the booking price that AirBnB collects, whether or not you mark pets in the reservation.* I ask you to NOT let pets on any furniture or beds and to pick up any waste in the yard. PLEASE READ HOUSE RULES BEFORE BOOKING

column68:
Getaway to a tranquil, rejuvenating respite at our family farm where y’all can treasure ultimate privacy.

Ground level. SOLID: cinder block stucco offers a cozy abode with French doors opening up to an outdoor kitchen. 
Our sheep graze the yard.
Buebirds flutter.  
Peepers creak.  
Red tails call. 
Eagles soar. 
Crows & ravens meet up.
Crickets chirp. standingtrees sway. doe•ram•me is here.

The entire ground level of the “doll house” is available for guests.
Walks are encouraged throughout the farm.
All dogs must be on lead at all times.

Our Shepard.Herder.Sherpa el meets & greets each guest personally.  Feel free to use the AURBNB app or text her directly.

This is a working farm & private residence.  Please consider booking a WALKABOUT WITH JUNIOR: 

https://abnb.me/NDIOTgNKEpb

doe.ram.me is a herd of mixed goats: Alpine, Boar, Nigerian Pygmy and Nubian.  We are blooming our flock -fat tail KARAKUL- a heritage breed & oldest domesticated sheep alongside boarding equines.  
We do horse yoga. We do PEMF.
Come restore & rejuvenate as you heal with our equine friends therapeutically finding a rhythm and singing with the land.
Book a hands-on-deck day in the life of a Shepard.Herder.Sherpa.
Hug a “dog with wings.”
Spot and hear a Red Tail, Crow or Coopers Hawk.  It is an honor to share sacred land of OUR CREATOR.
The Land is a Living Canvas :
TEND • MEND • SHARE

column70: A completely renovated 1940's cottage with 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in the heart of Charlottesville. Conveniently situated near UVA's Scott Stadium, John Paul Jones Arena, the Downtown Mall with great restaurants and unique shopping, and Wegmans grocery store. Relax on the rooftop deck and get a bird's eye view of the large backyard. Explore the many nearby wineries and breweries. This home may be in the city, but from the backyard it feels like being in the country. Private driveway parking. Guest access The main house, which is gray, is for our guests. The white house is an ADU which is home to my assistant property manager, David. The houses are separated by an enclosed breezeway and each house has its own private entrance and driveway. Guests may park in the driveway on the left which goes straight to the screened porch where you can easily access the main house. For any overflow parking, guests may park in the driveway on the right.

column85: Enjoy the entire home to yourself, including a relaxing backyard retreat with hot tub. Perfect for singles or couples who want to stay home and relax or visit the sites then come home to enjoy the hot tub under the stars. 10 min drive to shopping; 10 min to Blue Ridge Parkway & Skyline Drive; 15 min to 151 Breweries. kayaking/canoeing/hiking/fishing on the beautiful South River. The space Kick back and unwind in our cute 2-bedroom bungalow home with large hot tub conveniently located just 2 minutes away to downtown Waynesboro. Our property features excellent top-of-the-line amenities and a spacious, fully fenced landscaped backyard – perfect for pet owners! Ready to explore the great outdoors? You’re in luck – a plethora of beautiful hiking trails, mountain ranges and national parks are at your fingertips. Wait no longer! We guarantee to maximize your rest and relaxation, so book your next stay with us! Get ready to enjoy a slice of this beautiful mountainous paradise! At 826 square feet, this ideal vacation spot is the perfect getaway destination for solo travellers, business travellers, couples,, friends, small families and can comfortably accommodate up to 4 people. Step inside and take in the fun vibes of our professionally decorated interior, with colorful artful décor and modern furnishings adding that extra “adorable” character to the space. As you walk past the entrance, you will be greeted with the spacious living room and cozy dining room area, with windows bringing in generous natural light to the space. If you decide to dine in, have peace of mind that a suite of high-quality tools and appliances are readily available for you to cook a perfect dinner in our fully stocked kitchen. This includes silverware, dishes, cookware, and appliances. Additionally, enjoy watching your favorite movies and TV shows including Netflix and Amazon Prime on our large smart TV in the charismatic ambience of the living room. Get ready to sleep on cloud 9 – both bedrooms contain comfy mattresses with hotel quality linens and soft, fluffy pillows to ensure a good night's sleep. Fully equipped bathroom with towels and toiletries for your convenience. At days end, relax in the jet pack technology bullfrog spa. Keep reading to learn more inspiring details and book your trip to Waynesboro, Virginia today! Private Patio & Garden: Enjoy direct access to our patio and manicured backyard – fully fenced and enclosed with outdoor furniture, BBQ grill, a waterfall fountain feature, and an inviting hot tub. A perfect place to spend a relaxing evening with family and friends. Guest access Full access to entire home, fenced in yard and hot tub.

column69: Hillside Haven is conveniently located in Faber, VA with easy access to the Nelson 151 corridor, Charlottesville, and the quaint town of Scottsville. Enjoy the mountain view from the spacious deck or firepit (both with plenty of seating for your whole group), or head out to explore local hiking trails, breweries, or wineries. This space was recently updated and has all of the modern amenities you need for your next getaway. The space Hillside Haven is conveniently located in Faber, VA with easy access to the Nelson 151 corridor, Charlottesville, and the quaint town of Scottsville. Enjoy the mountain view from the spacious deck or firepit (both with plenty of seating for your whole group), or head out to explore local hiking trails, breweries, or wineries. This space was recently updated and has all of the modern amenities you need for your next getaway. Hillside Haven is located at the top of a paved, steep driveway. Please note that 4WD or AWD will be needed in the event of snow during the winter months. Hillside Haven is one-level living and is broken down below: LIVING ROOM - Sleeper Sofa, Smart TV (please login to your own streaming services), armchair with ottoman, chair, and entertainment stand. KITCHEN - Fully stocked kitchen with all major appliances (including dishwasher), electric glass top range, and brand new walnut butcherblock countertops (please be kind to them!), bar with two stools, eat-in dining area set for 4, though there are 6 chairs available. BATHROOM 1 - Full bathroom with combination shower/tub. BEDROOM 1 (MASTER) - King bed, two nightstands with lamps, dresser, smart TV, and closet. BATHROOM 2 (MASTER) - Full bathroom with new tiled walk-in shower. BEDROOM 2 - Queen bed with nightstand, lamp, and closet. Note: This bedroom does have an exterior door with access to the deck. BEDROOM 3 - 2 twin beds, dresser, nightstand, 2 lamps, and closet. OUTSIDE - Large deck with outdoor dining furniture for 6, front porch also has seating for 2, firepit with Adirondack chairs for 6. NOTE - There is a small pond in the backyard that is about 1.5 feet deep. Please watch your small children around it! Firewood is not always provided (many guests leave some behind), so please plan ahead if you plan to use this amenity. Guest access Guests will have complete privacy during their time at Hilltop Haven. The owner's sibling does own the bordering property, so you may see his truck in the distance down the hill with his camper from time to time. Other things to note There is an exterior Ring camera mounted on the side of the house facing the driveway. As noted above, AWD or 4WD may be necessary in the winter months. We do have the driveway plowed, as needed. There is a small pond in the backyard that is about 1-2 feet in depth. Please watch your small children! Firewood is not always provided (many guests leave some behind), so please plan ahead if you plan to use this amenity.
column76: Hillside Haven: Modern Retreat, Mountain Views

column71: Luxury townhouse located 10 min from downtown Charlottesville and UVA. 10 min to Monticello, Wine vineyards, 5th street station(Wegmans, restaurants, theater, etc.), Carter Mountain and hiking trails. Monthly rental only. Must sign a contract each month for monthly stay. WOMEN only. Perfect for traveling nurses, business people, techs or doctors. The space Modern, comfortable, luxurious, spacious, tall ceilings and lots of windows. Nice deck off kitchen. There are partial mountain views from the deck and upstairs windows. The second floor includes: - living room, dining room, full kitchen, laundry area and deck. - Living room has a 85 inch tv screen with Amazon Prime, Disney and Netflix streaming services. - The kitchen is fully equipped to cook meals for yourself. There is full, shared access to refrigerator and pantry. Please remember that household rules state quiet time is between 11 pm and 10 am. No loud music etc. Townhouse walls can be a bit thin and the neighbors will complain if you play loud music after 11 pm. *** The map shows the location of the house at Lake Monticello. This is incorrect! It is a new subdivision and some GPS apps have not caught up! The street address is 3603 Moffat St, Charlottesville, VA 22902. Fun things to do: - A tour of Monticello- President Thomas Jefferson’s historic home is a must see. There are several good vineyards to go to as well in this area. During the busy season – fall, summer and spring it is best to call and get a reservation at this UNESCO World Heritage Site. During the holiday season Monticello is decked out with traditional colonial decorations -US president James Monroe Highland and US President James Madison historic homes are also very good. There are wonderful vineyards in these locations as well. - Carter’s Mountain up the street is near Monticello is a very popular destination. - the Farmers market(spring through fall only)on the downtown mall is amazing! - My personal favorite vineyards are Pipin Hill Farm and vineyard, Dave Matthew’s Blenheim Vineyard, Albemarle Estate at Trump vineyard. Barborsville vineyard is great too and is near James Monroe historic home. - There is good hiking in and around Charlottesville. There are too many places to list, but a convenient, nearby trail is Saunders-Monticello trail which is very nice. -Touring UVA/Thomas Jefferson’s Rotunda. Reservations required, but worth it! Restaurants: There are many good restaurants in Charlottesville. Here are some of the most popular, local spots: Breakfast: There are many breakfast places available. Bodo’s bagels is a favorite. Lunch: Red Hub Barbecue(parking is difficult, but worth it), Wayside takeout, Mezeh mediterranean grill, Poke Sushi, Mellow mushroom pizza, Monsonsoon Siam(Thai), Milan(Indian). Any of the sushi places on the downtown mall are excellent. There are also chain restaurants: Chipotle, Panerra etc. *** Near Pipin Hill Farms is a pizza place called Dr. Ho’s which serves up some of the best pizza in town. If you want to do just wine tasting at Pipen, Dr. Ho’s is a great spot for pizza afterwards. ***Michie Tavern is a historic tavern with a period restaurant serving Southern fare, plus a gift shop & tours at Monticello. The current hours are limited from 11:30 – 3 pm. This tavern was a favorite spot of Thomas Jefferson and is right next to Monticello. It’s a bit pricey for what you get, but it’s fun! Dinner: Maya’s , Orzos, The Wool Factory(new), Ten(sushi), Tavola, the Local, Zocalos, Continental Divide, Red Pump Kitchen, and Brasserie Saison. *** Mas (Mas is a Spanish eatery offering tapas & great spanish wines in an industrial-chic setting with a lively bar. You must make reservations in advance. These are some of the most popular fine dining experience in Charlottesville: all require reservations. -C&O restaurant and Fluerie’s French Cusine(very romantic!) are on the downtown mall – for C&O ask to be seated on the main floor for the best dining experience. -Ivy Inn -The Old Mill room at Boarshead Inn. For good food on a budget: Bodos, Take it away, Thai Fresh, Roots, Revolutionary soup, Marco Luna noodle(must get the dumplings!), Tip top restaurant(breakfast, lunch and dinner). ***Bodo’s bagels is great for breakfast and lunch. Everything is fresh and yummy. Routinely wins best sandwich in Cville. There are 3 locations. These are just suggestions. There are many other restaurants that are available. I am a former super host with a-r b-b and have 15 years experience hosting people from all over the world! Contact me my text or cell if you have any questions! Guest access Your space includes 1 private bedroom with fresh, clean linens and comfy down pillows (alternative down for allergy sufferers) with full bathroom. The price quoted is for one single person per room. During your stay Please contact me on my cell phone or by text. Thank you. Other things to note Dogs are allowed on a case by case basis. No little dogs. I love them, but I’ve had trouble with them not being adequately potty trained. **** there is an additional $50 per month pet fee.

column76: Daniels Mountain Lodge is a secluded, spacious and luxurious log cabin, the perfect mountain getaway for families and friends. Just a short drive from more than 10 wineries, Shenandoah National Park/Skyline Drive, Charlottesville and UVA. The house is great for guests of all ages with plenty of space and amenities for kids to play. With 5 wooded acres of privacy, family-friendly, pet-friendly, a fully stocked kitchen, a large covered wrap-around porch and a fire pit, it's perfect to gather! The space This spacious modern lodge has 4 bedrooms and 2.5 baths. One bedroom is on the main level, one bedroom on the upper level, and two bedrooms on the lower level of the home. It's newly renovated and furnished. The home has high-speed broadband fiber-optic internet and it's a perfect location to work remotely. We hope you enjoy your stay! Guest access You will have full access to the entire house and property. Other things to note The home is located atop a mountain and with lots of wooded privacy. Please be aware that Deer Path Road is a very steep gravel road and rather bumpy: 4 wheel drive vehicles are recommended and required during the winter months. Please note that, in a mountain environment, ice and snow are often present. Freezing rain can cause icy conditions on the driveway and road. Use Apple maps to get there, we have found that Waze and Google maps does not take you the correct way. We also highly recommend getting to the Lodge during daylight hours so that you can more easily find your way. You will see the address sign to our house at the end of Deer Path and our driveway is paved. Please SLOW DOWN driving up and down Deer Path Road for the sake of the local residents. The homeowner and Airkey will not be liable for any costs associated with road conditions, included but not limited to towing expenses.

column65: One bedroom apartment in newly renovated historic home apartment within 5 minutes walk of the University of Virginia Hospita and one block from Main Street. Fully furnished with long to medium term tenants in mind, the apartment is steps from multiple bus lines including the University system. Guest access You have a private entrance to the apartment and the entire apartment. You will get a code to the laundry room, in the lower part of the building, which is shared with 3 other medium-term Airbnbs. column66: This is a centrally-located 3BR, 2BA home, just 2 miles from UVA & 1 mile to Martha Jefferson Hospital. The Downtown mall is 5 mins away and access to the Rivanna River walk is minutes away! There are numerous amazing restaurants within walking distance. If you feel like eating in, the kitchen is fully function-able, geared for you to whip up whatever you feel like making. We hope you come and enjoy this quiet oasis close to downtown! The space The entire house is filled with light – fresh smelling and immaculately clean and uncluttered. It is tastefully furnished with attention to detail. Beautiful hard wood floors throughout, central AC and heat, ample closet space. This is a stylish 3BR home that evokes all the comforts of home while making vacationing oh so simple. The kitchen is fully stocked with a gas stove, good cooking knives, microwave, coffee pot, and all the cookware and serving items you would need to whip up whatever you are wanting to make. There are two amazing patios – one with a barbecue and the other that is nicely shaded with anarondack chairs and a fire pit so you can enjoy all of the seasons. The living room has a smart TV and plenty of comfortable seating and views of the lush green leaves of the gorgeous old trees that surround the house. For those who have to get some work done while visiting Charlottesville, we have high speed internet and plenty of comfortable areas where you can set up your work space. The house has 2 full baths, both with shower/tub combinations – one upstairs and one downstairs. We provide shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, & soap. There is also a hair dryer available for use. The main bedroom has a new King size memory foam mattress. The 2nd bedroom has a recently updated adjoining bathroom and a new queen size memory foam mattress. The 3rd bedroom has twin bed with a trundle that converts to a queen size bed. Guest access Bedroom 1- New King memory foam mattress Walk-in closet Full length mirror Extra pillows & blankets Overhead fan for the not so hot, not so cool days Bedroom 2- Queen bed with new memory foam mattress Extra pillows & blankets Bedroom 3- Twin bed that converts to a queen Extra pillows & blankets Laundry- Full washer & dryer Detergent/dryer sheets provided Iron available Other things to note Please note that there is absolutely no smoking allowed in the house, no parties and no animals.

column63: Welcome to our RUSTIC CASITA, a newly remodeled and furnished basement apt. for a perfect vacation or getaway at the heart of Charlottesville. Our Rustic Casita is furnished with a rustic yet modern touch with colors that will deliver a calming and relaxing environment you may need for a time away or for a perfect space to be productive. Our Cozy and relaxing lower-level 1bed Basement apt is located only minutes away from UVA and Charlottesville Downtown in a quiet and safe neighborhood. The space Our lovely lower-level guest apt. is the perfect place to lay your head after a busy travel day. Located in close proximity to bars, a variety of restaurants, coffee shops, nightlife, the Ting pavilion and more! To ensure your privacy and an easy process for a perfect getaway, we have designed an entirely self-service check-in with a completely private separate entrance. Security camera located outside near the parking space for safety purposes only. Upon booking, you will receive a unique code that gives you access to your stay. The place has a private entrance, backyard access, a full bathroom, 1 bedroom with a smart tv, queen size bed, closet, and a desk for professionals looking to work. FAST Ting WIFI is provided. A full kitchen is available with with all the necessary appliances for your meal needs and some basic complementary cups, plates, pans, and utensils are provided for your use. Also, it features a cozy and comfortable rustic living room space with a smart tv for entertainment. A dining area to share a nice meal and a small coffee bar with complimentary coffee, coffee cups and extras, as well as teas for tea lovers. It's perfect for 1-2 people, however, the sofa does convert into a twin size bed with a blanket provided if necessary (located on the bottom part of the coffee table), for an additional guest. Mini-split is available with a remote to monitor the temperature suitable for your comfort. Guest access Guests can check themselves in with a provided code. 1 Free driveway parking space is available as well as street parking Other things to note This is a basement apartment with another rented apartment above, although there is soundproofing there may be some light noise on occasions. All guests in both units are asked to respect quiet hours between 12am-7am. No smoking is allowed inside the property, only outside. ** If you’re in need of recommendations based on your type of vacation, let us know and we will be glad to provide some!**

column93: Welcome to Wrenhouse! Convenient to the 151 vineyards, hiking and Wintergreen. • Perfect for reunions and family gatherings. • Very private • Great views • Luxury bedding • New kitchen and baths • Fire pit & wood • Lots of parking • Close to Rockfish Gap, Blue Ridge Parkway & Nellysford • Close to wineries, breweries and distilleries • Easy keypad check-in • Roomy • Big porch with outdoor dining table • Close to 151 wineries, breweries and distilleries. • Professionally cleaned. The space Wren House is a comfortable residence exclusively dedicated to the Air BnB guest. Located near the Route 151 attractions in the Rockfish Valley of Central Virginia, it is in a beautiful mountain setting on a winding country road. Views of the Blue Ridge mountains and a pasture are had from the back porch. Sit around the fire pit. It is quiet and peaceful with many stars and the Milky Way visible most nights. The house is perfect for reunions, family headquarters for exploring the Blue Ridge and Charlottesville region, game weekends, trips to Wintergreen, wineries (and breweries and distilleries), and retreats. Charlottesville is about a 35 minute drive and it is 10 minutes to Nellysford. Wintergreen Resort is 16 miles away. Guest access Just a two and a half miles from Route 151 down a winding country road, the private paved driveway gently slopes up to a generous parking area. The main floor consists of a dining area, kitchen, three of the bedrooms and two full baths plus a half bath, large porch and deck, and sitting areas. Downstairs, find a cozy Jotul stove and hearth, family room and TV, two bedrooms, and full bath. There is also a second kitchen downstairs with another refrigerator, storage, and stove. (see plans) Other things to note Wren House has been artfully upgraded and modernized. Clean, luxury bedding, upgraded bathrooms, and tasteful furnishings make the dwelling unique and inviting. It has space for common meals, and comfortable tucked away corners for reading or getting to those emails. There is a resident wren and a community of finches, nuthatches, cardinals, chickadees, and sparrows, who will entertain or the price of a few seeds if you have coffee or lunch outdoors. Deer and turkey are frequent visitors in the pasture. Beyond, the view from the porch is of The Priest and Three Ridges peaks and where the Appalachian Trail wends its way along the Blue Ridge. Nearby, are popular hikes, bike trails, and watering holes, including Cardinal Point Winery, Blue Mountain Brewery and Devil’s Backbone breweries, Silverback Distillery, and Wintergreen resort. The Rockfish Valley Community Center is close by and hosts the best coffee roasters in the region, Traeger Brothers, gift shops, and music. Most Saturday mornings the Farmers Market is open in Nellysford, just a quick drive from the house along with a small supermarket, hardware, automotive stores, and restaurants. Rockfish Gap is just up the mountain for excursions along the Skyline Drive, Blue Ridge parkway, to Swannanoa, and dozens of trails. We leave suggestions in the house handbook. Just down the other side of the mountain are Rockfish Gap Outfitters, Blue Ridge Kombucha (try the Elderberry), and the beautiful Shenandoah Valley, Waynesboro, and Staunton. Not far to the north and east is Charlottesville, with all the American history, architecture, fine dining, shopping, great music, and entertainment you can fit in. Of course, don’t miss the famous downtown walking mall with its bookstores, boutiques, unique shops, art galleries, cafés, theaters, and street performers. Wren House is perfectly situated for the above and much more. Welcome!
column100: Wren House-nature, hot tub, privacy, mountain view

column77: Mountain View Meadow Hilltop | A modern farmhouse with Blue Ridge Mountain views. In the heart of Virginia Wine Country, near Veritas, Afton Mountain Vineyards, and Rt 151 The space A modern farmhouse with Blue Ridge Mountain views.  Enjoy the 2+ story great room with windows and natural light galore, wooden beams, a spacious loft and an open floor plan. Custom designed and completed in June 2022, this house located in the heart of Nelson County and the Route 151/Brew Ridge Trail has it all! Mixing modern design elements with a relaxed country farmhouse feel, we hope you'll love the house and property as much as we do. Set on just under 10 acres of open meadows with mountain views, woods, and peace and tranquility. Enjoy coffee or a meal on the two covered porches or large patio with mountain views while the deer come and say hello. Open spaces galore add to the communal feeling of the house, yet the bedrooms and two living areas provide sanctuary and separate spaces when wanted. (Please note: all bedroom windows have blinds, they were installed after the photos were taken.) The primary bedroom is downstairs and has an en suite full bathroom, while the upstairs two bedrooms share a Jack and Jill bathroom with a tub and shower. There is an additional half bath off the front hallway. The upstairs loft has majestic views of the mountains along with a private nook with a desk for your work from home needs. The house is wired with 1 Gibabit per second (Gbps) fiber optic high speed internet, has four wired Ethernet outlets, and extremely fast and strong WiFi coverage throughout the home. There are three 4K HDR Roku smart TVs in the house. There is a 65 inch Roku TV in the loft, a 55 inch Roku TV in the primary, and a 43 inch Roku TV in the upstairs bedroom with the other king bed. All are set for guest access, so log in to your streaming services and it will automatically sign you out when you leave. The chef's kitchen is equipped with everything you need to enjoy your own meals. From the gas burners to the granite countertops, enjoy a luxurious meal in your very own gourmet kitchen. Things to note: -There is a guest cottage about 150 yards down the driveway from the main house, it is screened from the main house by trees, and they can be rented in conjunction with one another -While we love animals, no pets allowed -No smoking allowed on the premises -Absolutely no parties -Children and babies welcome (a pack & play and booster seat are stored at the house) -Quiet hours asked from 10 PM - 7 AM -There is a dishwasher in the kitchen -The house is on a septic system and we ask that you help keep our system operational, no foods or grease down the kitchen sink, etc. Guest access You will have access to the entire home, it will be your house during the stay. Other things to note Things to note: -We have a guest cottage about 150 yards down the driveway from the main house. -The guest cottage is screened from the main house by trees, and can be rented in conjunction with one another if desired. -While we love animals, no pets allowed -No smoking allowed on the premises -Absolutely no parties -Children and babies welcome (a pack & play and booster seat are stored at the house) -Quiet hours asked from 10 PM - 7 AM -There is a dishwasher in the kitchen -The house is on a septic system and we ask that you help keep our system operational, no foods or grease down the kitchen sink, etc.

YEAR ROUND VIEWS OF THE BLUE RIDGE! Fenced Yard for your under 55 lb dog or 2 small dogs less than 55 lbs. combined. Please make sure your dog has all their current shots. A few minutes drive to 64 and 250! **Utilities and internet included in rent!** -Luxury 2 Bedroom Guest Quarters, Built in 2022 -High speed internet, 199 Mbps -Smart TV with Prime, Netflix, You Tube Premium and more -High ceilings and TONS of natural light -Shared laundry room. Door to laundry is your Guest Quarters. -Privacy blinds -New mattress in 2022 -New kitchen furnishings -Large closet and storage area -Small electric fireplace -Private entrance with lots of well-lit parking -Fenced in yard for your dog -Private fire-pit -Patio with grill, dining table and comfy loungers -Noise reduction construction Included in monthly rent: Utilities, internet, trash disposal, snow removal, yard maintenance, wood for fire pit We are on the top of Afton Mountain, but less than five minutes to Exit 99 on I-64. Stunning 25 mile and 180 degree views of the Blue Ridge Mountains and Rockfish Valley. Breathtaking sunrises and sunsets! in the fall and winter especially. Squirrels, rabbits, deer are all residents here too. Lots of good bird watching, and spring migrations bring a wide variety of birds to our feeders. On some winter evenings we find a dozen deer feasting on our lawn. A beautiful sight. Experience the magic at Eagle's Nest

column57: Spacious farm apartment(walkout apt below our living space)in the rolling hills of Virginia near the Rivanna River. Close to downtown Charlottesville and UVA(+/- 8 miles). Galley kitchen. Large fireplace. Private entrance. Stone patio. A few miles from Monticello, Highland, Jefferson Vineyard, Simeon Market( coffee shop with baked goods and sandwiches), and Carter's Mountain Orchard. More vineyards nearby. Kayaks, rented from the Rihanna River Company, are a fun way to explore the river. The space The 800 sq ft downstairs apartment overlooks the pasture and garden of Green Willow Farm. Living/dining area with fireplace. Small galley kitchen(toaster oven, stovetop, refrigerator) for light meals. Separate bedroom with king-size bed. A single small daybed in the living room area for a child or small adult. Lots of games and books. 10 acres of mostly pasture. Sheep in the pasture. A stone patio is just outside the entrance overlooking the garden. (There are several steps and a slight incline leading to the apartment door and the patio has an uneven stone surface. We want to make sure that guests who may have mobility issues are informed.) Guest access Feel free to enjoy the patio and walk the fields. You can go into the large vegetable garden but keep gates closed. (Deer are awaiting entrance whenever there is an opportunity! Bunnies dine in the garden, at will.) You will see another expansive garden/patio area but it is still being renovated so best to avoid that until complete. There is a mowed path around the edges of the property that you are welcome to walk. Please avoid the family areas - front and back porch areas. Other things to note We are on a rural road and there are no street lights to light your way at night. We do have solar lights at the entrance and leading up to the apartment so there should be no trouble finding your way. Noise: When we are home, we live above the apartment so you may hear our quiet footfall. It's fun to see wildlife in the field, turkey, deer, fox... something to note about the fox is their communication style - a loud shrill scream - just them getting to know each other. . . :) There is some solar electric fence around the sheep pasture. Best to avoid. Not a very strong charge but not comfortable if you touch it. And don't go in the pasture with the sheep. Though friendly, these male sheep will express that by butting you, hard, with their horns. We are finishing the large patio project next to the garden so may be working there when you are visiting.

column84: Welcome to your dream vacation home in Waynesboro, Virginia! This stunning 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom house offers the perfect blend of modern comfort and outdoor relaxation. Step outside into your own private oasis, where a mesmerizing fire pit awaits you. Gather around its warm glow with loved ones, sharing stories and creating memories. The outside seating area beckons you to unwind and enjoy the serene surroundings, while the grill invites you to sizzle up some delicious barbecues. The space Welcome to your dream home in Waynesboro! This stunning 3 level home offers 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, providing ample space for comfortable and luxurious living. As you enter the house on the main floor, you'll be greeted by a spacious living area that's perfect for relaxing and spending time with family and friends. This floor also features a well-equipped kitchen area with a kitchen table that seats 4 people, making it easy to host meals and gatherings. Additionally, there are two bedrooms on this level, one with a king bed and the other with a queen bed, which share a bathroom. Moving up to the upper level, you'll find two more bedrooms, one with a queen bed and the other with a full bed. These two bedrooms also share a bathroom, making this home perfect for families or groups of friends traveling together. But the real highlight of this home is the lower level. Here, you'll find a laundry room that you'll have access to, and another living room area with games and books. This is the perfect space for a family game night or to curl up with a good book. However, the best part of this home is the two decks. One of them is located in the lower level and features a fire pit, creating a cozy atmosphere where you can relax and unwind after a long day. The other deck is located on the main level next to the kitchen, and features a seating area and a grill. This is the perfect place to host a barbecue party with friends or simply enjoy some fresh air. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own this amazing home in Waynesboro. Book a showing today and experience the ultimate in comfort and luxury! Guest access Guests have full access to the entire property. There is a large fenced in back yard that provides great privacy. Wi-Fi: you will have access to Wi-Fi connection, we understand this is essential for many guests who need to stay connected to work, family, or friends. 2. Safety features: the home is equipped with smoke detectors, first aid kit to ensure guests' safety during their stay.

column76: This cozy home offers a perfect blend of comfort and convenience, with all amenities included to make your stay delightful. Situated in a central location, this house puts you in close proximity to the University of Virginia (UVA), making it ideal for visiting students, faculty, or anyone eager to explore the campus and its vibrant surroundings. The space Welcome to Your Home Away from Home in Charlottesville! Our beautifully remodeled 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom home is perfectly situated in the heart of UVA and Charlottesville. With its prime location—just a 3-minute drive from the stadium and 5 minutes from UVA campus—you’ll be within walking distance of great local restaurants, making it the ideal spot for visiting your student or enjoying a weekend getaway. Step inside to a stylishly decorated living room, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The main floor includes three cozy bedrooms: -One with a full-size bed -One with two twin beds -One with a queen-size bed The full bathroom offers both a bathtub and shower, and we’ve provided all the essentials—towels, sheets, shampoo, conditioner, and more for your convenience. Just outside the bedrooms, a charming patio with a seating area awaits, perfect for relaxing with your morning coffee. Head downstairs to find a fully equipped kitchen, ready for any meal you wish to prepare. The dining area comfortably seats six, and there's a second living room stocked with books and games for everyone to enjoy. Whether you're here to visit UVA or explore the vibrant local scene, our home offers a comfortable and convenient retreat. Property Highlights: -Newly remodeled 3-bedroom home, sleeps up to 6 guests -Fully equipped kitchen and dining area -Cozy patio with outdoor seating -Second living room with books and games -Walking distance to restaurants, and just 3 minutes from the stadium and 5 minutes from UVA Additionally, the breathtaking Blue Ridge Mountains are just a short drive away, and within 15 minutes, you’ll find yourself surrounded by local breweries, distilleries, wineries, and more. Don’t miss this opportunity to experience the best of Charlottesville—book your stay today! We look forward to hosting you! column93: Enjoy a posh experience in a new custom build, 1 Mile from the Downtown Mall, 2 miles from UVA, close to shopping, nightlife, and a 15 minute drive to a host of wineries along the Monticello Wine Trail. This home is great for larger parties (3718 sqft, 6 bed, 5 bath) desiring to take advantage attractions in the Charlottesville/Central Virginia area. Whether you're attending UVA sporting events, alumni activities, working remotely, or desire a girls' getaway, this home is sure to please! The space This is a newly constructed home that features a bedroom with queen size bed and a bathroom on the 1st, or main, floor. The first floor layout is open and includes the kitchen, dining and living room spaces. The kitchen has a large island with the KitchenAid microwave and dishwasher underneath; the sink is also located on top of the cream colored quartz countertop. There are four stools along the front of the island, but it could comfortably accommodate six if using the sides. The dining area is set up for six, which allows for abundant space on all four sides of the table. The living area is set up for eight people that include two ottomans as pictured. The large flat fireplace can heat the entire open area and includes a 60 inch TV above the floating mantle. The main floor balcony entrance is just off the living room (four large glass sliding doors). The Trex deck is large, can hold 15-20 people (includes seating for 10), and provides shade or cover from rain/snow. Note: seating can increase based on demand and guests requests. Finally, the laundry room is quite large and includes large capacity washer and dryer, a utility sink, a small table, drying racks and lot’s of storage. The second floor includes a sizable master bedroom (king size bed) with an on suite bathroom that includes a large stand alone tub, separate shower, and dual sinks. A mini master across the hall (king size bed) has a walk in closet, and an on suite bathroom with a sink and shower/tub. The third 2nd floor bedroom includes a queen size bed and shares a full bathroom (shower/tub, with dual sinks) with bedroom #4. The fourth bedroom includes bunk beds with full size mattresses, and also includes a trundle underneath with a twin size mattress. Finally, the office area is on the second floor that includes a large desk, lamp, and chair. The Wi-Fi speed to devices averages 500-700 mbs depending on activity and number of devices connected. The basement is roughly 1000 sq ft and includes a separate bedroom (queen size bed) and an on suite bathroom that has a sink and a shower/bathtub. The large basement open area includes a ping pong table, a queen size Murphy bed (disguised as a large white bookshelf), along with a futon (plush queen size mattress) and a 65 in TV. Walkout basement leads to a large patio (as pictured). Seating on the patio currently accommodates five, but can easily increase upon request. A grill and firepit are also available. There is lots of green space in the back that leads to a creek, so guest may see small deer and foxes, which flee upon encounters with people. Also note: the backyard is not fenced off on all sides. Plenty of space between the two homes. Guest access Guests can currently access the entire property. Other things to note The house is child friendly, but not child proof. Outlets are child proof; however, cabinets and other areas do not include child locks or fenced areas. Do not use the property for parties—neighborhood is quiet, and I don’t want to disrupt neighbors. Please remove shoes to protect the floors. Please do not place hot pans or dishes on the kitchen countertops or dining table.

column56: Basecamp151 is the only boutique motel in Afton, VA. We are located directly on Route 151 in Nelson County and surrounded by the Blue Ridge Mountains. We are located right in the heart of all the beauty and adventure of this area. We are also located just miles from some of the most well-known brewery and winery trails on the East Coast. This is the perfect destination for couples, large groups, bachelor/bachelorette parties, weddings, and more! The space Suite 4 is our accessible room that features a king bed and walk-in shower. This space sleeps 2 very comfortably with plenty of room to relax and enjoy Nelson 151. Suite 4 is pet friendly with an additional $75 fee/stay. Please make sure to add your pet to your reservation! All Basecamp rooms include: -Full length mirrors -Kitchenette with mini fridge, microwave, wine glasses, and wine key -WFH space (desk with chair) -Hair dryer -Smart TVs -High speed internet -Access to ironing NEW Crucible Coffee shop is now open at Basecamp151. Guests of Basecamp151 will receive 1 free drip coffee or $1 off a specialty coffee per day. The shop is open Wednesday-Sunday from 7:30 AM to 3:00 PM. In addition to your spacious suite, all guests have access to Basecamp151's trendy common area with games, tv, coffee bar, and more! If you'd prefer to hang out outside, feel free to enjoy a beverage on our terrace, or lay claim to a firepit out back. If you plan to use our firepits, please plan to bring your own firewood and lighter, as firewood is not provided. Please note that Suite 4 does have an exterior entrance with easy sidewalk access (no stairs) from the upper parking lot. Guests will use a smart keypad for check in on the exterior door, although there is an interior door in the suite that leads to the motel where guests can access the common space.

column82: Enjoy authentic log-cabin living on a peaceful wooded lot! Located 20 minutes from downtown Charlottesville & UVA. Located very close to historic Montpelier and Monticello & many wineries and great restaurants. Over 15 wineries & breweries within 30 minutes of the cabin and only 30 mins from Shenandoah National Park! A whole home UV Air purifier (ozone free model) is installed in ductwork to ensure a germ-free living environment! The space The main bedroom is perfect for couples & is equipped with a queen size bed. The entertainment area in the basement has a TV & full-size pull out couch to double as a bedroom. The loft above kitchen is converted to a bedroom & also has a queen size bed & an individual window ac unit to help with summer heat. The kitchen includes cooking pots and pans & electric stove & oven. The kitchen is equipped with necessary utensils as well as utensils for grill use! The bathroom is located on the main level & is equipped with toilet paper and bath towels for guest use if desired. Guest access All rooms except locked utility room in are for guest use & the couch in the basement across from the TV pulls out to a full-size bed! We also have two other queen size beds. Extra linens are located in cupboards. Extra towels are located in bathroom. Please use hampers in laundry room to dispose of dirty linens and towels when done using. The front porch is a great place to relax. The small chiminea and gas grill are also for guest use, as well as the fire pit across from the house. The woods around the house and garden are all part of the lot that the cabin sits on and is great for exploring! There are also plenty of board games & activities in the family room and dvds in the basement. Other things to note The house is pet friendly! Please just be sure keep eye out for wildlife outside. Home is located less than 15 minutes away from NGIC gov't facility & Martha Jefferson & UVA Hospitals. There is a full hookup RV spot on the acreage that may be occupied by the host, which generously separated from the cabin.

column52: Welcome to Residence Inn Charlottesville Downtown Whether visiting for an extended stay or a short trip, Residence Inn Charlottesville Downtown offers the friendly service and contemporary amenities necessary for a successful stay. Our hotel provides an incomparable location, just moments from historic and renowned destinations, such as Monticello, the Downtown Mall, the University of Virginia and the Monticello Wine Trail. The space After an exciting day in the city, bask in the modern comfort of our apartment-style suites outfitted with fully equipped kitchens, complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs and separate living and sleeping areas. Stay in shape during your stay by getting in a workout at our 24-hour fitness center or taking a lap in our indoor pool. Get your morning off to a great start at our free breakfast buffet, complete with an extensive variety of both hearty and healthy options. Hosting an upcoming corporate meeting? column81: Welcome to Hummingbird's Rest! This gorgeous custom log home was constructed from a relocated 19th century hewn log home, which has been updated with all the modern conveniences while retaining loads of classic cabin charm. Nestled on a 5-acre parcel in view of the Blue Ridge Mountains, you can sip your morning coffee on the porch, explore neighboring wineries, sit by the pond, explore the woodlands by the winding creek, and stargaze by the fire pit. The space Welcome to Hummingbird's Rest, where the pressures of modern life melt away in this tranquil setting! The home was reconstructed in 2003 by renowned hewn log home preservationist Charles McRaven, and it is truly a sight to behold! Every detail in the walls, the doors, the woodwork - is steeped in history. The kitchen, with its reclaimed cabinetry, modern updates and soaring ceiling has been carefully crafted to match the feel of the original structure. Warm wood tones, expansive windows, and stained glass enhance the coziness that envelops you in the cabin. The main floor of the cabin contains the spacious eat-in kitchen area, the original hand-hewn log living room with wood-burning fireplace and queen pull-out sofa, a half bath, and the screened-in sleeping porch. Upstairs you will find the sunny master suite with queen-sized bed and full bath. Downstairs includes a den with TV, laundry, and a small second bedroom with double bed. The grounds include a picnic table for eating outside, a fire pit area with chairs, covered parking for two cars, a pond (no swimming or fishing, please!), a creek, and a horse pasture. Despite feeling like you're miles away from it all, Hummingbird's Rest is very close to many vineyards, and only a 30-minute drive from all the restaurants, shops, and activities that downtown Charlottesville has to offer! Other things to note We now have high-speed fiber internet! Now you can enjoy the calm and respite of getting away from it all, and also work from home (if you must!).
column88: Hummingbird's Rest - A Luxury Wine Country Retreat

column88: Stunning sunsets from nearly every room of this spacious 5BR/2.5BA home (inquire about renting as a 3BR/1.5 BA). Located on a beautiful residential street close to UVA and downtown and overlooking a mature forest, this professionally-decorated home is central to everything you come to Cville to experience. Walk to coffee, restaurants, and stores, but still enjoy the privacy of the quiet neighborhood and wooded lot. 2 wood burning fireplaces, screened porch, patio. The space Knollhaus is a mid century modern home built into a hill, designed to take in the views of the mature forest and mountains beyond. The home has two distinct living areas: the first floor is a complete house in itself, allowing for one-level living with three bedrooms, living room with wood-burning fireplace, dining room, kitchen, and one and half baths plus a gorgeous screened porch perched among the treetops. The garden level has two additional bedrooms, a full bath, a second living room/family room with a second wood burning fireplace, and a laundry room/cafe kitchen with sink, microwave, toaster oven, and refrigerator. The house is ideally configured for those looking for one-level living, for active families looking for room to spread out, for work-from-homers needing quiet, separate spaces, or for multi-generational families traveling together and desiring the opportunity to gather together and then retreat to private spaces. The main level has an open-concept dining and living area with a wall of windows facing the sunset view, Sonos sound system, original moldings, hardwood floors, and is punctuated by a lovely wood-burning fireplace. The living area opens to a serene screened porch overlooking the views for bug-free outdoor living. The kitchen opens to the dining area and boasts new appliances, All Clad cookware, cooking staples, a Vitamix, a cool mid-century vibe, lots of cabinet space, and a view of the beautiful and historic neighborhood the home is nestled amidst. Off of the living area is the bedroom wing of the first floor, containing three bedrooms: a primary bedroom with beautiful sunset views and attached half bath, and an additional two bedrooms (one with a queen bed and one with a full) and a newly-renovated full bath with tub/shower combo. All bedrooms have large closets. Downstairs, you’ll find a large family room overlooking the views with smart TV, comfortable furniture to lounge in, a desk for working, plenty of built-in bookshelves, a games table, a yoga mat and yoga supplies, and hand weights. A door from the family room leads out to the back patio with comfortable seating around a propane fire pit, a gas Weber grill, and an outdoor dining table- all positioned to take in the quiet, private yard and the ever-changing view. Also downstairs you’ll find the laundry room with washer and dryer/second kitchen (a cafe kitchen with refrigerator, sink, microwave and toaster oven- no range) and two bedrooms (one with a king bed and one with a single bed). The single bedroom doubles as a home office with a desk and a pretty sunset view. There is also a newly renovated full bath with shower/tub combo on this level. The house is set in a sought-after, well established neighborhood that is home to college professors, retirees, and young professional families. It is a very popular road for walkers and runners because of its historic architecture, lack of traffic, and natural beauty. UVA is walkable or bikeable- one mile to the stadium- and there are numerous great restaurants and coffee shops within walking distance. Nature trails, a river, and walking and mountain biking opportunities abound literally right outside both the front and back doors. Guest access The entire house and property are yours to enjoy.
column95: Elegant City Home in Country Setting- Walk to UVA

column75: This charming Frys Spring neighborhood home underwent a FULL renovation completed in the Fall of 2022. EVERYTHING is new! The home features 5 beds (4 Kings, 1 Queen) and two full-sized living rooms. EVERYTHING in the home is brand new, from the appliances to the tile floors and the refinished original hardwood! The home is perfect for bachelorette parties, wedding accommodations, UVA reunions, family get-togethers, and more. Less than 2 miles from UVA, i64, Wegman's, AND The Downtown Mall. The space This 5-bedroom home is ideally located in Charlottesville. It's a few minute's drive/Uber from Downtown C'ville, UVA, Wegman's, and interstate 64 (for access to wineries). The home itself features a sunny, open living/dining area on the first floor, and an additional living space on the bottom level. Each of the 5 private bedrooms are spacious and have their own closet -- four have King beds and one has a Queen. This house is an ideal spot for a friends' weekend, wedding accommodations, a low-key bachelorette party, a large family get-together, or multiple couples and families enjoying Charlottesville together! We've outfitted the bottom floor living area with several mirrors and make-up stations, so multiple people can do their hair and makeup together in the space! It's perfect for bachelorette parties and/or wedding getting ready spaces, and professional hair-and-makeup artists are welcome, with host permission. Guest access When you arrive you'll find your beds made and ready for you, along with all the necessary towels and toiletries laid out for you. In addition, you will have access to two full kitchens, including spices and coffee essentials. There is a single off-street parking spot in the driveway, and plenty of parking on the street in front of the house. Every guest that stays gets their own 4-digit code to access the house, which is changed before and after every stay to ensure your safety. Codes are sent the morning of your stay. Upon booking, we won't share the exact address of our home until after your free cancelation" window has passed. All of this is to ensure maximum safety for current and future guests! column62: Relax in the recently renovated 3BR 2.5Bath spacious home immersed in a tranquil and friendly neighborhood. It offers a short 5min walk from the UVA Hospital, making it a perfect business retreat for traveling nurses and leisure guests. High ceilings, fantastic comforts, and a rich amenity list will leave you in awe. ✔ 3 Comfortable Bedrooms ✔ Open Design Living ✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen ✔ Backyard Patio ✔ Smart TV ✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi ✔ 2 Free Parking Spots Learn more below! The space As soon as you step foot in this beautiful home, you're welcomed by a lovely foyer leading into a very stylish yet highly comfortable open floor plan. It is designed and decorated in an elegant manner that complements the fantastic Charlottesville location, close to the UVA Hospital.   The fully equipped kitchen and adjacent dining area are where you'll get to prepare and enjoy delicious meals before relaxing in the living room, allowing you to relax after a long shift at work. Plenty of natural light comes through the large windows, making the home very bright during the day, accenting the hardwood floors, and enhancing the soothing ambiance under the majestic cathedral ceilings.   Retreat to three comfortable bedrooms, which feature 5☆-resort comforts that allow you to rest after a successful workday or an exciting day of Charlottesville sightseeing.   Finally, you'll be able to step onto the serene backyard, where you can catch a breath of fresh air, soak up the sun, and marvel at the lovely natural ambiance while relaxing on the patio.   There are numerous options in this gorgeous home. We are looking forward to you experiencing them all.   ★ LIVING ROOM ★ It immediately feels like home! Find your place on the comfy sofa, cuddle up with a good book, watch a movie, and completely forget about work.   ✔ Comfortable L-Shaped Sofa with Pillows & Blankets ✔ Smart TV ✔ Coffee Table ✔ Stylish Reading Lamp   ★ KITCHEN & DINING ★ It is fully equipped with modern cooking appliances that make it suitable for preparing any meal, whether a simple breakfast, quick snack or a three-course gourmet dinner. Spacious countertops provide plenty of room to work your MasterChef magic.   ✔ Microwave ✔ Stove ✔ Oven ✔ Toaster ✔ Coffee Maker ✔ Hot Water Kettle ✔ Refrigerator/Freezer ✔ Dishwasher ✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water ✔ Trays ✔ Glasses ✔ Silverware ✔ Pots & Pans   Have a few drinks in the living room while the food is getting ready. Once it's done, serve it on the dining table and enjoy a tasty homemade meal.   ✔ Dining Table with Seating for 6   ★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 3 BEDROOMS ★ After a tiresome day at work, you will be looking to rest and recharge, so you are ready for whatever tomorrow brings. Once you decide it's time to relax, please make your way to these comfortable bedrooms.   ♛ Master Bedroom (First Floor): Full-Size Bed, Ensuite Bathroom ♛ Bedroom 2 (Second Floor): Full- Size Bed ♛ Bedroom 3 (Second Floor): Full-Size Bed   All bedrooms are equipped with a similar set of amenities.   ✔ Premium Pillows, Linens, and Sheets ✔ Closets with Hangers and Shelves (Walk-In in Master) ✔ Dressers with Spacious Drawers ✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps   ★ BATHROOMS ★ Besides the ensuite bathroom of the master bedroom, the house features another full relaxing bathroom that caters to the second-floor bedrooms and an additional half bath accessible from the living area. All are stocked with fresh towels and essential toiletries to ensure you have a carefree stay.   ✔ Soaker Tub + Separate Walk-In Shower ✔ Bathtub with a Shower ✔ Double Vanity ✔ Mirror ✔ Toilet ✔ Towels ✔ Hair Dryer ✔ Essential Toiletries   ★ BACK PATIO ★ A fantastic home like this would not shine in its best light if it did not have a private area where you can relax, catch a breath of fresh air and enjoy the tranquil natural surroundings. Step out onto the back deck from the kitchen or the master bedroom and take in the neighborhood's serenity.   ✔ Backyard Patio   Let us know if you have any questions; we're locals; we have the answers. Happy Travels! Guest access Guests have full and exclusive access to the whole home.

column73: Enjoy a stylish experience in this centrally located 3 bedroom, 3 story home close to Downtown Cville mall, UVA, & many wineries and breweries! -Situated on a quiet neighborhood cul de sac within a mile of the mall, 2 miles to UVA, and easy access to I 64 -Queen luxury mattresses -1 bedroom located on 2nd floor w/ full bath, & 2 bedrooms located on the 3rd floor w/ full bath -2 living rooms each with 70” screen smart TVs, & a pull out Queen sofa bed -Full kitchen, washing machine & dryer The space This charming single family home is a perfect destination for your Charlottesville getaway in the conveniently located, quiet neighborhood of Belmont! Guests will enjoy the home’s central location easily accessible to Charlottesville’s many attractions. Whether you are coming to enjoy the beautiful wineries and delicious restaurants, attending a UVA event, or looking to hike and explore the outdoors, make no mistake, this is the home for you! ⭐️ 1 mile from the Downtown Mall & Belmont’s highly rated restaurants (Mas, Tavola, The Local, & Mockingbird) ⭐️ 2 miles from UVA ⭐️ 1 mile from Interstate 64 ⭐️ 1.5 miles from 5th Street Station: Wegmans, Public Lands, Dick’s, and many other eateries & shopping ⭐️ 1 mile to popular breweries such as Three Notch’d Craft Kitchen and Brewery & South Street Brewery ⭐️ 10 minute drive to popular wineries such as Eastwood Farm & Winery and Jefferson Vineyards ⭐️ 10 minute drive to Carter’s Mountain Orchard, perfect for apple picking in the fall ⭐️ A portion of the Rivanna Trail is located directly behind the house, and the entrance to Saunders-Monticello Trail is a 5 minute drive. After a full day of activities, come home and get a restful night’s sleep on brand new, luxury mattresses, with many pillow options! Other things to note: -Check in is easy! You will receive a unique, 4 digit key code for the front door. Come and go as you please! -Parking: the driveway can accommodate 2 vehicles, but there is parallel parking on an adjacent street should you have more than 2 cars. -The listing price is for 6 guests, although the home accommodates 8 guests. The 7th and 8th guests are an extra $125 per person, per night. Please note that there are only 3 private rooms. -This is our home, and though we try to remove as many personal belongings as possible, you may notice we have a few things stored in closets or drawers. There is plentiful room in all closets and drawers for you to use and store your belongings. -As mentioned above, this is a family neighborhood, so please be mindful of making loud noise outside after 10 PM. Additionally, please be aware that we have a no parties/events policy. -We will do our best to accommodate early check in requests! -Your feedback and recommendations are always welcome! -We are always available via the AIRbnb app. Guest access Guests will have access to the whole house, aside from the garage, master bedroom, and two owner’s closets. Other things to note There will be light construction on a nearby street during the month of August 2023.
