column68: Cottage in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains and Virginia wine country The space Kick back and relax in this calm and stylish space. Nestled in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains and Virginia wine country (just off RTE 151 in Afton), this newly constructed guest cottage is the perfect place for a fun filled getaway. Just minutes away from fantastic hiking, wineries, breweries, and restaurants, this light filled and modern cottage is perfectly framed to take advantage of mountain views from the picture windows. (Please note: all windows have blinds installed, installation was completed after the photos were taken.) Custom designed and completed in October 2022, this cottage located in the heart of Nelson County and the Route 151/Brew Ridge Trail has it all! Mixing modern design elements with a relaxed country farmhouse feel, we hope you'll love the house and property as much as we do. Set on just under 10 acres of open meadows with mountain views, woods, and peace and tranquility. Enjoy coffee or a meal on the front deck/patio with mountain views while the deer come and say hello. Designed with high ceilings, immense windows, picturesque views, and natural light, you may not want to leave! The bedroom consists of a queen size bed, and is separate from the living area and kitchen. The full bathroom contains a combo tub and shower. The living room couch pulls out into a queen size sofa bed. The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to enjoy your own meals. From the electric stove top burners to the granite countertops, stainless steel appliance, and dishwasher, enjoy a luxurious meal in your very own gourmet kitchen. We have pots, pans, utensils, etc. The cottage has its own high speed fiber optic internet connection, allowing for fast and efficient WiFi access. The 50 inch 4K HDR Roku smart TV picks allows you to stream your favorite smart streaming apps using Roku Guest Access, which automatically logs you out when you depart. You will have access to the entire home, it will be your house during the stay. Please note that the main house up the hill may also be occupied during your stay. While you have privacy from one another, you share the same driveway. Things to note: -Our main house is about 100-150 yards up the driveway from the cottage. (See pictures depicting their respective locations.) -The cottage is screened from the main house by trees, and they both can be rented in conjunction with one another if availability allows -While we love animals, no pets allowed -No smoking allowed anywhere on the premises -Absolutely no parties -Children and babies welcome -Quiet hours asked from 10 PM - 8 AM -There is a dishwasher in the kitchen -The house is on a septic system and we ask that you help keep our system operational, no foods or grease down the kitchen sink, etc. Guest access You will have access to the entire home, it will be your house during the stay. Please note that the main house up the hill may also be occupied during your stay. While you have privacy from one another, you share the same driveway. Other things to note Things to note: -Our main house is about 100-150 yards up the driveway from the cottage. (See pictures depicting their respective locations.) -The cottage is screened from the main house by trees, and they both can be rented in conjunction with one another if availability allows -While we love animals, no pets allowed -No smoking allowed anywhere on the premises -Absolutely no parties -Children and babies welcome, but please bring your own pack and play, etc. -Quiet hours asked from 10 PM - 8 AM -There is a dishwasher in the kitchen -The house is on a septic system and we ask that you help keep our system operational, no foods or grease down the kitchen sink, etc.

column56: Basecamp151 is the only boutique motel in Afton, VA. We are located directly on Route 151 in Nelson County and surrounded by the Blue Ridge Mountains. We are located right in the heart of all the beauty and adventure of this area. We are also located just miles from some of the most well-known brewery and winery trails on the East Coast. This is the perfect destination for couples, large groups, bachelor/bachelorette parties, weddings, and more! The space The Basecamp Cottage is located directly beside Basecamp151 Motel! This house features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and sleeps up to 7 guests. The cottage features a full kitchen, living area, 2 full bathrooms, 2 king bedrooms and a bedroom with a twin over queen bunk bed. Cottage guests also have access to the Basecamp151 Motel's common space, including the lobby, front porch and backyard firepits (please note, you will need to bring your own wood). The Cottage is pet friendly with an additional $75 fee/stay. Please make sure to add your pet to your reservation! NEW Crucible Coffee shop is now open at Basecamp151. Guests of Basecamp151 will receive 1 free drip coffee or $1 off a specialty coffee per day. The shop is open Wednesday-Sunday from 7:30 AM to 3:00 PM.

column80: This 42-acre very private historic country estate consisting of 3 separate Airbnb residences is surrounded by the Rivanna River and Blue Ridge Mountains. This home, “The South” consists of King and Queen ensuite bedrooms and in addition to the large Living Room and Dining area's, you'll find the kitchen is well appropriated for any cooking needs. The home also has an outdoor seating patio with a charcoal BBQ. There are also two fee base pickleball courts available for rental. The space Rivanna Estates “South Wing” is a home consisting of 2 Bedrooms and 2 1/2 half bathrooms. Guests can enjoy the space and tranquility of grazing animals while enjoying the views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Take the trail to the Rivanna River or do laps in the pool. This historic home is also a short driving distance to Barboursville Winery, as well as many other vineyards and distilleries. History buffs will enjoy taking the tour of Thomas Jefferson’s Monticello as well as James Madison’s Montpelier. SAFETY: We are licensed by Albemarle County, which requires an annual fire inspection. The house is equipped with smoke detectors, fire extinguishers, evacuation routes, fire ladders, first aid kits, fire blankets, and postings with emergency numbers. We also have an AED on the property. CLEANING: We follow Airbnb's cleaning protocol and recommendations to prevent the spread of Covid. Our cleaning is based on recommendations from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and we try to maintain a 24-hour buffer to 72-hour gap between stays. We follow Airbnb's enhanced cleaning protocol. Alcohol-based hand sanitizer and Clorox wipes are located at the entrance of the house. All matresses and pillows are protected with hypoallergenic and waterpoof covers. Sheets, comforters and covers are all washed with in hot water between guests. SECURITY: All windows and doors close and lock properly. This property is located down a private driveway and is monitored by security cameras in the courtyard. Guest access Guests can enjoy the space and tranquility of grazing animals while enjoying the sweeping views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Take the trail to the Rivanna River or do laps in the pool. Guests are welcome to explore the property, we only ask that they stay within Rivanna Estates property lines. Please see the map that will be located in the residence. This bucolic cottage is also a short driving distance to Barboursville Winery as well as many other vineyards and distilleries. History buffs will enjoy taking the tour of Thomas Jefferson’s home, the famous Monticello, as well as James Madison’s Montpelier. Pickleball - please message the host to set up court time. The rental fee is either a flat rate of $100 for your entire reservation or an hourly fee of $40. Pickleball lessons are available by a Certified Pickleball Coach on Fridays and Saturdays. Court shoes are required. Hiking - there is a map located in your residence. Bocce Ball/Cornhole - message the host and we will provide the balls/beanbags. Pool: We open the pool towards the end of May and close it in early October, weather dependant. There is a basket of pool towels near your front door. Please sign the pool waiver prior to using the pool. The pool is reserve for resident guests only. column85: Make the most of your next stay in Charlottesville by booking this stunning vacation rental just outside downtown! The 2-bedroom,3-bed,2.5-bathroom single home has been beautifully updated and comes stocked with all the comforts of home! When you're not relaxing in the magazine-worthy living room or warming up by the wood fire pit out back, look forward to exploring all the area has to offer at spots like historic Downtown, local breweries, and the Rotunda of UVA ground. The options are endless! The space Please take note of the following important information: Although this house is designed with three bedrooms, local regulations only permit two of them to be officially recognized. Nevertheless, you have full access to all three rooms and can make use of them as you please. ✦Everyday Essentials such as: 58-Inch smart TV, Washer & Dryer, Built-In Closets, Ceiling Fans/Lighting in every room, and much more ✦A LUXURY LIVING ROOM equipped with leather recliners, fireplace with electric candles, and much more. ✦You can also meet your HOME OFFICE NEEDS with two dedicated workstations You can have SOME FUN at our place too. ✦Bistro lit, screened porch to knock back some brews ✦Patio with FIRE PIT and GRILL ✦Fully stocked kitchen with Ninja Smoothie Maker, Bar Cart, and any kitchen equipment you may need ✦A large, fenced BACKYARD ✦Direct access walking-path to Pen Park(Tennis + picnic) and 18 holes Public Meadowcreek Golf Course LEVEL ONE ✦Living room: Sofa with sectional & leather recliners, ottoman | Ample lamps & swing arm sconces | end tables | DESK WORKPLACE, HP Laser printer | 58 inch smart TV | fireplace with electric candles ✦Kitchen: FULLY STOCKED | Eat-in kitchen | WINE bar cart | pantry | STAINLESS refrigerator, electric stovetop, microwave, dishwasher, NINJA blender, Keurig & drip coffee maker, CUISINART processor, hand mixer, toaster, etc ✦Half bathroom ✦Laundry room: Dryer | Washer | HEPA vacuum | Hand-held steamer LEVEL TWO ✦BEDROOM ONE: KING bed with pillows & shams, end tables & lamps | Dresser & lamp, mirror | DESK WORKPLACE | closet with door mirror, hangers & shoes shelf | EN-SUITE bath ✦BEDROOM TWO: QUEEN bed with pillows & shams, end tables & swing arm sconces | Dresser & lamp, mirror | accent CHAIR & cushion | closet with door mirror and hangers ✦BEDROOM THREE: QUEEN bed with pillows & shams, bottom DRAWERS | TOWER shelves & swing arm sconces | Dresser & lamp | wall mirror | closet with hangers & shoes shelf ✦SHARED full bath ✦Hallway CLOSET | EXTRA blankets & sheets OUTDOOR ✦DRIVEWAY: 2 vehicles ✦FRONT patio | lounge chairs ✦SCREENED-IN porch: outdoor Lounge chairs & Coffee table | ceiling fan | Bar cart | outdoor rug | Bistro lights | solar lanterns ✦Spacious patio | Hardscaped floor | outdoor DINING sets for SIX | Built-in brick fire pit with lounge chairs | 5 burner BBQ gas grill & utensils, grill cover ✦LARGE backyard: FULLY fenced | landscaped Guest access Everyone has access to the entire house | exception of any locked spaces & attic. column77: North Downtown home with 2,500 square feet of living space and a fully fenced in backyard. Hardwood floors throughout. A mile to the historic Downtown Mall. *If the dates you need are unavailable, message us. We may be able to accommodate your request. Please check out our sister property, Park Street Cottage: airbnb.com/h/parkstreetcottage22902 It is located 0.5 miles from Long Street Cottage. 10-minute walk/2-minute drive. The space Stately home with high ceilings, large open concept floor plan, large rooms, lots of light, and super close to the downtown mall, 29, and UVA. Take a stroll down the gorgeous Locust Ave or enjoy your own space with a fenced in yard, front porch that feels like you're in your own private tower, or the large covered back deck. There is a master suite with full bath on both levels (Main & Upper). There are 3 additional bedrooms upstairs as well as an additional bathroom. All bedrooms have king beds. There’s also a full sized sleeper sofa in the living room and a half bath on the main level.

column64: Tranquility meets beauty at this historic home located within minutes of the Blue Ridge Parkway, Shenandoah National Park, Wintergreen, and countless wineries and breweries. The entire home and spacious yard are yours to enjoy. Relax in the newly updated rooms decorated with lovely art. Fully stocked kitchen, fast WiFi, and two porches. A 10-minute walk will take you to downtown Waynesboro, restaurants, coffee shops, and the two-mile Greenway Trail on the South River. The space This is a two-story brick house built in 1910 with beautiful craftsman details and original wood flooring. The 10-foot ceilings give it a spacious feel, but expect the bathrooms to be a bit smaller than modern standards. Part of the charm of the house is its history, and its nuances are those of a bygone era. The house is centrally heated. A/C is provided by three brand-new, low-profile window units, one in each bedroom. We've found that running the units and keeping the bedroom doors open keeps the whole house cool. You are also welcome to skip the A/C and open the windows at night to allow in the cool Blue Ridge Mountain air.

column33: Pack ’n play/Travel crib - always at the listing
column76: This home located in Charlottesville, VA offers a peaceful private setting on a wooded 20 acre parcel with close proximity to UVA (5 miles), historic downtown (7 miles), wineries, breweries and much more! The home features a large outdoor deck, patio area with fire pit, hot tub and a unique koi fish pond with the peaceful sound of a waterfall. Inside features 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, a fully equipped kitchen, dishwasher, washer/dryer and much more. The space The master bedroom has a king size bed and private bath. The second bedroom consists of a bunk bed with 1 full and 1 twin size bed. The second bath is a full bath and accessible in the common area. The kitchen is stocked with pots and pans and basic cooking supplies. There is a desk in bedroom 2 for those who work remotely. The home is a total of 1200 sq feet. Please note there is a garage below the house and is not available for guest use. There is ample amounts of free parking. Guest access Guests receive a unique number code to enter the house via keyless entry through the front door. Guests have access to the entire house, which is completely equipped for a comfortable stay. Other things to note Please note, this home is on a gravel driveway 0.5miles from paved road. During the winter months, all-wheel/4wheel drive may be needed to access the home during inclement weather. Additionally, if firewood is present you may use for the outdoor firepit. However, this is not guaranteed. Please either forage the property or bring your own firewood if you plan to enjoy the firepit. There are a total of 3 smart TVs in the home. There is no cable television. You may log into any of your favorite apps if you wish to watch TV during your stay.
column83: Charlottesville home - hot tub, fire pit & pond

column78: Peace awaits as you drive across the dam and up the hill to this unique and cozy cabin. Visitors have exclusive use of the hillside on which the cabin sits but can also walk the trails, fish, or just sit by the large pond on the rest of the property. Many types of wildlife around the cabin can be enjoyed by sight and sound. And our friendly goats love greetings from visitors. Convenient to Charlottesville, UVA, shopping, wineries, breweries, Shenandoah Park/Skyline Drive, Monticello… The space The cabin has most expected modern amenities (minus a dishwasher and dryer). There is a well-equipped kitchen with a well-stocked pantry. The high-speed Internet is reliable. Comfortable beds and a wood stove add to the general warmth and coziness. Do be mindful on the driveway. There are two short spots that are quite steep. These are manageable by all vehicles. Just be aware. 15 minutes to shopping, 30 minutes to Downtown Charlottesville & UVa, 35 minutes to Skyline Drive. Wineries as little as 10 minutes. There is easy access to these many things and more that the Charlottesville area offers. Guest access Guests have access to the entire property and exclusive access to the cabin and the immediate surrounding area. Other things to note Open to extended bookings.

column50: Visit this wonderful lakefront home with the entire family for lake access and a private dock. This house's 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms make it ideal for vacationing with friends and family. On more than two acres of lakefront land, this large three-level home on Lake Greene offers plenty of space. A calm, relaxed atmosphere is provided by expansive lake views. There is plenty of space to float, swim, fish, kayak, paddle board, enjoy the wildlife, or simply curl up and read. The space The great home features 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. The master bedroom features a king-size bed, on suite bathroom, and a private deck. The other two upstairs bedrooms each have two queen size bunk beds and one shared hall bathroom. The basement contains a sectional sofa with a queen size pull-out bed and a full bathroom. The living room has an extra large sofa that hits 5-6 people. All floors have access to a deck, the main floor deck has a sectional sofa, 6 person dining table, a gas grill, and an electric smoker. The basement deck includes relaxing Adirondack chairs. Outside there is a large lakefront backyard leading to the 70-acre lake. It's perfect for canoeing, kayaking, and fishing; feel free to bring your own equipment. To maintain the integrity of the neighborhood and abide by local permitting policies; amplified sound/music is never allowed outside on this property. Outdoor camping which also includes RVs and campers is not allowed. Guest access Guests have full access to the house, however, the hall closet and the garage are off-limits. Other things to note The house is very convenient located 15 minutes from the Shenandoah mountains, 20 minutes to Charlottesville, 30 Massanutten, 45 minutes to Harrisonburg, and 90 minutes to D.C. With tons of wineries and breweries nearby.

column83: It's the perfect spot for exploring all Nelson County has to offer: Blue Ridge Parkway, Appalachian Trail, Shenandoah National Park, Hiking, Biking, Award winning Beer, Wine, and Cider are just minutes away. Golf,and Skiing are available at nearby Wintergreen Resort. Walking distance to grocery, restaurants, post office, ABC and hardware store. Dogs are welcome in our home, large fenced back yard! Hope you will come stay with us and enjoy your home away from home. The space 3 bedroom 1 bath on one acre. Large fenced area right out the back door for your furry friends to stretch their legs. You will be sharing the house with the owners Guest access You have your own bedroom shared bath , access to kitchen and laundr.y plenty of parking. PLenty of grounds and firepits a screened in back patio and grill and best of all a large fenced in area for your pet. During your stay You will be on your own. I am available by text or phone call for anything you may need Other things to note You will need to share the house , bath and kitchen with us especially during the week. owner has work on the weekends.

column65: Come explore the Blue Ridge Mountains in style at this elegantly designed Afton farmhouse, complete with tranquil wooded views, a gourmet kitchen, and plenty of aesthetically pleasing spaces to unwind with your family and friends. The 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath country farmhouse is located minutes from award winning wineries and breweries! Just minutes from Shenandoah National Park and the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway. NOW DOG FRIENDLY WITH $100 FEE/STAY! The space Come explore the Blue Ridge Mountains in style at this elegantly designed Afton farmhouse, complete with tranquil wooded views, a gourmet kitchen, and plenty of aesthetically pleasing spaces to unwind with your family and friends. The 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath country farmhouse is located minutes from award winning wineries and breweries! Just minutes from Shenandoah National Park and the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway. NOW DOG FRIENDLY WITH $100 FEE/STAY! Below you will find a breakdown of this farmhouse's 1,900 sq ft First Floor: LIVING ROOM: 2 sofas, accent chairs, coffee table, smart TV KITCHEN: Fully equipped, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar w/ seating, cooking basics, spices, dishware & flatware, Crock-Pot, blender, Keurig coffee maker SUNROOM: foosball table, wall-mount scrabble game LAUNDRY: washer and dryer located in closet right off of the dining room. Detergent is provided for guests! BEDROOM 1: Queen bed, nightstands with lamps, smart TV, bench BATHROOM 1: Private en-suite for queen bedroom with single vanity, toilet, walk-in shower, toiletries provided Second Floor: LOUNGE/LANDING: Loveseat, TV, video & board games BEDROOM 2: King bed, nightstands with lamps, bench, closet with hangers BEDROOM 3: King bed, nightstands with lamps, chair, closet with hangers BEDROOOM 4: Two twin bunk beds (sleeps 4), dresser, closet with hangers, wall-mount basketball hoop BATHROOM 2: Single vanity, toilet, walk-in shower, toiletries provided Outdoor: Deck w/ gas grill (propane not provided), fire pit with lounge chairs, climbing geodome, kids soccer goal NOTE: If you are traveling with a larger party, please check out the Afton Clubhouse, located right next door. If you plan to use the fire pit, please make arrangements to purchase your own firewood.

column80: Nestled in the heart of the picturesque Rockfish Valley, this modern, airy farmhouse is the perfect Shenandoah getaway, with Blue Ridge mountain views, easy access to Shenandoah National Park and Wintergreen Ski Resort, and just minutes to all the wineries and breweries on Nelson 151 (aka the Brew Ridge Trail). Enjoy a glass of local wine on the front porch or cozy up by the warm fire pit. Located on a private 2.5-acre lot in the heart of Virginia wine country, the location simply can’t be beat! The space With 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, a spacious living room, a modern dining room, an eat-in kitchen and 2.5 acres of mountain magic, the Blue Ridge Bungalow has plenty of space for everyone to unwind and connect. Enjoy a cold beer sitting around the fire pit after a day hiking or a bottle of wine on the front porch after a day of, well, probably drinking more wine. Located right off Highway 151 within minutes of countless breweries, vineyards, and outdoor adventures, the Blue Ridge Bungalow was thoughtfully designed with your vacation needs in mind. Enjoy all the comforts of home (plus some extra details!) in the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains! We've poured our heart and soul into updating the home with modern amenities, fun designs, and touches from our favorite places across the world. We know you'll love the house as much as we do! Features of the Blue Ridge Bungalow include: - Huge eat-in kitchen with open floor plan leading into the living room with Smart TV, vaulted ceilings (18 feet), mountain views, and tons of natural light. - Kitchen is fully stocked with gas stove, dishwasher, pots, pans, baking sheets, dishes, glasses, and cooking utensils for all your cooking needs. - Enjoying a fire in the large fire pit with mountain views is the perfect way to end the day! - Large patio in the backyard with outdoor dining table and gas grill. - Sip your morning coffee in the sun-filled breakfast nook or rocking on the porch swing on the welcoming front porch. Coffee maker with Keurig and coffee supplies are provided. - 50 inch Smart TV with the ability to log-in to your streaming services. - Four bedrooms (1 king, 2 queens, and 2 twin beds) sleep 8 guests comfortably. - Two full bathrooms with double vanities plus a half-bath off the kitchen. - Master suite includes a bonus sun room, pillow-top king bed, walk-in shower, and dual vanities. - Large, modern dining room seats 8, with room for 4 more in the breakfast nook. - Washing machine and dryer are available for guests. - Eco-friendly: solar panels across the roof ensure our environmental footprint is minimal! - High speed internet (100+ mbps), allowing for multiple devices and streaming with no problems. - Two desks/designated workspaces make this the perfect place to work remotely, even with the whole family. - We have a Polaroid camera stocked with film for our guests to capture memories from their weekend at the house! Games and puzzles are also provided to help keep the whole group entertained. Guest access Guests will have access to the entire Blue Ridge Bungalow and surrounding 2.5 acres. Please make yourself at home! Other things to note While we are located out in the country, we do have neighbors within shouting distance so please be courteous and adhere to quiet hours after 10:00 PM. No parties or events. No unregistered guests unless approved by host.

column67: Afton Bliss is the perfect space for a family getaway, wedding guests, girls' weekend, or trip with friends! Situated right off Nelson 151 less than1/2 mile from Brewing Tree Beer Co. & close to wedding destinations-vineyards. This home sleeps 10 with 2.5 bathrooms, converted garage game room & outdoor firepit. Stay-in or take a short drive to explore the outdoors and all that Nelson County has to offer. The space Afton Bliss is the perfect space for a family getaway, wedding guests, girls' weekend, or trip with friends! Situated right off Nelson 151 less than1/2 mile from Brewing Tree Beer Co. & close to wedding destinations-vineyards. This home sleeps 10 with 2.5 bathrooms, converted garage game room & outdoor firepit. Stay-in or take a short drive to explore the outdoors and all that Nelson County has to offer. The layout and details of Afton Bliss are laid out below: LIVING ROOM - Large, open living area with sectional seating (seating for 6-8), 2 chairs, large flat screen TV, gas fireplace, and games. KITCHEN - Fully stocked kitchen with all major appliances (please note that the range is gas), eat-in dining space with seating for 8, WFH desk space, and coffee bar (drip coffee maker). BATHROOM 1 - Half bath located off of the kitchen. GAME ROOM - Converted garage (does not have heating or air, space heaters and fans provided, or open the garage door to enjoy the outdoors) with pool table, seating area for 7-9, giant jenga, and bean bag toss game. SECOND FLOOR: BEDROOM 1 - Queen bed, Full over Full bunk beds, large walk-in closet with additional folding mattress, console with electric fireplace, Smart TV, and en suite bathroom. BATHROOM 2 - Full bathroom with combination shower/tub BEDROOM 2 - King bed, 2 nightstands with lamps, and full closet. BATHROOM 3 - Located between Bedroom 2 and Bedroom 3, full bathroom with combination shower/tub BEDROOM 3 - Queen bed, 2 nightstands with lamps, and 2 closet spaces. LAUNDRY - Laundry closet with washer and dryer located in hallway. ADDITIONAL NOTES: OUTDOOR - Seating area provided on front porch with firepit and Adirondack chairs located in the yard between the house and additional garage accessory building. PETS - Maximum of 2 pets allowed with $100 fee. Parking available onsite (gravel driveway and walkway)

column89: Peaceful and private , this well-built, cozy log cabin boasts beautiful panoramic views. It has two spacious living areas with 2 wood burning stoves, kitchen with island that seats 2, and a dining area that seats six comfortably. The French doors open onto the deck w/seating for six. This cloistered gem is less than 30 minutes from downtown Charlottesville and Lynchburg, VA, 20 minutes to Wintergreen Resort, and close to renowned VA wineries, brew, distill, Shenandoah Valley, and Skyline Drive. The space Guests have sole, undisturbed (possible exception of woodland critters) use of the 2400 sq. foot cabin, clearing around it, and long steep winding picturesque driveway with pond leading up to cabin. Guest access The entire cabin, which guests frequently remark is much larger than it looks in pictures, is available. This includes use of the laundry room. column92: 2023 Vrbo 5/5 Secluded Getaway This property is beautiful! Very secluded and peaceful. It was very well equipped and had a very warm and comfortable feeling. column67: A two-bedroom, classic small home in beautiful downtown Charlottesville. A quiet place on a quiet street, no animals, no smoking. 8 blocks from the downtown mall, the hub of this small city, where you'll find Live Arts Theater, Pavilion, Paramount, Jefferson, Front Porch, Millers, 5 independent book stores, bars, restaurants, cafes, City Hall, etc. (1.2 miles to UVA Hospital; 1.5 to UVA Rotunda). Two blocks from Brazos Tacos, IX Art Park, and the Saturday morning City Farmers Market. The space Single floor, street level, no steps or stairs. There is free, always available, street parking; fibreOptic wifi from Ting; a full eat-in kitchen, living room, bathroom, tiled shower/bath, and two bedrooms - one queen sized bed, one full-sized futon couch — and a single pullout bed in the living room. Simple and cared for, a true Airbnb - when not rented, it's my home. Guest access Access to the one story, two bedroom house, a front porch with table and chairs, and the surrounding lawn/landscaping. Other things to note Note: There is no washer/dryer in this house.

column69: Welcome to Montrose Manor in the heart of Belmont! Let this beautiful and newly renovated space be your home base while you explore all that the Charlottesville area has to offer. The space Montrose Manor is a newly renovated 1920’s home that was brought back to life with tons of character and charm. You can’t beat the location and it’s walkability to the many restaurants that Belmont has to offer as well as IX Park & Belmont Park. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bedroom home offers separate spaces (and kitchens!) if you're traveling with a group but would also appreciate your privacy as well. The downstairs “flat” offers 2 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms and a fully stocked kitchen and living room. The upstairs “loft” offers one bedroom, a full bath and a fully stocked mini kitchen as well! We know you’ll love Montrose Manor and we can’t wait to host you! Guest access You will have full access to the entire home and property
column76: Montrose Manor- In the heart of Belmont!

column40: Located in Historic Beautiful Belmont neighborhood, only a 6 minute walk to the Downtown Mall. There are many critically acclaimed restaurants all within a 1 minute walk of the place. Designed in a rustic bohemian style, this place definitely represents Charlottesville! Please note $150 pet fee per pet (for stays 4 nights or less) to be paid after booking. The space This is a roughly 700 square foot 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment with a living room and a bonus room (dining room/seating space). It has a huge balcony with an additional 250 square feet of space, with a view overlooking Downtown Belmont. PLEASE READ: This is an Historic older building so please keep in mind while it has tons of rustic bohemian charm, this is by no means new or modern. The entry stairway leading to unit and the common entryway foyer are quite run down and old looking. There are nicks and marks on walls and floor of unit. It only shares floor with one unit, and part of the kitchen wall with a side unit (bedroom does not share wall with neighbor), but you can hear muffled sounds from neighbors (as they can hear you), akin to most apartment buildings without concrete or brick walls. It is clean, very inviting and nice-looking, but if you are looking for new quality with few imperfections, this is not it. Other things to note Pets are allowed with a $150 fee per each pet for stays of 4 nights or fewer (pet fee will be greater for stays over 4 nights so please ask before booking if you'd like to check the longer stay pet fee amount). You MUST let me know about any pets in your welcome AirBnB message. *Pet fee is to be paid after booking. Pet fee is NOT included in the booking price that AirBnB collects, whether or not you mark pets in the reservation.* I ask you to NOT let pets on any furniture or beds and to pick up any waste in the yard.

column71: Walk to UVA Rotunda! Perfectly situated in the heart of Charlottesville, this beautiful home is located a 3-10 min walking distance to the UVA hospital, the Corner (a walkable block of shops and restaurants), Main Street and the Dairy Market (Cville's food hall)! Comfortable & well appointed, this home is perfect for travel nurses, families, and those looking to experience the best of what Charlottesville has to offer. The space This is a comfortable, spacious single family home in a prime, walkable location. Lots of natural light, simple modern furnishings and everything you need to enjoy Charlottesville living! On the first floor, there is a cozy, bright living room with smart TV which opens up to the dining room. You'll find a half bath in the hall and a large, open kitchen with lots of natural light at the back. There is an eat-in area with table and chairs and all of the appliances and cooking accessories one might need to enjoy home-cooked meals, including a gas stove, oven, fridge, freezer, toaster, coffee maker, microwave, etc. The back door of the kitchen leads out onto the raised back deck, overlooking the large backyard. The second floor includes 3 bedrooms with their own closets. The first bedroom is very spacious with a queen bed and ensuite bathroom featuring a shower. The second has a twin bed and doubles as the office with a desk and chair and plenty of space to work. The third has a queen bed. There is also a full hall bathroom with tub and shower. Plenty of outdoor space for your family or pets - enjoy coffee in the morning on the front porch, lunch on the back deck or gather around the fire pit in the fenced-in backyard. The basement level includes a washer and dryer! Guest access The rental includes the entire home and fenced-in yard.

column90: Welcome to the Wooder House, a cozy haven in the heart of Virginia's beautiful Nelson County! Enjoy relaxing and connecting in a private, comfortable home centered on 38 acres. - Peaceful, forested getaway - Perfect for nature lovers - Great for folks with kids and/or dogs - Fully stocked kitchen - Abundant hiking options nearby - 8+ min. to wineries, breweries, cideries, restaurants - 25 min. to Wintergreen Resort For more photos and fun area recs, check us out on IG: @thewooderhouse The space The Wooder House is a ~1900 sq foot, 4 bedroom, 3 story home centered on a 38 acre property. Our home is perfect for families, friends, and couples looking for a cozy space to chill together in the woods. Your pups will love it too! Our favorite inside feature: huge windows in the common area that let you enjoy the outside views from the inside. NEARBY: The amazing offerings of Nelson County (and beyond!) are all just a short drive away! Breweries (12min+), cideries (15min+), wineries (8min+), Wintergreen resort (~25min), so many hiking options to choose from, and more! KITCHEN: Fully stocked for all your food and drink prep needs - cooking tools, pans, and other essentials (spices, oil, etc), drip AND french press coffee maker options, blender, crockpot, hand mixer, a grill outside, serving dishes, cocktail shaker, and plenty of space to store your food. BEDROOMS: 3 bedrooms with queen beds, and another with 2 twins (day bed and a trundle). One bedroom (queen) is on the first floor, and the other bedrooms are all on the second floor. BATHROOMS: 2 bathrooms - 1 with a shower/no tub (first floor) and 1 with a luxurious window-side tub/no shower (second floor). A sweet outdoor shower is also available from roughly May to October. Note: While our home can sleep 8, we suggest a max of 6 adults. FIRE: Inside there is a cozy wood burning stove, and outside there is a smokeless fire pit set up. We provide firewood as well as fire starters (and s'mores sticks!). ELECTRONICS/TECH: Great Wifi for those who want it! A discreet 80in projector screen on the first floor w/AppleTV, 50in FireTV on the third floor (in the loft), Netflix included, bluetooth speakers, and our favorite feature - a record player. Enjoy our carefully cultivated vinyl collection while you take in the view from inside. =o) LOFT: We call the third floor the loft." In this open room (no door)

column52: Located in the historic Basic City of Waynesboro, Virginia. Basic City Lofts embraces architectural details respecting the integrity of the former building. The loft offers a fully appointed kitchen and bath, new appliances, new floors, and cozy furnishings. Nestled in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. A short drive from many scenic excursions, outdoor activities, vineyards and breweries. Ideally located minutes from downtown this unique residence is also within four major hospitals. Other things to note This is an urban setting on Main Street in a small town. So there will be sounds associated with city living which include traffic, motor vehicles trucks, and trains. For most the noise is not a problem however if you are very sensitive to noise please keep this in mind. White noise machines are provided for those who prefer to use them.

column59: More Photos Coming Soon! Spacious house in the rolling hills of Virginia near the Rivanna River. Close to downtown Charlottesville(8 miles) and UVA. A few miles from Monticello, Highland, Jefferson Vineyard, Simeon Market(coffee shop with baked goods and sandwiches), and Carter's Mountain Orchard. More vineyards nearby. Kayaks, rented from the Rivanna River Company, are a fun way to explore the river. If you are interested in a monthly rate send an inquiry. The space This is a whole house rental—3 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom upstairs. Downstairs is a one-bedroom/1 bathroom apartment which we Airbnb already. Feel free to look it up Green Willow Farm apartment near Monticello" . Upstairs
column61: large farm kitchen that overlooks the fields. Large farm table for gathering. Woodstove. Living room with fireplace
column62: many books. Large TV. No cable but access to Netflix
column64: Amazon and other streaming services. Board games. Deck with a large table for outside eating—other garden spaces for outside eating and relaxing. Bonfire pit. Guest access Feel free to enjoy the patio and walk the fields. You can go into the large vegetable garden but keep gates closed. (Deer are awaiting entrance whenever there is an opportunity! Bunnies dine in the garden
column65: at will.) garden/patio area. There is a mowed path around the edges of the property that you are welcome to walk. Other things to note We are on a rural road and there are no street lights to light your way at night. We do have solar lights at the entrance and leading up to the apartment so there should be no trouble finding your way. It's fun to see wildlife in the field
column68: fox... something to note about the fox is their communication style - a loud shrill scream - just them getting to know each other. . . :) There is some solar electric fence around the sheep pasture. Best to avoid. And don't go in the pasture with the sheep. Though friendly
column69: these male sheep will express that by butting you

column41: Your family will be close to everything when you stay at our home in the coveted Rugby Road neighborhood. We are located a mile from the UVA historic Rotunda/grounds, stadium & gardens, The Corner & Barracks Road Shopping, or a concert at the JPJ Arena. The many more restaurants and unique shops of C-ville’s downtown historic walking mall are within 2-5 miles. And our large deck off the kitchen and fenced yard offers a lovely outdoor dining spot, or just soaking in the afternoon sun. The space This is a 3 bedroom, 2 bath home. The primary is located on the first floor with a king bed and window to the landscaped front yard. The spa like bath with a walk-in shower is located across the hall. The second floor w/dormers offer a 2nd bedroom with a king and lovely morning light and the 3rd is perfect for a single with a comfy twin and skylight. The shared second floor bath offers a walk in shower with skylight. The family room with fireplace and large tv are perfect for relaxing. Our kitchen is the heart of our home, fully stocked to meet your cooking needs and just hang out. The outdoor deck includes a Weber gas grill and large teak table/furniture. Please note that this is our primary residence so there will be personal items including artwork (some fragile) and the closets and draws will have items. We love our light filled home and hope you will too. Guest access Guests will have access the the first and second floors of our home. As well as the yard, garden, deck, parking. Access to the washer and dryer must be arranged in advance. Other things to note Please note that this is our primary residence so there will be personal items including artwork (some fragile) and the closets and draws will have items. We love our light filled home and hope you will too.
column48: Rugby Road Retreat - walking distance to UVA.

column42: Poseidon is a newly renovated studio on the Water Street side of the Downtown Mall! The space Poseidon is a newly renovated studio on the Water Street side of the Downtown Mall! This bright and airy unit is around the corner from the Historic Downtown Mall itself and will be quieter than other spaces facing the Mall, yet still easily accessible to all the dining and shopping the Mall has to offer! During the Spring through early Fall the City Market farmer's market is held right across the street. *Please be aware, no parking is included with this rental, the most economical option is the Water Street parking garage a few blocks down. **Note: The name of this property has recently changed, it was formerly called Water Street #2!**
column49: The Poseidon - Studio apt near Downtown Mall

column39: Beautifully decorated and well-stocked place with vaulted ceilings, skylights, indoor fireplace and private balcony. You are conveniently located within a 5-10 minute drive of all Charlottesville has to offer while also being able to leave town (for wineries or hikes etc) very easily with quick access to highway and major roads. The space This is a spacious 2 bedroom 1 bathroom condo with vaulted ceilings, skylights and beautiful hardwood floors. It has a private balcony facing many trees with dining table and Papasan chair for relaxing. Please note $100 pet fee per pet to be paid after booking and before check-in. There is a nice dining area. There is also a working indoor fireplace to set the mood (you provide your own firewood and starter etc if you’d like to use). Our place is beautifully decorated. The kitchen is well stocked for all basic cooking.. The bedroom is very spacious again with vaulted ceilings. It has blackout curtains to get completely dark to sleep in past sunrise. There is a laundry room with washer and dryer you may use (although cleaner will often leave a load in these so you’ll just need to remove what is in there first). There is a lot with free easy parking. It is a simple self checkin process. The place is easy to find with GPS. Other things to note You MUST mention any pets you have in your welcome message. Pets are allowed with pet fee of $100 per pet, for stays of 4 nights or below. The pet fee for more than 4 nights depends on length of stay, so please ask before booking. AirBnB allows you to mark pets in your booking but this pet fee is NOT added to your booking total. This pet fee is additional and to be paid AFTER booking and before check-in.
column46: Vaulted Ceilings, Private Balcony, Near Everything

column38: HDTV with standard cable, Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max
column63: My place is close to the University of Virginia, to the major shopping centers (Barracks Road, Stonefield, Fashion Square), to the Downtown Mall, Monticello, Shenandoah National Park, and the Charlottesville (CHO) airport. You’ll love my place because of the beautiful setting - it's a small, quiet, wooded neighborhood located in the middle of the city. The house has a front porch and beautiful back deck. My place is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The space Private room with private bathroom, closet, small fridge for guests, outdoor porch and patio available, access to kitchen and laundry room. Guest access Guest private room and bathroom. Kitchen for making coffee or tee, microwave, small oven. During your stay I can help guest with advice. I have been living in Charlottesville for about 30 years. I can be reached by phone and e-mail.

column71: Updated, 3 story townhouse with comfortable decor, mountain views. Excellent location, convenient to downtown, 5th St, UVA, Monticello, and I-64 yet in a quiet neighborhood. Main level has a kitchen, open living/dining area. Windowed doors to deck with gorgeous views! Top floor has 2 master bedrooms with ensuite baths and memory foam queen beds. The master on the ground level includes a queen bed, pull out sofa bed, sitting area with TV, walk out porch, brand new bathroom and large closet. The space Smartly designed, newly updated, 3 story townhouse with comfortable, modern decor and views of Carter Mountain Orchard. Excellent location just minutes to downtown Charlottesville, 5th St. Station, UVA, Monticello, PVCC and I-64 yet tucked away from the hustle and bustle in a quiet, established neighborhood. Starting with the 2 story foyer, the main level flows from the updated kitchen into the open dining and living spaces which includes a gas fireplace for those chilly days. There is plenty of natural light to enjoy from the 10 foot ceilings and 3 large patio doors that open onto the private deck with mountain views. The upstairs boasts 2 master suites with vaulted ceilings and full bathrooms. The primary bedroom with lovely water and mountain views. The spacious terrace level studio includes a living area, queen bed, new full bath and a private patio with garden space. Wonderful gathering spaces to enjoy for a group yet perfect separate spaces to relax in at the end of a busy day touring Charlottesville and it’s beautiful surrounding areas! Guest access Entire townhouse Other things to note Keypad entry

column82: This recently-renovated contemporary home is light-filled and spacious. You'll feel like you're in a treehouse, tucked in a quiet neighborhood and surrounded by a serene forest. The back deck overlooks a beautiful wooded space with trails and streams. Inside, the gracious kitchen is a natural gathering space. Porches and decks surround the house on all sides. Centrally located, our home is less than ten minutes from Downtown C-ville, UVA grounds, restaurants, shopping, and art/ music venues. The space With a large kitchen/ living room, a separate tv room, and three bedrooms, there's plenty of room to spend time together as a group, and also spread out and have your own space. The entire house has been recently renovated with custom cabinetry throughout. The serene wooded environment and spacious porches provide the feeling of being on a retreat...right in the city! Guest access You'll have access to the main part of the house -- kitchen, living room, den, porches, three bedrooms and two bathrooms. There's also a basement apartment to which you will not have access.
column89: Spacious Modern Retreat, minutes from Downtown

column58: Comfort and style are the core of this classic Charlottesville home located in one of the most desirable neighborhoods minutes from UVA Grounds. The space The front door opens to reveal original parquet wood floors and a welcoming foyer. To the right is the updated kitchen that has everything one needs to prepare a full meal plus a designated wine refrigerator and bar seating. The dining table has space for 4 plus two soul-warming club chairs that you could read a whole book in. In the living room, you'll find plenty of seating and a large smart TV. The primary Queen bedroom is located on the main level as is the main full bath of the home - **note the main bath is a bit narrow due to the older design of the home. Up the stairs, there is a Queen bed plus second Queen bedroom. Through the French doors off the living room is the large, bricked patio and backyard perfect for gathering. A propane grill is provided for guest use. ***Detached Twin Guest Suite - Bedroom 3*** Just off the patio is the detached suite with twin bed and second full bathroom. Off-street parking is available in the driveway with room for 3-4 vehicles. . Greenleaf Park is also just around the corner, perfect for some extra space to play.
column65: GreenLeaf | 3 bed, 2 Bath in Rugby Hills

column41: Pack ’n play/Travel crib - always at the listing
column67: Coffee maker: drip coffee maker, Keurig coffee machine, pour-over coffee
column83: Sit back, relax, and soak in the views. The Rockfish Retreat is nestled in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, right in the heart of the Nelson 151 Winery/Brewery Trail. And it has everything you need for a fun and relaxing family get away: hot tub; fire pits, walking trail, toys/games, high-speed fiber internet, and most importantly, peace and quiet. We love the time that we get to spend in Afton and hope you do too! The space Upstairs: Our large living room with mountain views, a large couch, wide-screen smart tv, and wood burning fireplace. The kitchen has a gas range and all the necessities for preparing a meal at home: pots, pans, cookware, crockpot, dishes, glasses, coffee makers, etc. The dinning table looks out onto a Juliet Balcony and to the rolling hills beyond. There is also access to the screened-in porch and deck that flows down to the patio. The porch gets lovely morning sun and is a great place to enjoy your morning coffee even during the winter. The Primary Bedroom is also upstairs and has 1 King Bed, an on-suite bathroom, and a walk-out to porch. The washer/dryer are also upstairs and are located off the hall next to a half-bath. Downstairs: The downstairs living room has a Futon, Packman machine, and large smart tv. When we are here our kids manage to occupy themselves here, which means we can have a peaceful start to our day upstairs. There is also a small play room down stairs (think cupboard under the stairs from Harry Potter) with a doll house and toys. The First Downstairs Bedroom has 1 Queen Bed , 1 Twin Bed, and a desk. The twin bed is in a nook that offers a little privacy (in terms of line of sight). This bedroom also has direct access to our patio and hut tub. The Second Downstairs Bedroom has 1 Full Bed, and 2 Twins (bunk bed). It also has closet where we keep some toys. There is also a Full Bath downstairs and a Utility Room where we keep a few outdoor games. Patio/Outdoor: Outside you'll find our 7-person Marquis Hot Tub, fire pit (with outdoor couch and adirondack chairs), hammock and covered outdoor dining table. The front yard contains a second fire pit next to the woodpile. And there is a walking trail that leads down to an old spring house. During the summer we also have slip and slide and small inflatable pool that you a welcome to use. Guest access Entire home. We use contactless check-in with a smart lock. Your unique code will be provided to you before you arrive and can be used throughout your stay. Please note that two cabinets in the kitchen and the closet in the primary bedroom are reserved for use by the owners. The road leading to our house is narrow and has several blind curves. There are also a lot of deer. Please drive slowly. Please note that if there is significant snow, you will need a 4-wheel or all-wheel drive vehicle to make it all the way to the house before the road can be plowed. Other things to note There isn't a better location in Nelson County. We are just a short drive away from so many wonderful attractions. (Driving times are approximate). Breweries: Blue Mountain Brewery (Food) - 7 min. Brewing Tree (Food) - 3 min. WildManDan'Brewery - 4 min. Devels Backbone (Food) - 15 min. Hazy Mountain (Food) - 11 min. Wood Ridge Farm Brewery (Food) - 16 min. Pro Re Nata (Food) - 15 min. Basic City Beer Co. - 17 min. Starr Hill Brewery - 21 min. Wineries Veritas (Light Food) - 9 min. Afton Mountain Vineyards - 11 min. Flying Fox - 6 min. Valley Road - 8 min. Cardinal Point - 7 min. King Family Vineyards and Polo (Food Trucks) - 19 min. Hazy Mountain (Food) - 11 min. Pollak Vineyards - 12 min. Pippin Hill (Light Food) - 26 min. Cideries: Bold Rock (Food) - 14 min. Blue Toad - 16 min. Albermarle Cider Works - 26 min. Distilleries: Silverback Distillery - 3 min. Virginia Distillery - 21 min. Other Attractions: Trager Brothers Coffee - 8 min. Blue Ridge Tunnel - 12 min. Lake Monocan - 14 min. Critzer Family Farm (berry picking) - 8 min. Chile's Peach Orchard (peaches and apples) - 17 min. Playground/Mud Kitchen - 13 min. Wintergreen Slopes - 27 min. Stoney Creek Golf at Wintergreen - 19 min. Humpback Rock - 23 min. Scott Stadium (UVA) - 28 min. Charlottesville's Downtown Mall - 33 min.
column90: The Rockfish Retreat: Mountain Views and Hot Tub

column39: Clothing storage: walk-in closet, closet, and dresser
column88: MOUNTAIN MAMA - The home for gorgeous Blue Ridge Mountain views : ) Situated on a graceful 25 acres minutes off Rt. 151, our mountainside home is nestled within the beautiful Rockfish Valley and offers incredible views from every window in a truly unique and newly renovated home. Enjoy sunsets over 3600’ Humpback Mountain due west and sunrises lighting up the valley ridges. If you need time to be inspired by nature’s beauty, this home offers a rare breath of fresh air! Book your stay today! The space Our home sits on a spacious 25 acres with one of the most spectacular views in all of Nelson County! KITCHEN/LIVING SPACE: The kitchen features all new appliances, baking dishes, new pots and pans, dishes, utensils, and knife set. We also have a coffee station with Keurig stocked with k-cups. Open to the kitchen is the TV and couch area. Off the TV room is a relaxing room with couch, reclining swivel chairs and a desk with chair. The ground level also features its own kitchenette along with a couch and TV. BEDROOMS: The home has four bedrooms, each with one bed. Our second floor master suite features a king-size bed, chaise lounge, chair and bench, walk-in tile shower, tub and private balcony. Two additional guest bedrooms are also located upstairs, one with a king-size bed and another with a queen-size bed with memory foam mattresses. Main bath upstairs features a shower/tub and also has a double vanity. Ground level features a queen-size bed with bathroom. OUTDOOR SPACE: The main level deck wraps around the back of house where you can grill with a view. Screen porch is located between kitchen and deck area, with ample seating. The ground floor deck features a hot tub with seating for 6, with an array of lighting options, a waterfall feature and 45 therapy jets. We have a campfire area stocked with wood located down from the house with chairs and a picnic table, which offers a great spot for sunset and stargazing views. GREAT LOCATION: Enjoy the many local vineyards and breweries located nearby and minutes away off Rt. 151. 2 miles to Cardinal Point Winery, 5 miles to Veritas Vineyard and Blue Mountain Brewery, and 10 to Bold Rock and Devil's Backbone breweries. 30 minutes to UVA and Wintergreen 40 minutes to Monticello Guest access You'll be able to use the entire home, including use of our washer and dryer in main floor bathroom if needed. You will not have access to an owner's closet or two locked basement closets. Other things to note We designed our home for no more than eight guests. There are many other places in the area that can accommodate more than eight guests, but unfortunately our home is not one of them. *Please no smoking of any kind in the house* In winter months we strongly encourage guests to have 4WD/AWD. Our gravel driveway is about 300 yards long and steep in a couple spots which may be challenging to navigate in times of inclement winter weather. We do not have satellite or cable TV. Our two TV's are 'Smart' and you can stream through various platforms, but we do not have cable service. There are no TV's located in bedrooms. A crib is set up in an upstairs bedroom (the one with a queen bed) if traveling with an infant or toddler. Finally, be aware that our home is in the mountains, and you may encounter lady bugs or stink bugs during your stay (our home sometimes seems to be a beacon for them :( We do our best to keep them and mice away, but but bugs, bees, and little creatures all merrily live on our mountain too.
column95: Mountain Mama- Amazing Views! + Hot Tub!

column65: Welcome home to this spacious, stylish, and well-appointed townhouse! This home features the best of both worlds -- peace and quiet, mountain views, and easy access to all that Charlottesville has to offer. Just a 20-minute walk to Martha Jefferson Hospital, a 12-minute drive to the UVA Medical Center, and walking distance to grocery stores, shopping, and dining options, this beautiful home will be the perfect home base during your time in Charlottesville! Available for rentals of 30+ days. The space This unit is a private second-floor bedroom with a queen bed, with a full bathroom accessed from the hallway right outside your room. This bathroom may be shared with one other nurse. The townhouse has 3 additional bedrooms that may be rented to other professionals (usually medical) and the main level and downstairs common areas are shared -- this includes a living room, two dens, a kitchen, laundry room, a half bath, a dining area, and a deck. The common areas will be professionally cleaned on a biweekly basis at no cost to you. Guest access The whole house is yours to access with the exception of the other guests' bedrooms and bathrooms. During your stay I live close by and am happy to help with anything that is needed! Other things to note Since this is a shared housing set-up, it is important to be respectful of the other guests at the house. Noise should be kept to a minimum, you should clean up after yourself after using the kitchen, etc. Thanks!

column63: This 1 Bedroom fully equipped duplex is located less then 1 mile from the historic Charlottesville downtown mall. It’s also about 100 yards away from the Rivanna river which offers miles of walking/biking trails. It comes with WiFi, cable, fenced in yard, hammock, picnic table, tiled shower, kitchenette and washer/dryer. An air mattress is in the closet if you need to sleep an extra person or two. This 100+ year old super clean, no smoking, pet friendly house is unique and has great furnishings! Guest access You’ll be given a combination to the door that will change once your stay is over. The entire inside space is yours while staying here and no part of it is shared with anyone.
column70: Cozy furnished 1 BR in C-Ville! No cleaning fee!

column88: Less than a mile from the downtown pedestrian mall, our home has been recently renovated and equipped with all of your group's needs. Stylishly decorated with updated amenities, featuring 4 bedrooms, 3.5 updated bathrooms, open living and dining area. Walking distance from restaurants, free street parking, quiet neighborhood, and plenty of gathering space for your special occasion. The perfect location for a group gathering for a centrally located Charlottesville getaway. (Sorry, no pets). The space The layout: Open concept main floor with living room, dining room, kitchen, and breakfast room all connected. There is a study, master bedroom with full bath, half bath, and screen porch all on the main floor. Total of 4 bedrooms and 3.5 baths. Beds will be made up with fresh linens and plenty of towels are provided for the group. Kitchen stocked with staples such as flour, sugar, and spices for cooking. First floor: The entryway, living room, dining room, kitchen, and breakfast nook are all visible upon entry and great for group hangouts. There is also a study, half bath, and master bedroom/bath on the first floor. (Please do not use the wood stove. ) The dining room seats 12 people at the dining room table. The breakfast nook can seat an additional 6 people. The screen porch table sits 4 for dining. There are 6 chairs on outdoor patio area. Second floor: Guest bedroom 1: Queen bed Full Bathroom with tub and shower Guest bedroom 2: Two twin beds Washer and dryer Lower level/side entry: There is a couch and 2 chairs in the TV room. column73: Mountaintop overlook with jaw dropping views and camp themed interior design. Perched upon Elk Mountain just off the Blue Ridge Parkway this petite chalet is under 30 min from Charlottesville, 10 min to 151 vineyards/breweries/cideries, and 10 min to Waynesboro. Relax in this natural retreat featuring 2 king bedrooms, 2 person soaker tub, double headed shower, and ample kitchen w/many extras. Take in the views from the large deck, firepit, under porch swing, or mountainside adirondack chairs. The space Mountaintop overlook with jaw dropping views and camp themed interior design. Perched upon Elk Mountain just off the Blue Ridge Parkway this petite chalet is under 30 min from Charlottesville, 10 min to 151 vineyards/breweries/cideries, and 10 min to Waynesboro. Relax in this natural retreat featuring 2 king bedrooms, 2 person soaker tub, double headed shower, and ample kitchen w/many extras. Take in the views from the large deck, firepit, under porch swing, or mountainside adirondack chairs. Primarily one level home with sleeping loft. Main floor consists of open concept kitchen, dining, living with electric fireplace. Full bathroom with dual head shower has jack and jill access off the hallway and primary bedroom. Main floor primary bedroom has king bed, walk in closet, and large soaker tub. Laundry is located in the primary bedroom. Upstairs there is a sleeping loft with another king bed. Deck is on the back of the house accessed from the main living/dining areas. From the deck you can see Afton Mountain Vineyard, Veritas, Blue Mountain Brewery, Hazy Mountain and even across to Mont Alto on a clear day. There are approximately 4 steps to get into the front door from the gravel driveway. The one Roku TV is located in the living room. This property was designed for adult guests so anyone wanting to bring children should keep in mind that the property is quite steep and the deck is high off the ground. Note- no ice maker. 4WD or AWD highly recommended in winter- all roads are paved but snow or ice can be prevalent in winter and provide a challenge to 2WD vehicles. While our private road can be accessed directly off the Blue Ridge Parkway we advise arriving via Howardsville TPK to avoid road closures. Weather should always be checked before heading up the mountain as fog can limit visibility. The house does have a generator that kicks on in case of power outage. High speed fiber internet provided. Guest access Guests will have exclusive access to the property during your stay. There is a garage on the property that is not available for guest use. Other things to note 4WD or AWD highly recommended in winter- all roads are paved but snow or ice can be prevalent in winter and provide a challenge to 2WD vehicles. While our private road can be accessed directly off the Blue Ridge Parkway we advise arriving via Howardsville TPK to avoid road closures. Weather should always be checked before heading up the mountain as fog can limit visibility. The house does have a generator that kicks on in case of power outage. High speed fiber internet provided.

column54: I live in this house. The Guest Rooms are totally separate from mine. You may hear me and I may hear you. The only shared area is outside. During your stay If you need to get in touch during your stay texting me is the best way. If you want to meet we can but it is not necessary. It's up to you! column39: My home is centrally located in the City of Charlottesville and is close to everything within the city- restaurants, movie theaters, UVA, UVA hospital; such that most of my guests have been travel nurses and other professionals. It has the added advantage of being located in a quiet cul de sac less than 5 miniutes from the hustle and bustle of a college town. You will find the courtyard a joy to behold if you enjoy the outdoors . The sound of the waterfall is a great backdrop for any gathering. The space I love to decorate and have decorated my home with knick nacks that tell a story of my cultural heritage and exposures. The Master bedroom is decorated with art work from Uzoart. She is my daughter and artist that graduated from UVA as a studio artist. One of the other bedroom's is decorated with French art that captures the different seasons while the other is art is by art students from Charlottesville. The huge piece in the entryway is art from a young budding Nigerian artist, whose works I love. I have supported him by placing his pieces all over. The basement apartment is decorated with several pieces from him. I hope that the spirit of the home speaks to my guests. Guest access My guests are welcome to enjoy the Zen space I have created in the courtyard. There is plenty of sitting available both under the gazebo and dinning area. A grill is available for those who want to barbecue. Other things to note I put my heart into making my home a place that my guests can also call home and appreciate guests that recognize that effort and treat it with respect. I have waived cleaning fees. I however do expect my guests to be considerate of other guests by cleaning after themselves so that everyone can have a great experience. The courtyard at the back is also accessible to guests to relax with a drink, a book or a meal . There is a basement apartment which is not part of this listing. Note that Laundry facility is not offered as a part of my listing. There is a laundromat about 2 miles from the house.

column68: This hidden gem is the perfect place to stay for 1-4 guests! Located in the heart of Charlottesville, you will be just a short walk or drive away from your favorite places! We are only 1 mile away from the UVA stadium (~20 min walk) and 2.5 miles from the downtown mall (~5 minute drive). The neighborhood is family friendly and great for going on walks. You will be within walking distance to Atlas Coffee & Fry's Spring Station. The space The living space has plenty of room for any activity! The dining table overlooking the backyard is perfect for meals & as a work station for those working remotely. The couch is cozy and offers a comfortable spot to relax or watch TV, and the bar stools are a great place to enjoy a drink while dinner simmers on the stove. The kitchen includes a full-size refrigerator, electric stove, microwave, sink, and plenty of counter space. Our kitchen is stocked with kitchenware (pots, pans, cooking utensils, prep bowls, cutting boards, etc.) as well as dinnerware (plates, bowls, glasses, silverware, etc.). We also keep cooking essentials stocked such as olive oil and salt. We aim to provide any basics you may need! There are 2 private bedrooms - 1 with a Queen bed and 1 with two Twin beds. Each bed has a comfortable duvet and two pillows per person. There are extra blankets available as well. Both bedrooms have spacious closets for storage. The full bath includes a shower, a vanity, a toilet, and additional cabinetry for storage. Our large fenced-in backyard is a fun space to cook-out and relax! We have a large patio complete with a gas grill and outdoor fire pit, which are available for your use. There's plenty of space to play on the lawn, or you can sit back and enjoy the nice surrounding gardens. Our airbnb is great if you are traveling with babies or young kids! We generally have a pack n play, 2 high chairs, a stroller, kid/baby toys and more available, so that you don't have to pack all your gear. Send us a message to confirm availability. Guest access Guests may access the space through a dedicated entrance from the backyard patio. One off-street parking spot is included. Additional free parking is readily available on the street. Other things to note Upstairs unit: My family and I live upstairs above this space. You will have a dedicated entrance/exit and a completely private space to come and go as you please. It is not soundproof, so you will hear us from time to time as we live our lives upstairs. We are always respectful of our guests and noise should be minimal. Baby-friendly: We are happy to provide a high-chair, pack-n-play and/or bassinet for those traveling with littles. Please send me a message to request. Flexible: We are happy to accommodate early check-in / late check-out if we can. Please send me a message to request.
