column77: Located in the heart of Charlottesville, the Cville Cottage offers a tranquil escape within walking distance of downtown's vibrant scene. This charming abode features a fully equipped kitchen, cozy dining, and a selection of plush bedrooms. Our cottage is perfect for families, groups, or a getaway retreat. Enjoy the shared patio and experience Charlottesville like a local from this charming cottage, your perfect base to explore, relax, and rejuvenate. The space Welcome to Cville Cottage, your charming Charlottesville haven in the vibrant 10th & Page neighborhood. Just steps from eclectic eateries like The Dairy Market and a short stroll to historic Downtown Mall, our cottage promises a stay steeped in local flavors and culture. With UVA, Scott Stadium, and John Paul Jones Arena merely a 7-minute drive away, and convenient Amtrak access, exploration is effortless. Nearby Monticello and Carter Mountain Orchard invite you to delve into the rich history and natural beauty of Virginia. Cville Cottage is more than a stay—it’s your key to discovering the heart of this storied region. Here’s a glimpse into the tranquil escape that awaits you: Cville Cottage Highlights: → Nestled in a quaint neighborhood, just a stroll from downtown delights → Ultra-fast Wi-Fi and dedicated workspaces for your connectivity needs → A 55-inch 4K Roku SmartTV for endless streaming entertainment → In-house laundry facilities with modern washer and dryer → Multiple cozy beds including plush double beds and a queen-sized haven Your Culinary Canvas: → A fully-stocked kitchen with everything from a microwave to a coffee maker → Cookware essentials including pots, pans, and baking trays for your favorite recipes → Modern appliances and a suite of utensils for effortless meal prep → Toast your adventures with wine glasses and opener provided Ideal for Groups of All Sizes: Whether you're a business traveler seeking a comfortable workspace, a couple on a romantic getaway, or a family making memories, Cville Cottage adapts to your needs. Relax in the spacious living area, or retreat to one of the well-appointed bedrooms for a restful night’s sleep. Sleeping Spaces Crafted for Comfort: → Bedroom #1: Two double beds with private ensuite for a restful respite → Bedroom #2: A pair of double beds meet a productive workstation for work and relaxation → Bedroom #3: A queen bed plus a snug futon, perfect for relaxation or additional guests → A sleeper sofa for extra guests or impromptu movie nights If you have any questions feel free to send us a message! Guest access You will have the complete home to yourself and your family or friends. The back patio is shared with a 1bed 1 bath unit but the front porch is private to your guests only. Other things to note Host is not responsible for injuries or accidents during your stay. Please note this listing represents the main house a 3 bedroom 2 bath house. There is a separate 1bed 1 bath unit attached to the home in the back. It has a separate entrance from the shared back patio. It’s a totally separate unit. Mentioning this as past guests have been curious Notes: 1) Two night minimum required 2) Check in 3:00 pm, check out by 11:00am 3) We do not allow pets due to allergies. But If you have a service pet, booking with us means you accept and will follow our pet guidelines. 4) We do have outdoor cameras (NOT INSIDE).

column93: The Afton House is a luxury escape in the Blue Ridge Mountains. Nestled in the heart of Virginia wine country, it is minutes from the best wineries, breweries, and hikes. Every home detail has been expertly designed and scrutinized to create a memorable experience. The maximum occupancy is firm at 16. Only registered guests are permitted. We are unable to accommodate weddings of any size. The space Please, make sure you read through the entirety of our listing before booking, including the house rules section. This house was designed with groups and families in mind. Highlights include: - 6 bedrooms (3 with king-sized beds, 2 with two sets of bunk beds (4 twin XL beds in each), and a room with 2 single twin XL Murphy beds) - 3 rooms (2 laundry rooms and 1 large hall closet) designed with space for a pack 'n play - 4 full baths and 2 half baths - Blackout curtains and sound machines in each room - 2 fully equipped kitchens - High-Speed Wi-Fi - 4 Smart TVs - 1 in each living room and 2 in the game area on the lower level - 4 outdoor patios/porches - Outdoor play set - Outdoor fire pit Guest access Guests have access to the entire home, including two laundry rooms. Guests cannot access the attic or three locked owners' closets. Other things to note We are unable to accommodate weddings of any size. The house is large, but no more than sixteen (16) guests are permitted. Anyone in violation of this will be asked to leave and the cost of the stay will not be refunded. You are responsible for the guests you bring and any damage they cause. We understand accidents happen or items break through normal wear and tear. Please let us know immediately of any issues so we can fix them and/or replace them as soon as possible. We are in the mountains, and you may encounter pests, mostly stink bugs and ladybugs, throughout your stay. We have a monthly pest service to protect our property - but pests are common depending on the season.

column59: A great country home in beautiful Albemarle County! Gives the feeling of complete privacy, peace and seclusion while still only being 15 mins drive to HollyMeade Shopping Center (Target, Harris Teeter, Bonefish Grill etc) and CHO Airport and only 25 mins to Downtown Charlottesville and UVA Grounds (campus). You are also a 15 minute drive from the Swift Rung Gap Entrance Station to Shenandoah National Park and Skyline Drive. There are 4 wineries within a 10 minute drive (one is only 4 mins!). The space There is a nice front porch with beautiful Mountain Views, a huge grass backyard with nice swing set, 3 fire pit areas with comfy outdoor seating areas. There is also a small river on the property so you can hear water running and are welcome to swim or fish in when it's deep. (The depth fluctuates depending on rainfall and season) There are 3 acres of yard with a small back deck and 3 different firepit areas with comfortable seating! Also the front covered porch is nice to sit on and view the mountains. One of the firepits is gas, the others are for burning wood. There is Corn Hole set for you to play and a Charcoal Grill and Smoker! Other things to note As you may lose cell service when you get close to the place, please make sure you take a screenshot of the check-in info and WiFi password beforehand. Firewood, charcoal, lighter fluid, propane or other fire starters are not provided. If you would like to use the firepits or charcoal grill, please bring all the supplies you would need for this. One firepit is gas powered and uses a refillable propane tank. If this tank is empty and you wish to use this firepit, you are welcome to bring the empty tank to a local propane tank retailer to switch out for a full tank and reinstall. If firepits or charcoal grill are used by guest, you are responsible for cleaning them after use so it's ready for next guest. The cleaning crew does not clean firepits or grill. As it is a rural location, DSL internet service is the only option available. While fast enough for most all normal WiFi purposes, DSL is lower speed than normal cable internet offered in the city. I want guests to be able to check-in as early as possible. Due to the large amount of linens to be laundered between guests and the short amount of time do it, the washer/dryer will often have linens in them so that another load can run after cleaner leaves. You are welcome to use the washer/dryer, but will sometimes have to take out a load in order to do so. If you specifically know you will use the washer/dryer during your stay and don't want to have to do this, please let me know prior to check-in and I'll tell my cleaner to leave them empty for you. Only the number of guests that you book for are allowed on the property at any time. If you would like to increase your guest count, the nightly rate may go up and you would need to pay this difference. Pets are allowed with a $100 fee per each pet for stays of 4 nights or fewer (pet fee will be greater for stays over 4 nights so please ask before booking if you'd like to check the longer stay pet fee amount). You MUST let me know about any pets in your welcome AirBnB message. *Pet fee is to be paid after booking. Pet fee is NOT included in the booking price that AirBnB collects, whether or not you mark pets in the reservation.* I ask you to NOT let pets on any furniture or beds and to pick up any waste in the yard. PLEASE READ HOUSE RULES BEFORE BOOKING

column71:
Take a break and unwind at this peaceful oasis.  Situated as the last house on a dead end street on the side of Willoughby Mountain, this is the perfect house for a getaway.  No cars will ever pass as you sit on the front OR back porch and listen to the sounds of nature all around you.  Take a stroll through the many acres of garden and wooded paths all around the property.  Enjoy the beautiful night skies without a major city right next to you.

Our property has plants galore, with lots of walking paths around the property.  It is very quiet, with lots of birds and a wonderful porch, where you can just sit and enjoy nature.  

We are within an hour of Monticello, UVA, Charlottsville and Lynchburg.  Within 30 minutes you can be at Wintergreen or any number of breweries and wineries in the area.

We like to give our guests space and allow them to relax.  However, we are always available via text, phone call, or email if there are ever any questions or concerns.  Guests will receive check-in instructions via Airbnb a few days before their arrival date

The driveway is very steep and gravel.    AWD or 4x4 is STRONGLY recommended.

We have well water.  If you are not comfortable drinking the water we recommend bringing bottled water for your stay.

column85: 2br 1 bath on 100 acres - trails on property; mins from wineries and breweries The space Welcome to the guesthouse at Rockfish River Ranch. We are located in the heart of Nelson County, VA- about 25-30 min outside of Charlottesville, sitting on just under 100 acres. This home features an open floor plan with massive windows for breathtaking views. Located just minutes from Woodridge Farm Brewery, Delfosse Winery and Pippin Hill Winery. Whether you are on a brewery/winery tour, watching the sunset on the deck, walking the trail throughout the property, or roasting s’mores on the solo stove we aim to make this feel like your home away from home. Less than 3 years old, the guest house was designed with modern comfort in mind. Located above the garage, there is tons of living space for you and your family to spread out. The master bedroom features a queen platform bed with vaulted ceiling and a 42 in smart tv. The second room has a bunk bed, changing table and Lotus pack and play available upon request. Other child friendly amenities include: ikea highchair, bed rail for the bottom bunk bed and a slumberpod that fits over the pack and play. Located in the full bathroom is a closet containing an Electrolux front loading washer and dryer. The living space is an open floor plan and includes a wood burning fireplace and a 55 inch smart tv. The kitchen contains all the appliances you’d need : a hand mixer, Ninja crockpot, microwave, Viking food processor, blender, waffle maker, coffee maker, tea kettle, toaster, and a wine fridge Just outside the dining room, the deck has a gas grill, 4 Adirondack chairs surrounding the gas fire pit and exterior recessed speakers. A solo stove is located at ground level with firewood located nearby. There is a door located on the ground level nearby the deck that has a half bath and closet with numerous lawn games and a bounce house available for your use. There is a walkable trail and multiple access points to a creek throughout the property. In addition, our property extends across Rockfish River Rd, allowing access to the Rockfish River. Guest access While the guesthouse is connected to our home via a “bridge” (see photos), you will have your own private entrance to the stand alone guesthouse. Upon reservation, you will be given a code to unlock the lockbox to the right of the front door to access the key. Other things to note We do not allow smoking in the home nor animals in or around the home/property. No: Hunting Fireworks Parties Weddings/events 4WD/AWD access: The beginning of the driveway is shared with our neighbor. Once you veer off to the right for our separate driveway, you will notice a small portion is quite steep. If we experience snow or ice in the winter, you will have difficulty getting up this portion of the driveway without a 4 wheel drive vehicle. **Upon reservation during the winter months, you will be asked to confirm you will have a 4 wheel drive vehicle- as we will be unable to refund you if you can not make it up the driveway.** During the remainder of the year, it is advised (though not required) to only book if you have an all wheel drive or 4 wheel drive vehicle. The steep, gravel driveway can be rough on the undercarriage of a smaller car. Unfortunately, at this time this home is not handicap friendly - there is a full flight of stairs you must go up to reach the front door Week-long rentals now available. Minimum stay of two nights. In certain cases, a one night stay will be allowed. Please message if interested. Firewood is provided for the solo stove and gas tanks are provided for the fire pit and gas grill

column77: Located in the heart of town, the Modern at Woolen Mills provides a restful place to access the best of Charlottesville - less than 1 mile from restaurants, bars and shops at the Downtown Mall and historic Belmont and the neighborhood fun at the Wool Factory (great coffee shop!) and Riverview Park (stroll the Rivanna River). UVA and the hospitals are nearby too! This charming home features generous living spaces, a fully equipped kitchen and outdoor deck with a large fenced yard. The space Enter from the front porch into the ground level, which includes communal spaces and access to the back deck and yard. Two bedrooms are upstairs and two king beds are in the lower suite, down stairs accessible from the living room. FIRST FLOOR: Designed to convene with your group in comfort. - Living Room: Sofa (seats 3), two oversized arm chairs, two accent chairs, a coffee table, smart TV, gas fireplace (switch operated) and stunning gallery wall. - Dining Area: Antique dining table with chairs for 6. - Kitchen: Fully equipped kitchen with new appliances (including an ice cream maker, blender and warming tray for a slow and easy dinner), dinnerware sufficient for 16, and basic kitchen consumables including spices, tea and locally roasted coffee (Mr. Coffee percolator). Please let me know of any particular requests. - Deck: Located off the kitchen/dining area is a deck with a bistro table with 2 chairs for drinks al fresco and stairs leading down to the large, fully enclosed backyard. There's a custom-made sliding metal gate that can keep pets on (or off) the deck, if helpful. - Laundry: Washer/dryer available for guest use; detergent provided. - Half Bath SECOND FLOOR: Each of the upstairs bedrooms includes a closet with a hang bar and built-in shelving, a tabletop fan, a sound machine, a spare floor mattress (suitable for smaller children), a luggage rack, blackout curtains and shades that can be opened from the top or the bottom, allowing light in without compromising privacy. The bedside tables include traditional and USB outlets for phone charging. - Bedroom 1: A cozy room towards the back of the house, this bedroom features a king bed, nightstands with lamps and a console table. - Bedroom 2: Located at the front of the house with vaulted ceilings and a street view, this bedroom features a queen bed, nightstands with lamps and a desk. - Full Bathroom: Single vanity, tub/shower combination and a medicine cabinet with additional storage. Shark hair dryer, towels, and toiletries provided. A full-length mirror is mounted on the wall outside of the bathroom for any last-minute outfit checks. - Office: At the top of the stairs is an ideal space for working or relaxing, with an oversized partner's desk and an incredibly comfortable couch. Fiber internet via Ting will keep you connected. BASEMENT: Accessible via interior stairs from the living room or externally via the fenced backyard, the spacious lower suite includes 2 king beds, a nightstand with a lamp, a table for 4 and a full bath. - The room also includes a fan, luggage rack, a full-length mirror and direct walk-out access to the backyard up a short set of stairs. - The full bath includes a single vanity and tub/shower combo. A Shark hair dryer, towels, and toiletries are provided along with a space heater to keep toes warm on the tile floor in the cooler months. PARKING: - There is one guaranteed parking space in the driveway. Street parking is available for additional vehicles, but out of respect for our neighbors with whom we share the space, please park no more than 2 cars on the street. - Please take care to avoid impeding access to neighbors' driveways and please do not park with any wheels on grass. PLEASE NOTE: We pride ourselves on our collection of plants and feel confident you will enjoy them too! Please do not water the plants, as overwatering can be damaging. For stays of 10 days or more, we will coordinate a time with you where our plant waterer" can come tend to them and keep them happy. Other things to note Must climb stairs to enter the home and access any bedroom."

column64: Welcome to Towler Cottage, a fully renovated getaway in the heart of Route 151 in Afton. The cottage is within minutes from the best wineries and breweries, great local trails, and the Blue Ridge Parkway! Relax in the new hot tub on the rear deck, or sit out by the fire pit and gaze at the stars. Enjoy great mountain views from the front porch rocking chairs. With one bedroom plus a pull-out couch, the cottage is perfect for couples or small families. Located 25 minutes from Charlottesville. The space The cottage has all new furnishings in 2023. The kitchen is fully equipped. The coffee maker is a Keurig single-serve. There is a Weber kettle grill on the rear deck. Guest access Guests have access to the entire cottage, which is located on a 2-acre property that also includes a farmhouse that is a separate listing. There is dedicated parking for two cars directly in front of the cottage.
column71: Cottage on 151 w/ Hot Tub, Firepit, Mountain Views

column59: Welcome to the newly appointed Everett Estate: Where Modern Luxury Meets Historic Charm. Boasting picturesque mountain views, this 6,700 square ft home underwent a year-long renovation to modernize & revitalize both the home & the expansive grounds. With 10 all-suite rooms and 1 top floor studio apartment, this boutique inn was expertly designed to host up to 30 overnight guests and weddings and events of up to 125 guests. Interior Design: Becky Seager | WKNDR Design of Charlottesville The space Uniquely designed guest rooms, modern amenities, and thoughtful touches await you at Everett Estate. This restored Inn delivers a boutique experience filled with plenty of dazzling details and alluring views and amenities to ensure an unforgettable stay. Enjoy pure relaxation as you take in the sweeping views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Sip your morning coffee from one of our numerous intimate hideaways. Indulge in a cozy cocktail while you converse with friends by the fire pits. The Layout: First Floor (Common Areas- shared by all guests) Parlor- Moody living area with purple walls and conversational seating. This room has a full bath with a stand-up shower available for all guests to use. There is also a separate ADA-compliant half bath located inside of the parlor. Dining Room- Four separate 4-seat dining tables are great for card games, cocktails or meals. Original 110 high functional wood pocket doors separate the dining area from another living space

column75: Welcome to our peaceful literary oasis nestled in the heart of Charlottesville's historic Belmont neighborhood. Immerse yourself in the world of books as our Airbnb is themed around literature, creating a unique and inviting atmosphere for book lovers and adventurers alike. Curl up with a book on our cozy couch or on the sun-drenched patio with some vino. We know you will love it here! We are close proximity to the best parts of C’Ville located approximately 2.3 miles/10 min drive from UVA. The space Step into our inviting Airbnb in Charlottesville's historic Belmont neighborhood! Our peaceful home offers a comfortable stay with three beds, two and a half baths, and enough space to comfortably sleep up to six guests. Two of these charming bedrooms offer plush queen beds for a restful night's sleep, while the third bedroom is perfect for friends or family with its two twin beds. The master bedroom features a convenient attached full bathroom, providing added privacy and comfort, while a second full bathroom upstairs ensures the utmost convenience for the other guests in the home. Here at The Book Nook, our aim is to provide you with a comfortable and memorable home away from home. We strive to create a welcoming and cozy environment where you can relax, unwind, and make cherished memories during your stay in Charlottesville. Please let us know if there is something special we can do to make your visit extraordinary, and we will do our very best to accommodate. Guest access Guests will enjoy exclusive access to both the main and top floors of the residence, providing them with a complete experience. This encompasses a fully-equipped kitchen with a coffee bar, an inviting living and dining area, along with three bedrooms and bathrooms in this delightful home. There are no shared spaces out of consideration of our guest’s comfort. Other things to note Our welcoming host occasionally resides on the property, enjoying her separate, private space in the basement, which has its own entrance and exit. Rest assured that she respects your privacy and will not enter the main area of the property during your stay. For your peace of mind, a door reinforcement lock is installed on the adjoining door to ensure your complete tranquility and comfort.

column50: Welcome! This is a private entrance basement with host living upstairs. Enjoy 4 free off-street parking spaces with the option to gather in the front lawn. 1 BR with 2 full beds. Twin bed in the living room with the option to close the door. Bathroom has 2 entries, one from the bedroom and one from the office/kitchen space. Washer/dryer available. Kitchen stocked with essentials. Easy access to I-64, 29, and downtown. Fast & reliable Wifi. Towels/linens provided. Other things to note Pack 'n Play, stroller, baby monitor, basic children's books/toys, car seats for all ages and other supplies for kids and babies available upon request. Pack'n play and/or car seats extra $15/night. Reliable and trusted sitter recommendations.

NO pets. On-site driveway parking.
column64: Fontaine Midterm: Fully Furnished, Walk to UVA

column45: Welcome to our cozy studio basement apartment in the heart of Charlottesville, Virginia, just a 10 minute walk to Scott Stadium and UVA Grounds. Whether you're in town for a UVA game day, exploring city, or simply looking for a comfortable retreat, this inviting space is perfect for up to four guests. The space Welcome to our cozy studio basement apartment in the heart of Charlottesville, Virginia, just a stone's throw away from the iconic Scott Stadium. Whether you're in town for a thrilling UVA game day, exploring the historic city, or simply looking for a comfortable retreat, this inviting space is perfect for up to four guests. This stylish studio apartment features an open layout, thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience. The sleeping arrangements include a plush queen-sized bed and a comfortable sleeper sofa, accommodating up to four guests. You'll find the space well-appointed with eclectic furnishings and decor, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The prime location of this studio apartment is a sports fan's dream! Scott Stadium, home to the UVA Cavaliers, is within easy walking distance, making it a perfect choice for game days. Additionally, you'll be just a short drive from the vibrant downtown area, where you can explore historic sites, dine at delicious restaurants, and enjoy the local culture. Below is a breakdown of the apartment layout: KITCHEN - full kitchen with fridge, oven, microwave, coffee pot, tea kettle DINING - dining table for 3, plus barstool seating for 2 LIVING ROOM - couch, accent chairs, smart TV SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS - 1 king bed and 2 twin beds BATHROOM - single vanity, toilet, tub/shower combo LAUNDRY - washer and dryer in-unit and available for guest use Please note that this listing is for the basement studio apartment. The upstairs unit is rented separately as a mid-term listing.
column52: Cavalier Cocoon: Studio + Walk to Scott Stadium

column73: Over-under duplex home. Your space is 819 square feet! Easy access to everything UVA and the beautiful Downtown Mall from this perfectly located over-under duplex. Private off-street parking in the front of home. Local Entertainment Venues bring world-class performers year-round. And if food’s your thing, well, we rank among the cities with the most restaurants per capita. Charlottesville is home to 40+ wineries along the Monticello Wine Trail, offering visitors lush views & a dynamic wine scene The space Duplex: A spacious (819 Square feet) spacious duplex space with a queen-sized bed, a twin-sized bed, and a full-size sleep sofa. Enjoy a Culligan Non-Backwashing Filter System to improve the shower water quality by reducing chlorine, chloramine, and disinfection byproducts. There is also reverse osmosis for your drinking water. Guest access Up to 5 Adults During your stay The best way to reach me is via text message.

column55: Cute cape in the Rugby Hills neighborhood of Charlottesville. Equidistance to the Downtown Mall (Charlottesville's Pedestrian Street) and UVA's campus- enjoy easy access to everything! 2 bedrooms/2 baths with backyard patio and small deck. Free off-street parking is available in the driveway for up to two cars. You'll have the place to yourselves in a lovely neighborhood. The space This home is our primary residence. We rent and vacate the property a few times a year to guests who we know will treat it respectfully. The house is in a lovely and friendly neighborhood about a mile from the Downtown Mall and a mile from UVA's campus. It is easy to walk around the neighborhood and to Campus, but would suggest a car to get to the Downtown Mall. Very close to the bike path/Rivanna Trail. Cozy living room and kitchen. Primary bedroom with King Bed and full bathroom. Upstairs bedroom with queen bed and small bathroom with shower (no tub). Guest access You'll have access to the whole house. The basement will be closed to guests as well as our upstairs home office.

column31: Large single family home in the beautiful Venable Neighborhood. Perfect location for walking to UVA and The Corner (less than a mile) or JPJ for events, games, or concerts. The home is also located between 2-5 miles from the historic Downtown Mall, Barracks Road shopping and the Dairy Market. The space This home has 3 bedrooms and two living rooms plus a spacious and open centrally located kitchen with a huge island that seats 4 and dining area that can seat 10+, giving plenty of room for your family or group to gather. The kitchen opens up onto a wraparound sunny deck with a grill which guests are welcome to use. Please note that this is our primary residence so there will be personal items including artwork (some fragile) and the closets and draws will have items. The refrigerator will be mostly cleaned out to make space for guests but there will be some items left behind and guests are welcome to use them. Guest access You'll have access to the whole house, half of the driveway (can fit two cars) and the front yard only. Other things to note Responsible guests can use the house like their own - respectfully. It is NOT an appropriate place for a party or to have lots of people coming and going.
column38: Spacious Home - walk to UVA, The Corner and JPJ!

column73: Home with 24'x14' heated indoor pool near University of Virginia. 5 minutes to CHO airport, 20 minutes to UVA, 30 minutes to Shenandoah National Park and minutes from Monticello Wine Trail. One-level living, no steps to entry and walk-in showers with grab bars and tiled seats. 3BR home has high speed WIFI, 55” smart TV, rec room with bar & ping pong table, washer/dryer, full kitchen, and all linens, including pool towels, are supplied. Circular driveway accommodates ample parking. The space For 6 guests, in addition to the two bedrooms, there is a comfortable pull-out sofa bed in the library (ranked as one of the most comfortable West Elm sleeper sofas). Tranquil wooded yard. One contained deck surrounds pool house and separate deck includes outdoor dining furniture with gas grill. Swim at your own risk and absolutely no diving. Average pool depth is 4' with deepest at 5'.

column73: This cozy home is located a comfortable walk from the Downtown Mall, home to world class restaurants and entertainment. Location makes easy access to other parts of town including UVA, medical centers, and local businesses. Locust Grove is a lovely older walkable neighborhood near local parks and the Rivanna river and trail system. Home is located on the public bus route that connects to transportation hub downtown. Everything you need to enjoy your stay in vibrant C-ville! The space Newly remodeled duplex (we live next door), has keypad entry. First floor has mudroom, and living room, dining room, furnished kitchen with modern applicances (even an ice maker), and a half bathroom. Samsung smart TV has complimentary Sling TV for guest use as well as apps preloaded for your use with your own accounts. Upstairs are two bedrooms both with queen beds, nightstands, dresser, and small desk. Each room has ample closet space. Also upstairs is the full sized bath with tub and shower, and a linen closet with ample towels and extra sheets should you need them. One dedicated free off street parking space with ample additional free on street parking. Guest access Front door has a keypad entry.

column59: Welcome to the newly appointed Everett Estate: Where Modern Luxury Meets Historic Charm. Boasting picturesque mountain views, this 6,700 square ft home underwent a year-long renovation to modernize & revitalize both the home & the expansive grounds. With 10 all-suite rooms and 1 top-floor studio apartment, this boutique inn was expertly designed to host up to 30 overnight guests and weddings and events of up to 125 guests. Interior Design: Becky Seager | WKNDR Design of Charlottesville The space Uniquely designed guest rooms, modern amenities, and thoughtful touches await you at Everett Estate. This restored Inn delivers a boutique experience filled with plenty of dazzling details and alluring views and amenities to ensure an unforgettable stay. Enjoy pure relaxation as you take in the sweeping views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Sip your morning coffee from one of our numerous intimate hideaways. Indulge in a cozy cocktail while you converse with friends by the fire pits. The Layout: First Floor Parlor- Moody living area with purple walls and conversational seating. This room has a full bath with a stand-up shower available for all guests to use. There is also a separate ADA-compliant half bath located inside of the parlor. Dining Room- Four separate 4-seat dining tables are great for card games, cocktails or meals. Original 110 high functional wood pocket doors separate the dining area from another living space

column72: Perfect for a Cville getaway! Steps from downtown Belmont, under a mile from the Historic Downtown Mall, and 2 miles from UVA. Private access to this comfy studio apartment, perfect for a couple or family of 4. Queen bed plus pull-out couch & single futon. Full bath, kitchenette, TV, air hockey & other games. Note: I live upstairs with my two older kids; there is no insulated ceiling so you may hear us when we're home. The HVAC is also in the apt, hence the budget price for this prime spot! The space Private-access to a basic basement studio apartment with a full bathroom, new queen bed, legitimately comfy pullout couch, and single futon. Living area includes a Roku TV, air hockey table, and desk. Kitchenette (no stove) with full sized fridge, table + 4 chairs, sink, microwave, toaster oven, water boiler, french press coffee maker, hot plate, and more. Coffee, selection of teas, and instant oatmeal are available. We have tried to provide everything you need for a comfortable stay, but please note that our family lives upstairs, with our cat. While we don't allow the cat into your apartment, if you have severe allergies this apartment may not be an ideal fit. You may hear us when we're home, as there is mostly no insulation between the levels (yet!). The HVAC is also located in the basement and you will hear it running (more so at certain times of the year than others!). So if you are looking for silence this is not your place. But if a little background noise is not a problem, consider this super convenient location for your stay in Cville! We have provided a white noise machine and earplugs for your comfort. There's an HVAC mini-split on the wall in the living room so you can control the A/C and heat for your space. We ask that you not host gatherings on site. The only guests allowed in the B&B are those that are on the listing, unless authorized by me. Two cars maximum. Sorry, no pets. Guest access Private entrance to the apartment around the back of the house. You have exclusive use of an outdoor patio dining and sitting area right by your entrance. The front porch and upstairs back porch are reserved for our family's use. Other things to note If you plan to cook on site, please only cook vegetarian meals (no meat). No smoking inside or near the building. Note that we use eco-friendly products throughout the apartment; perfect for chemically-sensitive individuals. We ask that you not host gatherings on site. The only guests allowed in the B&B are those that are on the listing, unless authorized by me. Two cars maximum. No pets.

column74: The Bird Cage Airbnb is your gateway to the downtown mall in Charlottesville. This listing boasts of luxury, convenience, comfort, and amenities. Have a bigger group? Check with us about renting both side-by-side units which can accommodate up to 14 total. The space The Bird Cage is ideal for couples, groups of friends, business travelers, families, or those looking to stay right in downtown Charlottesville. Your front door opens to the pedestrian Mall! Just out your front door, you'll find shops, restaurants, bars, and music venue's like Ting Pavilion. The space is ideal for up to 6 people with 3 king beds and 3 bedrooms. •3 Bedrooms | 3 King Beds •Extra large Living and Dining Room •Full kitchen with cooking essentials and a variety of amenities including coffee and tea provided •2 Full Bathrooms - stocked with shampoo/conditioner/body wash and makeup remover. Towels provided. •Multipurpose room with a desk, yoga mat, board games, and comfy floor pillows •On the Downtown Mall and walkable to Ting Pavillion within 2 minutes • 10-minute walk to the Corner and UVA Grounds • 5-minute drive to UVA Hospital • 10-minute drive to Thomas Jefferson Monticello *Please note that the apartment is within a building downtown that has other units inside. As it is downtown, there may be some street noise, including the intersection cross-walk beep. With the bedroom doors closed, the noise is significantly reduced, and the sound can't be barely heard, if at all. However, we love our neighborhood and respect our neighbors, so we include a quiet hours policy in our rules of 10:00 pm—8:00 am. **Also for consideration, the unit has a staircase and guests will need to be able to go up these with any luggage to access the apartment. Guest access Guests can access the space through the front door which is located on the downtown mall. Parking is recommended at Water Street Garage. Other things to note This is an LGBTQIA-friendly space and we welcome people from all nationalities, races, cultures, religions, and neurodiverse backgrounds. Important note*** This building is right on the downtown mall and the building does have other units and Airbnb's inside it. The entire building has a quiet hours policy of 10 pm - 8 am. Please note that with this we ask that shoes not be worn in the apartment, no loud music, and quiet noise only once quiet hours have started. This helps all be respectful of one another in these old historic downtown amazing buildings!
column81: Bird Cage | 3 King Beds | Door to DT Mall

column59: Clonmel Acres is a historic farmhouse in Afton, Virginia, just minutes from Nelson 151 and the Blue Ridge Mountains. This remarkable estate, featuring 5 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms, offers an unparalleled retreat for up to 12 guests. With over 30 acres of land, a private pond, & historic grandeur, Clonmel is your gateway to a truly unforgettable experience. This spot is perfect for family reunions, wine enthusiasts exploring local vineyards, or groups of friends looking for a quiet place to gath The space Please note: we do not have high speed internet. Our download speed is under 10mbps, making this location more of an unplugged experience and not ideal for work-from-home guests. We are not equipped to host events here, and ask the quiet hours be observed from 10 pm to 8 am in effort to be good neighbors! DOWNSTAIRS: LIVING ROOM 1: Formal sitting room with couch and 2 chairs LIVING ROOM 2: Couch, loveseat, ottoman, smart TV DINING ROOM: Formal dining room for 10, plus highchair KITCHEN: Fully stocked kitchen with all major appliances HALF BATH/LAUNDRY: Single vanity, toilet, NEW washer and dryer BEDROOM 1: Queen bed, nightstands, desk BATHROOM 1: Walk-in shower, large single vanity, toilet *Pack N' Play and air mattress are also available for guests to use* UPSTAIRS: GAME ROOM: foosball table, table and chairs for 6, cabinet with board/card games, couch BEDROOM 2: Queen bed, nightstands, desk, chair BEDROOM 3: Queen bed, nightstands, desk, chair BATHROOM 2: Private bathroom for bedroom 3. Single vanity, tub/shower combo, toilet, towels and toiletries provided. BEDROOM 4: Bunk beds and single twin bed, dresser BEDROOM 5: 2 twin beds, daybed, dresser BATHROOM 3: Single vanity, tub/shower combo, toilet, towels and toiletries provided. OUTSIDE: PRIVATE POND: Guests are welcome to enjoy the private pond and paddle board in the backyard! Fishing is permitted. PATIO: Woodburning firepit (firewood not provided) and plenty of outdoor seating HOT TUB

column40: Direct access to the Charlottesville Downtown Mall, you'll find yourself just steps away from a plethora of exciting activities and attractions. The space Welcome to The Gatsby, a 2-bedroom vacation rental nestled right on the historic bricks of the renowned Charlottesville Downtown Mall. Experience the true essence of this vibrant city as you step outside your doorstep and immerse yourself in the heart of all the action. This rental is thoughtfully designed to offer a delightful blend of modern comfort and classic charm, making it the perfect home away from home during your stay. The well-appointed bedrooms ensure a restful night's sleep, and the cozy living area provides a relaxing space to unwind after a day of exploration. The shared rooftop terrace is a great gathering and people watching spot! What sets our vacation rentals apart is their unbeatable location. With direct access to the Charlottesville Downtown Mall, you'll find yourself just steps away from a plethora of exciting activities and attractions. Stroll through the pedestrian-friendly streets lined with boutiques, art galleries, and specialty shops, where you can discover unique souvenirs and local treasures. Indulge your taste buds with an array of culinary delights as you savor the diverse dining options available at the numerous cafes, restaurants, and bistros nearby. From farm-to-table cuisine to international flavors, there's something to satisfy every palate. Music and culture enthusiasts will be delighted by the lively entertainment scene. Catch live performances, outdoor concerts, or theatrical shows at the various venues scattered around the Mall. Additionally, art enthusiasts can explore the nearby museums and art galleries to admire the region's rich cultural heritage. For those seeking a relaxing escape, unwind in the comfort of your rental's private space or take a leisurely walk to nearby parks, where you can enjoy a breath of fresh air amidst the picturesque surroundings. Whether you're traveling with family, friends, or a loved one, our 2-bedroom vacation rentals offer the ideal base to experience the magic of Charlottesville's Downtown Mall. Create lasting memories as you explore this vibrant city and take advantage of its incredible offerings, all just a stone's throw away from your charming abode. Book your stay now and discover the best of Charlottesville right at your fingertips. Please be aware that there are a lot of stairs to get to this second floor unit. *Please note, no parking is included with this rental, the most economical option is the Market Street parking garage a few blocks away. **Note: The name of this property has recently changed, it was formerly called Fourth Street #6!**

column78: Three bedroom/ two bathroom apartment in a historic building located in the heart of Charlottesville, just off the Downtown Mall. Brightly lit large space with charm and comfort, including full kitchen, wifi, living room w/ smart TV, hardwood floors throughout, blackout curtains, laundry in unit. Your group will enjoy easy access to everything - walk score 100! Three queen beds + living room sofa + air mattress. Pet friendly with extra fee. Breakfast Included: oatmeal, coffee, tea. The space Each of the three bedrooms has its own charm, and the space is decorated in a modern style, largely with local art. Nine foot ceilings throughout provide tons of natural light, and there are windows facing three directions so you can enjoy being in the heart of downtown Charlottesville. Full kitchen with everything you need to cook a gourmet meal, plus walkable to tons of area restaurants. Washer/dryer located in one of the two full bathrooms. Hardwood floors throughout and local artwork bring extra charm to this condo. Please note this is on the second floor. The staircase is located inside the building. Guest access Guests have access to the entire apartment. The door code is changed between guests for security. Other things to note Things to note: 1. The Townie is in the heart of Downtown Charlottesville, so if you are looking for a silent getaway, this is not the spot for you. We do provide white noise machines and earplugs for your comfort 2. There is no dedicated guest parking, but you can often find nearby street parking (free overnight; 2 hours free during the day) plus there are two parking garages nearby. The 15 minute spot out front is generally not a problem to park in for *long* periods of time (but no guarantees!)

column57: Enjoy your own private suite in our beautifully renovated home in the heart of downtown Charlottesville! It's just a few steps to the gourmet restaurants of our Belmont neighborhood, or a few minutes walk to the bustling downtown pedestrian mall with all the restaurants, boutiques, music and farmers markets that Charlottesville has to offer. We are close to Monticello, the University of Virginia and the Blue Ridge mountains. The space Let yourself in the front door and go straight up the stairs to your suite which includes the master bedroom, a private outdoor deck, and your own private bathroom just outside your bedroom door. The room has a memory foam mattress, cotton sheets, two comfy chairs, dresser and mirror, ceiling fan, luggage rack, closet and a white noise machine to help you sleep if necessary. There is a small fridge and microwave, and a keurig coffee maker so you are ready to go in the morning. Guest access We live downstairs and have purposefully made it so that you are self sufficient upstairs for your and our privacy. There is a washer and dryer in your bathroom and you are welcome to use them. There is also a second room upstairs, my art studio, which I may occasionally use during the daytime while you are staying with us. During your stay We'll likely be in and out throughout the weekend. We are happy to answer any texts/calls with questions you might have if we are not home. Other things to note We have one cat, Chloe. She is not allowed in your spaces, although she does sometimes go upstairs. We also have two dogs that live in house but do NOT go upstairs at all. They are also contained in our suite if we are not home!

column42: Awaken to a Shenandoah Valley morning streaming in through the windows that surround you. With nature as your wallpaper, you'll feel as though you're camping in luxury. Toss your laundry in your personal washer and dryer, and then walk over heated floors to relax in the two-person, rain-head shower. Immerse yourself in the sunset and the night sky through the cabin windows that encircle you or from the bubbling waters of your hot tub. Curl up to sleep in your built-in platform king-sized bed. column89: Welcome to UVA Retreat, your perfect getaway in Charlottesville! Located just a short walk from the University of Virginia and vibrant downtown, this cozy retreat offers modern amenities for a comfortable stay. Relax in a stylish space with four bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, and high-speed Wi-Fi. Explore local dining, shopping, and cultural attractions nearby. Whether visiting for campus events or a weekend getaway, UVA Retreat is your ideal home base for all that Charlottesville offers! The space -The home is great for families looking for spaciousness and a place to relax without having to venture far to explore everything that the area has to offer. The Kitchen is on the smaller side. The dining room table fits six. There are two barstools as well. If you have a large group just keep in mind the kitchen is smaller. The quiet 4 bedroom, 2 bath home features 3 bedrooms upstairs and 1 downstairs with an abundance of natural light and a private entrance. -Primary Bedroom- King bed -2nd bedroom-King bed -3rd bedroom- 1 Queen bed -4th bedroom- 2 Queen beds with private entrance -Each bedroom features a 40-inch mounted Smart TV -Main Living room with a 50-inch Smart TV and sleeper sofa. This area is warm and inviting, perfect for catching up with family and friends. Families: Pack ‘n Play and High Chair always provided in upstairs closest. -Second Living Space: the fully renovated basement & entertainment space offers a 50-inch TV, full bathroom & 4th bedroom with 2 queen beds and 40-inch TV. Pacman arcade game, Pop-A-Shot basketball hoop, poker set, dining table and sectional sofa (queen air mattress avail upon request. There is also a door that leads to the backyard seating area. Amenities: -Just blocks from University of Virginia campus -Walking distance to UVA Medical Center -Take a 5 minute drive to the downtown historic pedestrian mall. Included Features: High Speed Internet and Wifi Full Size Washer & Dryer Linens, Pillows and Towels Provided Fully Equipped Kitchen (pots, pans, baking sheets, measuring cups, spices, etc). The kitchen is little older. Cabinets need to renovated. We plan to do that in 2025. Drip Coffee with Introductory Supply of Coffee & Sugar and Tea. Dishwasher Three Dedicated Workspaces Free parking for 2 vehicles on driveway and several cars on street out front in the residential neighborhood. What’s Nearby: Scott Stadium - 1 mile walk or 3 minute drive John Paul Arena - 5 minute drive Downtown Mall - 5 minute drive Wineries, Breweries, Cideries - Virginia is one of the country's top wine-producing states and the Charlottesville area has more than 40 wineries. We're a down-to-earth destination for world-class wine where you can find a bottle to pair with a weeknight dinner and a bottle to save for a special occasion. Traveler’s Advice: There are TONS of year-round activities to do. Check out the Guidebook for season specific activities. Guest access Guests will have full access to the entire home, including the front and backyard, providing plenty of space to relax and enjoy your stay. Ample parking is available in the driveway for several cars—just please ensure you don’t block the sidewalk for our neighbors. Street parking is also an option. We kindly ask you to respect the neighbors and maintain a peaceful environment. Please note that mail delivery is not available at this property. Enjoy your stay at UVA Retreat! Other things to note Additional Notes: I prefer no pets because some guests have allergies. If you want to bring a pet please message me first and I am definitely open to it. Your safety and the safety of our home matters. This property features exterior security cameras and an interior noise monitoring system. No parties. No loud music after 9:30pm. My neighbors have my number and will keep me informed because we want to respect the neighbors (violators could receive $1000 fine). No fireworks or smoking/vaping are permitted at any time throughout the year ($1000 fine).

column75: Hidden gem in beautiful area is close to UVA, John Paul Jones arena, downtown. Easy driving to Monticello, vineyards/breweries & the Blue Ridge Parkway and great mountain trails. All cotton linens and towels. USB ports at bedside, lighted vanity mirror, tassimo coffee, & dedicated work space. The space Large living room with big screen TV, leather couch, dining table and desk with keyboard tray and power strip overlook the patio and backyard. Kitchen has coffee maker, microwave, fridge with water and ice dispenser, washer dryer combo and feature rich range/oven. Bedroom has king bed with all cotton linens, bedspread and blankets (there will be some wrinkles). Bathroom has aroma spa shower head with added handheld option. Power flush toilet. 100% Cotten towel sets provided. All linens are sanitized between guests as are all high touch surfaces and bathroom/kitchen. Complete air out of apartment is done between guests along with an air filter device in living room at all times. Apt has access to 1200mbps WiFi. Guest access Access to the private apartment is gained from on street parking and walking across the right side of the front yard along the shrub line. Motion Path lights light the way at night. There are about seven landscape wooden steps to reach the patio. Follow the patio to the rear of the house to the front door. The lock is a key code punch lock for contactless entry. The entire side patio and apartment are for your use. Other things to note Accessing this home requires walking up and down about seven landscape timber stairs. The on street parking is on a quiet, wide residential street. The apartment is well appointed. Airbnb fee paid by owner. The nightly price listed is what you pay except city occupancy tax that Airbnb adds.

column91: Stunning views of the Blue Ridge Mountains from your porch will make you forget about all of the nearby attractions! ♥ Award winning vineyards, breweries, cideries, along Route 151, aka The Brew Ridge Trail ♥ Skiing, hiking, golfing ♥ The Blue Ridge Parkway ♥ Shenandoah National Park ♥ Appalachian Trail ♥ Seasonal Farmers and Artisans Market on the weekend at the Rockfish Valley Community Center ♥ 20 Minutes to Wintergreen Ski Resort ♥ 25 Minutes to Charlottesville ♥ 45 Minutes to Harrisonburg The space New home on ~3 acres situated on a private farm road with spectacular mountain views. Using the keypad entry, enter the home through the side door and into the mudroom to kick off your shoes and hang up your jacket. There is a laundry room and a half bath on your left as you move towards the open-concept living area. There you will find a fully equipped kitchen with a large island that offers additional seating right next to the dining area. The living room offers ample seating to watch TV on the 55 inch smart TV or listen to music or your favorite podcast on the Bluetooth speaker. Roku devices are provided on all TVs for you to login to your streaming services. Exit through the front door for breathtaking mountain views. BBQ on the gas grill, chill in the hammock or read a book from the rockers. The back door next to the kitchen will lead you to the garden and fire pit. The primary suite on the first floor has a king-size bed and an attached bath with double vanity, walk-in shower, and a large soaking tub. After a soak, settle in to watch a movie or your favorite show on the large 55 inch smart TV with wifi sound bar. Also on the first floor you will find a flex space. You choose which option works for you upon booking: - OPTION 1: Den / game room with dedicated workspace with a desk, chair, and high-speed internet (844Mbps Wifi!). - OPTION 2: Full size bed with sitting areas and desk - OPTION 3: King size bed with desk An additional sit/stand desk can be provided by request. Ask us about other office equipment you may need. Upstairs you will find two bedrooms, one with a queen bed and 55 inch smart TV and one with a queen bed and dedicated work space. Between the upstairs bedrooms is the second full bathroom. We welcome families and have several amenities for children such as games, a booster seat, children's dinnerware (for four) and a Pack 'n Play (please BYO bedding) Please do note that we are NOT a childproof home. Please be aware that our home is in the country so we do have insects. Indoors (depending on the season) you may encounter asian lady beetles (they look like lady bugs) and stink bugs. Both are harmless. Please keep doors closed to avoid inviting them and other insects to stay. Guest access Guests have full access to the home with the exception of two locked owners' closets. Other things to note Our cleaning fee is included in your booking price. Evidence of pet damage or large events (which are not allowed) will result in an additional fee to cover additional cleaning and maintenance expenses.

column37: Enjoy the comfort of our well-appointed abode with 1200 acres of trails right in the backyard. Just 10 mins from downtown Charlottesville and 25 mins from Shenandoah National Park, our house is a great option for a solo traveler, couple, or small family. The space Guests will enjoy our home nestled at the end of a cul-de-sac that directly adjoins Biscuit Run natural area, Charlottesville's best kept secret for hiking and mountain biking. You can truly hike for hours and not see a soul just 10 minutes from downtown. Sizable living/dining/kitchen is a bright open floor plan with lots of windows and forest views. The main room opens out onto a raised deck complete with outdoor dining table, reclinable couch, and cafe lights. Kitchen has all the essentials plus lots of extras - mixers, blenders, smoothie makers, and seasonings to whip up a feast, and a dining table that fits everyone comfortably. The full bathroom has a tub, shower, and huge mirror. Our family works remotely and the house is equipped with super fast internet - streaming and virtual conferencing are no problem. Guest access Guests have access to one bedroom with queen size bed and small desk, and a second bedroom with crib and large desk. If you have an extra adult, our enormous couch will sleep an extra person comfortably and we've got blankets aplenty. Guests are welcome to use our washer and dryer. Guests are welcome to use the fire pit in the backyard (firewood under the back staircase) but should avoid lingering on the downstairs deck as that is designated for our tenant. You'll have access Hulu and Max, sorry no Netflix at this time. Other things to note Please note our home has a separate, downstairs unit with its own entrance and lovely, quiet tenants who you will likely never see. No need to tiptoe but guests should be mindful of music/TV volume in the evening and early morning hours.

column49: This peaceful and centrally-located space is the perfect resting spot for your next visit to Cville. Only a mile from shopping and 3 miles to UVA and Downtown. This is a guest room in a larger home and you’ll have access to a bathroom just down the hall. A large backyard equipped with an outdoor eating area is a great place to relax. Explore during the day and enjoy a wooded peaceful spot to come home to. The space In a well established neighborhood close to two major roadways, you’ll enjoy a quiet larger home on over an acre of land. You’ll have the largest guest room with amenities such as a refrigerator, TV and coffee maker. (Please be aware that the property has a creek and old treehouse. No one is allowed to enter the treehouse. ) Guest access Feel free to access the 2 living rooms, kitchen and dining room. Please be aware that I live here along with my teenager so it won’t look perfect:) We have a nice, comfortable home but it is well lived in too. During your stay I’m available for any questions you may have but I may not always be home so please message me through Airbnb. I work 1 full time job and 3 part time jobs to keep my single mom life running so I am pretty busy but always willing to do whatever I can to make your stay the best it can be. Other things to note I have 2 cats so please don’t book if you are allergic. They do not have access to the main house after 10pm so they will not bother you. They are allowed inside and outside so no worries if they exit or enter when you do. Please leave your bedroom door closed during the day if you don’t wish for them to come explore your room. In addition, you may hear some train noise (no horn) as the track is just beyond the property line.

column78: Our cozy treehouse offers a one-of-a-kind accommodation, perfect for a romantic getaway or a peaceful retreat. The elevated deck provides breathtaking views of the surrounding woods, creating a magical setting for your stay. Inside, the treehouse is thoughtfully designed with rustic charm and modern comforts. The treehouse is equipped with a small kitchenette, allowing you to prepare simple meals and snacks. The bathroom, though compact, offers all the essentials. The space Welcome to our enchanting treehouse retreat nestled in the heart of nature! Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and experience a unique stay high above the ground, surrounded by the soothing sounds of rustling leaves and birdsong. Enjoy your morning coffee or unwind in the evening while taking in the beauty of nature from your private treetop perch. The warm wood tones and large windows create a welcoming atmosphere, allowing you to connect with the natural surroundings while still enjoying modern amenities. The treehouse is equipped with a small kitchenette, allowing you to prepare simple meals and snacks. Dine al fresco on the deck or set up a picnic amidst the trees – the choice is yours. The bathroom, though compact, offers all the essentials, providing a comfortable and convenient experience. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of the surrounding forest by exploring nearby hiking trails or simply unwinding beneath the treehouse on our deck. In the evening, gather around the fire place, sharing stories and creating memories. Whether you seek a romantic escape or a peaceful retreat, our treehouse offers a truly unique and memorable stay. Book your treetop adventure now and create cherished moments in the branches. We look forward to welcoming you to our treehouse retreat! Guest access The treehouse is private and there are many common areas that you will have access to. We have a large barn and our castle, both of which have large kitchens that you are welcome to use. Our guests also have access to our sauna and disc golf course

column75: This charming Mid-Century Modern cottage includes a private HOT TUB for you. Tucked away in the heart of Nelson County wine country, this little bungalow is perfect for two couples or a small family. This two bedroom, one bath freshly updated ranch is perched up on a small hill on the side of Afton Mountain, overlooking the valley. Here, you’re minutes from all the Route 151 activities yet enough in the country to feel like you’re on vacation. The space Just a few details you will want to know. We have carefully outfitted this house to accommodate an intimate group, but the main living area is an open, flowing concept. The laundry room contains a high capacity washer and dryer that can be easily closed off to keep it quiet from all the activity of the household. Also included are two smart TV’s, board games, ceiling fans, Keurig and regular coffee makers, stainless steel appliances, cooking basics, and modern farmhouse decor. Complimentary wifi, toiletries, hairdryer, ironing board, and central heating and air conditioning. Travel expands the mind and fills the gap.” Sheda Savage Guest access There is a keypad entry door to the property. Other things to note If you’re looking to accommodate a larger property

Ideal for both leisure and business travelers, this inviting space ensures a memorable stay in the heart of Charlottesville. The fully equipped kitchen invites culinary exploration, surrounded by uniquely designed plate walls that add an artistic touch. Revel in natural light through multiple sunroofs, creating a warm ambiance. A convenient washer and dryer add to the practicality of your stay, ensuring convenience during longer visits. column70: Welcome home to this spacious, stylish, and well-appointed townhouse! This unit is the second floor Master Suite, which includes a queen bed, a private attached en suite full bathroom, mountain views, a seating area with swing chair, and a designated parking spot! Just a 20-minute walk to Sentara Martha Jefferson Hospital, a 12-minute drive to the UVA Medical Center, and walking distance to grocery stores, shopping, and dining options! Available for rentals of 30+ days. The space Located on Pantops Mountain, this home features the best of both worlds -- peace and quiet, mountain views, and easy access to all the best that Charlottesville has to offer. The townhouse has 3 additional bedrooms that may be rented to other professionals (usually medical) and the main level and downstairs common areas are shared -- this includes a living room, two dens, a kitchen, laundry, a half bath, a dining area, and a deck. The common areas will be professionally cleaned on a biweekly basis at no cost to you. A well-behaved pet will be considered for an additional fee of $250 (or $100/month, whichever is less). Guest access You will be able to access the whole house with the exception of the other private bedrooms and bathrooms. During your stay I live close by and am happy to help with anything that is needed!

column73: You can't beat the location of this house if you're coming to UVA! It's just 1/2 mile from the hospital and walking distance to so much, you won't need a car! You will have a large bedroom with walk-in closet, a private en suite bathroom with a large soaking tub, and a huge private balcony to relax on and watch the world go by! You will also have a designated off-street parking spot at the house. The space The first floor of the house has the shared living spaces - a front porch, living room, half bath, dining room, kitchen, and back deck. The second floor has the master suite (this unit), laundry, hall bathroom, and two additional bedrooms. The third floor has one additional bedroom and a bathroom. Biweekly housekeeping of the common areas is provided! Well-behaved pets who get along with other pets and people considered for an additional fee. This home is available only for stays of 30+ days.

column58: Spread out and relax in this fantastic Belmont townhouse! Recently constructed, this spacious townhouse features 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and a delightful open floor plan for the shared spaces. Walk up one flight of stairs to reach the common area floor, with kitchen, dining area, half bath, living room, office space, and deck. column32: Centrally located between University of Virginia Grounds and the beloved Downtown Mall, a short walk from UVA Hospital and the restaurants of West Main Street, you can't beat the location for downtown Charlottesville! This 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment is very spacious and has high ceilings, large bedrooms & bathrooms, a modern kitchen , and separate dining area. Comes with parking pass for free lot parking. Stylishly designed with your comfort in mind. Walls are solid, leading to quiet inside. The space This is a 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment in a great area. The unit is spacious, comfortable, and quiet. Comes with free parking in the lot and easy access to everything in the downtown Charlottesville area! Other things to note PLEASE READ HOUSE RULES BEFORE BOOKING I want guests to be able to check-in as early as possible. The tiled bathroom has a tub/shower combination and may be shared with one other guest. Bi-weekly cleaning of the common areas is included! Available for rentals of 30+ days.

column73: Welcome to this stylish, peaceful, and conveniently located 3-bedroom, 2-bath Charlottesville home! Easily get to the downtown mall (less than 2 miles), UVA and the hospital (3 miles), or to Rt. 29. Sunlit and cozy, recently furnished, with a great kitchen, blazing fast fiber internet, and a private back deck, this house will be the perfect place to call home during your time in Charlottesville. Available for rentals of 30+ days. The space Well-behaved dogs are welcome to join you for an additional fee -- no cats please! Please note that pets are not allowed on the furniture and an additional cleaning fee will be assessed if we have to remove hair from the couches or beds. Thanks! Guest access You will have access to the entire main floor of the house and outdoor spaces. column35: Welcome home to this elegant and spacious Charlottesville townhouse! Containing 3 separate master suites with en suite bathrooms, on-site laundry, a well equipped kitchen, a dining room, and a huge living room, you will have all the luxuries of a large and well-appointed house in a setting that can't be beat! Located adjacent to The Shops at Stonefield, you will be steps away from green spaces, restaurants, grocery stores, shopping, and more. The space This unit is a secluded first-floor Master Suite with sole use of the garage and a private entrance into the townhouse! This suite is two floors away from the other two bedrooms, which makes it especially private and quiet. It would be ideal for a night-shift nurse who needs quiet during the day! The suite has a large closet and a full bathroom with a shower/bathtub combination conveniently located inside the bedroom! The other two master suites in the house may be rented to other professionals (usually medical) and the main (second) floor of the townhouse contains the shared areas of living room, dining area, and kitchen. This floor will be cleaned professionally biweekly at no cost to you! There are currently a dog and a cat residing in the house, but they will not be on your private floor. A well-behaved and friendly pet will be considered for an additional pet fee. During your stay I live close by and am happy to help with anything that is needed!
column42: Stonefield Master Suite, Private Entrance & Garage

column54: Relax, have fun, or remote work from a cozy contemporary lower level guest suite 10 minutes from downtown Charlottesville! With a fully equipped kitchenette, foosball and pool tables, and high speed internet, we have everything you could need for a weekend away. Located just 20 minutes from vineyards, cideries, and breweries and 10 minutes from the Charlottesville's famous pedestrian mall, the cozy contemporary is the perfect location to enjoy everything Charlottesville has to offer. The space The guest suite takes up the entire basement of our home, with the bedroom off to a side. The bedroom has a primary queen bed and a daybed that can be expanded from a twin to a king. The bedroom is insulated from much of the sound we and our 2 kids and dog make on the main level of the house. There is also a sound machine to help drown out any noise you may hear while resting. If you are in the living area you will likely hear us above you. If you are looking for a place that is extremely quiet 24/7 then this may not be the right choice for you, but we do our best to be as quiet as possible while we are hosting 🙂 Guest access Guests are welcome to use all amenities in the basement as well as the kids swing-set and obstacle course in the backyard. The fireplace, unfortunately, is not functioning but there are LED candles in there to create atmosphere. Other things to note This is a basement unit, and the thermostat is regulated by the master unit on the main floor. If there are any issues and you are too hot or too cold, please let us know and we will do our best to make you as comfortable as possible!

column51:
Make yourself at home in this charming house just a half mile from the Downtown Mall. Adorned with local art and full of character, from the renovated kitchen to the sunny living room with a giant bay window, this will be the perfect relaxing oasis to return to after a fun day in Charlottesville. Simple yet-well equipped with room to settle in. All are welcome.

Guest Access: Whole top floor of home is yours. Laundry is onsite, shared with separate downstairs studio rental.

Guest have private access to the entire first floor unit, as well as shared access to laundry room and yard.

We live in NY but are available by phone and email at any time to help during your stay. We have support staff in CVille should the need arise.

The home is located in a charming and quiet residential neighborhood about 15 min walk from the downtown mall, and just minutes driving from area hospitals, schools and attractions.

Non smoking. 
Approved pets allowed for a per pet/per month fee.

column77: Perfect for long stays-a retreat for busy travel nurses, students, seasonal workers and longer vacationers. Forget your worries in this spacious and serene space. All of the comforts offered to make home a welcome reprieve. 12 minutes to UVA hospital. 13 minutes to Martha Jefferson hospital. The space This home is in a quiet and safe neighborhood. It offers ample parking, a gorgeous yard with plenty of birds and squirrels to watch o eta coffee or work. It has a dedicated office with lots of light a monitor, keyboard and necessary cords/attachments, plus a lovely view. The kitchen is a dream- it offers all of the features from lighting, huge windows, sound system, professional grade appliances and tons of room. There is an easy start fireplace and even has stuff for s’mores! The mattresses are all new hybrid pocket coil and memory foam- extremely comfortable. A deep set tub attached to the primary bedroom is perfect for long soaks-we even provide bath salts. Plenty of light as most room have added skylights. A brand new outdoor grill is also available. 5 minutes from amazing restaurants, all major grocery stores, brewerys, coffee shops- quality retail stores- we’ve got it all here in Charlottesville! Guest access You will have access to the entire interior space, and also the exterior space including the yard, patio, and grill! You will not have access to the garage. Other things to note We can have the house cleaned weekly for an additional cost. This home is pet-free. Yard maintenance is regularly scheduled. No parties, and no college students. This is a quiet community.

column80: Imagine staying in a home in beautiful central Virginia right in the heart Wine Region of the Year surrounded by hundreds of vineyards, breweries, & cideries, not to mention incredible historic sites and popular stops like UVA, and not ever wanting to leave the house! Welcome to Minicello! Named after nearby Monticello (home of Thomas Jefferson, just 5 minutes away), this 5-bdrm has it all. Private saltwater pool, 5-person hot tub, stocked fishing pond, pool table are all yours during your stay! The space This 2-level home includes 5 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, 2 living room spaces, large open kitchen area upstairs with bonus kitchenette downstairs, multiple porches, and tons of outdoor space. Pool table, games and puzzles, tons of books, card table, reading nook, desk workspace, smart tvs, and so much more. Outdoors include private inground saltwater pool with diving board, 5-person hot tub, 3 porches, outdoor seating, a gas and a charcoal grill, fire pit, and stocked fishing pond! Upstairs full kitchen features double oven, 5-burner gas stove, full fridge, microwave, and custom built bar. Downstairs kitchenette includes second full fridge plus tons of gadgets including all-in-one airfryer/toaster oven, Instapot pressure cooker, electric griddle and hot plates, and more. Upstairs bathrooms feature beautiful walk-in marble showers. Washer and dryer in downstairs kitchenette. 3 bedrooms upstairs - 2 with king beds (one with in-suite bathroom); one single bed with roll out trundle. 2 bedrooms downstairs - 1 with queen bed; and another with 2 twin beds. Rollaway single bed cot also available. Pack n play available by request. Generator backup in case of power outage. Guest access The full property is yours during your stay! Including all outdoor amenities. You'll find a few closets and cabinets kept lock for owner's supplies and storage, but otherwise - mi casa es su casa! Other things to note Property includes gated pool, hot tub, and pond. Children must be supervised at all times.

column31:
Come and enjoy all that Charlottesville has to offer in this luxurious escape just steps from the downtown mall. Our spacious one bedroom apartment offers a king size bed and cozy living space surrounded by plants and Hawaiian tropical vibes.

The apartment is located just two blocks from the downtown mall, perfect for a quick bite to eat or nights out on the town. Although located right next to the train tracks, the building is well insulated keeping noise to a minimum.

The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you will need to make a home cooked meal including a spice drawer, baking supplies and mixer, and any basic utensil you’d find in your own home.

The living room couch may be the highlight of your trip, offering a peaceful place to relax, read a book, nap, or break out the board games.

After a long day of adventuring, cozy up on a king size Helix mattress and tempur pedic pillows for a restful night sleep.

I will be available by text or email throughout your stay

column40: *PLEASE READ* Brand new listing so setup is still being finished. Photos are accurate of what's setup so far and it will be fully setup for everything you would need to use and enjoy all rooms by March 20th, however finishing touches may not be finished (like wall decor,, amenities, etc). It is listed at a discounted price for the first 5 days so please take advantage! I will update the photos as the place continues to be finished. Please note $150 pet fee per pet to be paid after booking. The space Located in Historic Beautiful Belmont neighborhood, only a 6 minute walk to the Downtown Mall. There are many critically acclaimed restaurants all within a 1 minute walk of the place. Designed in a rustic bohemian style, this place definitely represents Charlottesville! This is a roughly 700 square foot 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment with a living room and a bonus room (dining room/seating space). It has a spacious front and back balcony deck, with a view overlooking Downtown Belmont. PLEASE READ: This is an Historic older building so please keep in mind while it has tons of rustic bohemian charm, this is by no means new or modern. The entry stairway leading to unit and the common entryway foyer are quite run down and old looking. There are nicks and marks on walls and floor of unit. It only shares floor with one unit, and part of the kitchen wall with a side unit (bedroom does not share wall with neighbor), but you can hear muffled sounds from neighbors (as they can hear you), akin to most apartment buildings without concrete or brick walls. It is clean, very inviting and nice-looking, but if you are looking for new quality with few imperfections, this is not it. Other things to note Pets are allowed with a $150 fee per each pet for stays of 4 nights or fewer (pet fee will be greater for stays over 4 nights so please ask before booking if you'd like to check the longer stay pet fee amount). You MUST let me know about any pets in your welcome AirBnB message. *Pet fee is to be paid after booking. Pet fee is NOT included in the booking price that AirBnB collects, whether or not you mark pets in the reservation.* I ask you to NOT let pets on any furniture or beds and to pick up any waste in the yard.
